column3: E hino no andirten ko woni giggol: Almasiihu on okkitirii ngurndan mun ɗan fii men, haray enen kadi hiɗen haani okkitirde ngurndan men ɗan fii musiɓɓe men ɓen.
Ɓay Juldeere Yawtaneede nden ɓadike, tawi kanko Iisaa o andii saa'i makko iwugol e oo aduna, yaha ka Baabaajo on, hewtii. Kanko Iisaa himo yiɗunoo ɓe makko ɓen e oo aduna ɗoo haa ka rawnoode.
E ko homɓe woni ɓen ɓe Alla tikkannoo e nder ɗii duuɓi cappanɗe nay? Hinaa ɓee waɗunooɓe junuubu, maayi ka wulaa?
Wa'ee wa paykoy ɗoftiikoy, hara on accaali hande kadi ɗiya himmeeji ardoo on, ɗun ko ɗin ɗi wondunoɗon e nder angal andugol mon.
Ko fii Alla dumbii yimɓe ɓen fow e nder geddi fii no o yurmiree fow.

Mi nani ko wa'itata wa hawa iwruka e hakkunde ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe, no wi'a: «Sariyaare wootere ngawri ko dinaruuru wooturu, awa kadi sariyaare tati muutiri ko dinaruuru wooturu, kono nebban ɗan e njaram ɗan wota a bonnu!»
Jippinee hoore mon yeeso Joomiraaɗo on, ɗun o ɓantoyay on.
Ko fii o happii ɲalaande nde o ɲaawirta aduna on peewal, rewrude e on neɗɗo mo o toɗɗii, ɗun ko on mo o waɗirani fow seedee timmuɗo immintingol mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.»
Suufaaɓe ɓen kadi sacci katanwol bulle, ɓe waɗi ngol ka hoore Iisaa, ɓe ɓorni mo kadi dolokke boɗeejo.
Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'i yo keynguuɓe hecciɗuɓe ɓen ƴette, ɓe heɓa ɓiɓɓe, ɓe ardoo ɓeynguure maɓɓe nden, fii wota en jonnu liddotooɓe en ɓen jolkun woo no ɓe aybinira en.
Gomɗinee lan wonde miɗo humondiri e Baabaajo on, kanko Baabaajo on kadi himo humondiri e an. Si hinaa ɗun, gomɗiniron bete sabu ɗee kuuɗe ɗe mi woni waɗude.
Onsay mayde nden e jahannama bugaa ka weendu yiite, ko ndun weendu yiite woni mayde ɗimmere nden.

Ko fii, si hinaano ɗun, Almasiihu on tampayno soono woo gila ka fuɗɗoode aduna on. Kono jooni, ka lannoode jamaanuuji, o feeɲii nde wootere ko yoni fii saa'iiji ɗin fow fii bonnitugol junuubaaji e nder ko o itti hoore makko sadaka kon.
O muɲɲanii ɓe kadi wa telen duuɓi cappanɗe nay ka wulaa.
Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an, nde mottondirɗon fii nafakkaari ndin woo, habbondiree.
Onsay mi yi'i Baalun kun no hoɓɓita notannde jeegaɓere nden. Dimbannde leydi tiiɗunde waɗi, naange ngen ɓawliri wa bagi sacciraaɗo leeɓi ɓaleeji, lewru ndun fow kadi wa'i wa ƴiiƴan.
Rewɓe yi'i mayɓe mun no immitoo. Woɓɓe goo kadi lettaa, ɓe salii sotteede fii no ɓe heɓira ummutal ɓurngal moƴƴude.

Kono Puulusa wi'i ɓen mbatulaaɓe: «Ɓay ɓe foccii men ka tumbere mbatu e ɓaawo ɲaawugol men, menen ɓee jeyaaɓe e laamateeri Roomu, e hoore ɗun ɓe bugike men ka kaso, e hara jooni ɓe yaltinay men ka kene e dow gundoo? Waawaa wonude! Kamɓe tigi yo ɓe aru, ɓe yaltina men!»

Ko fii yamirooje ɗen, ɗun ko «wota mo jeena», «wota mo itta hoore», «wota mo wujja», «wota mo seeditoo fenaande», «wota mo himmana ko goɗɗo jeyi», e ɗeya yamirooje fow no ɲoggaa e nder ngol daalol ɗoo: «Yo a yiɗir ɲokondo maa on wano yiɗirɗaa hoore maa non.»
Kala jogiiɗo on tama'u e makko, haray no laɓɓintinii wano kanko Almasiihu on o laaɓiri non.
Ko fii Sariya Alla on no welammi ka ɓernde,
Weltee saa'i woo e nder humondiral mon e Joomiraaɗo on, miɗo fillitaade kadi, weltee!
Onsay mi yeƴƴitii fii ndaarugol on wonɗo lan wowlande, mi yi'i joɗɗinirɗe pitilli tafiraaɗe kaŋŋe jeeɗiɗi.
E ko homɓe o woondannoo naatataa ka fowtaare makko, si hinaa yedduɓe ɓen?
Adinooɓe lan arude ɓen fow ko wuyɓe e jattooɓe, kono baali ɗin heɗanooki ɓe.
Jiyaaɓe, yankinanee jeyɓe on ɓen e nder teddungal timmungal, hara hinaa non moƴƴuɓe ɓen tun e newiiɓe ɓen, kono e mettuɓe fii ɓen kadi,
Tawi hiɓe eɓɓi woɓɓe ko seeditoo fenaande, ɓen wi'i: «Oo neɗɗo no jokki aybingol nokkuure hormorde nden e Sariya on.
Ɗun fow ko immorde e Alla woni, on Moƴƴintinɗo hakkunde men e makko rewrude e Almasiihu on. O yeɗi men menen kadi golle moƴƴintingol hakkunde yimɓe ɓen e makko kanko Alla.
Musiɓɓe an, ƴettee misal tampere e muɲal ɓen annabaaɓe yewtuɓe e innde Joomiraaɗo on.
Onsay kala jantotooɗo innde Joomiraaɗo on dandoyte.›
e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Aamiina! Mantoore e mangu e faamu e jaaroore e teddungal e bawgal e doole, ko Alla men on wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!»
Wota on fotin ko woni e kene kon, wano mooragol e cuɗorgol kaŋŋe e conci dimi.
Awa wota a hersir seeditanagol Joomi men on, e min sokiraaɗo sabu makko on, kono tampidu e an fii Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e dow bawgal Alla,
Min kadi non mi waɗitike mo maa fii maɓɓe, fii yo kamɓe kadi ɓe waɗito ɓe maa rewrude e goonga on.
Finu, tiiɗinaa ko heddii kon, ɗun ko ko faandii maayude kon, sabu mi yiiraali kuuɗe maa ɗen wa timmuɗe yeeso Alla an on.
Tammo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka maaje e ka ɓulli ndiyan, di'e ɗen wonti ƴiiƴan.
Ko sabu makko heɓirɗen, iwrude e gomɗinal ngal, naatirgal e oo sulfu, mo wonɗen e mun, tabituɗen. Hiɗen mantorde on tama'u mo marɗen fii mangural Alla ngal.
Ko fii, andee fota, kala jinoowo maa mo laaɓaa maa himmuɗo, e maanaa rewoowo sanamu, alaa geɓal ka laamateeri Alla e Almasiihu on.
Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi Ibraahiima ɗoftori noddaandu ndu Alla noddi mo ndun fii yahugol e leydi ndi o ronoyta ndin. O yahi e hoore o andaa ka o woni yahude.
Wota on yaru haa mandilon, ɗun ko ɓoylaare, kono hebbinoree Ruuhu Allaahu on.
Buy jokkoyay jiiɓaare maɓɓe nden, laawol goonga on hoynoyee sabu maɓɓe.
ko fii rewrude e makko en fow hiɗen mari naatirgal takko Baabaajo on e nder Ruuhu gooto.
Kono fii ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, gomɗinɓe ɓen, men tawi no moƴƴi ka men windana ɓe, yo ɓe reeno e tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji e ƴiiƴan e mummunteeji jiibuɗi e jinaa.»
Onsay Petruusu wi'i mo: «Hanaaniiya, ko honno Ibuliisa naatiri ka ɓernde maa haa ka fenanaa Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, maraa feccere coggu ngesa mban.
Ɗun, hande kadi en wontataa fayɓe yiilindirteeɓe, ruynirteeɓe kala noone janndeeji ɗi yimɓe eɓɓiri ƴoyre e kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗaynooje.
Wota on ɗaynito! E on andaa ɓoyliiɓe ɓen maraa geɓal ka laamu Alla? Hinaa jiiɓiiɓe ɓen, hinaa kadi rewooɓe sanamu ɓen e jeenooɓe ɓen e worɓe waɗitiiɓe rewɓe ɓen e worɓe jinooɓe worɓe ɓen
Wota en terto mottondiral men ngal, wano woɓɓe woowiri non. Kono wakkilindiren fodde hiɗen yi'ude ɲalaande nden no ɓadaade.
Awa waree piiji adunayankeeji wonɗi e mon ɗin, ɗun ko wano: jinaa e angal laaɓal e himmeeji e faaleeji bonɗi e miile, (ko fii miile ko rewugol sanamu).
Kono enen yimɓe ɲalorma ɓen, wonen hakkilanɓe, ɓornoɗen hiwitorgo gomɗinal ngal e giggol ngol, hippoɗen kunnawal tama'u kisiyee on.
Ko fii ruuhu mo Alla yeɗi en on wonaa waɗoowo en huluɓe, kono ko ruuhu okkoowo en doole e giggol e waawugol hoore mun.
Kala on wi'uɗo no andi mo, hara o ɗoftaaki yamirooje makko ɗen, haray ko o fenoowo, goonga on alaa e makko.
timminiree weltaare an nden heɓugol miijo wooto, e nder giggol gootol e fondo wooto e anniyee gooto.
Onsay ɓe woni e ɗaɓɓugol no ɓe nangira mo, kono laatii hay gooto fawaali mo jungo, ko fii hari saa'i makko on hewtaali.
Yo ɓe waɗu ko moƴƴi, ɓe alɗira kuuɗe moƴƴe, ɓe wona okkooɓe e kafidotooɓe.
Ɓen jaabii, wi'i: «Si tawno o waɗaano bone, men addantaano ma mo.»

On mo ɓurdindini ɲalaaɗe ɗen, haray ko fii teddingol Joomiraaɗo on o waɗiri ɗun. On mo no ɲaama kadi, haray ko fii teddingol Joomiraaɗo on o woni ɲaamande, ko fii himo jarnude Alla. On mo alaa ɲaamude, haray ko fii teddingol Joomiraaɗo on haɗi o ɲaama, ko fii kanko kadi himo jarnude Alla.
Weltee e hoore tanƴinagol, ŋaɲɲoɗon tampereeji ɗin, duumoɗon e toraare Alla.
O yamiri kadi yeesoojo suufaaɓe ɓen yo o maroy Puulusa e hoore hoynangol mo seeɗa, hara o salaaki kadi ɓe Puulusa ɓen kurkanoo mo.
Giggol heɲɲay ko woni woo, hingol hoolii ko woni woo, hingol tanƴinii e ko woni woo, hingol wakkilii ko woni woo.
Wano windori non: «Mi gomɗinii, ko ɗun waɗi si mi wowli.» Menen kadi ɓay ko noone gomɗinal gootal men mari, meɗen gomɗini, ko ɗun waɗi si meɗen wowlude,
Men yamirii on, yo musiɓɓe, hajee puyɓe ɓen, wakkilinon aamituɓe ɓen, wallitoɗon lo'uɓe ɓen, wonon muɲɲiiɓe e fee wonɗo woo.
Njowaɓo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka hoore jullere laamu kullii ngin, laamateeri maggii on niɓɓiti. Yimɓe ɓen ŋati ɗenɗe hakkee muuseendi,
Yo ɓuttu e yurmeende wonan kala jokkuɗo ndee yamiroore, hay e Isra'iila mo Alla.
Tawi on no jangi fii laawol Joomi on, himo wowliraynoo jiɲo tiiɗungo, himo feɲɲinaynoo kadi janna no feewiri fii Iisaa, tawi e hoore ɗun fow ko ko Yaayaa lootaynoo kon tun o andi.
Woni on ɲaamay, woni on yaray, woni kala ko waɗoton, waɗiree piiji ɗin fow fii mangu Alla ngun.

Ko fii onon, Ruuhu mo heɓirɗon Almasiihu on no e mon, ko ɗun waɗi on hatonjinaa e janneede, kono, wano Ruuhu makko on woni jannirde on piiji ɗin fow non, (ko mo goonga, mo aldaa e fenaande), humondiree e Almasiihu on wano Ruuhu makko on janniri on non.
Wano tawiri non ɓandu ndu aldaa e ruuhu ko mayndu, ko wano non kadi gomɗinal ngal aldaa e kuuɗe ko mayngal.
Ɓay o gaynii wi'ude ɗun, o ƴetti bireedi on, o jarni Alla yeeso maɓɓe ɓe fow. Onsay o senditi, o nangani ɲaamugol.
Kono windanen ɓe tun, wi'en ɓe yo ɓe terto tuunintinorgol sanamuuji e jinaa e ɲaamugol jiibe e ƴiiƴan.
Puulusa kadi wi'i mo: «An kadi, Allaahu on bantoto ma yo maadi rawninaandi! Hiɗa jooɗii ɲaawirgol lan Sariya on, e hin-le a bonnirii Sariya on ko yamirɗaa yo ɓe banto lan kon!»
Jooni donkinannde woo alanaa ɓen humondirɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Ko fii Alla muuyanaali en tikkere makko nden, kono ko fii no heɓiren kisiyee rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on,
o yaltoya fii faljingol leƴƴi wonɗi e coɓɓuli aduna on nay, ɗin ko Yaajuuja e Maajuuja en, o mottindira ɓe fii waɗugol hare. Tawa ɗuuɗoral maɓɓe ngal no fota e njaareendi ndin ka baharu.
Awa ko ɗun woɓɓe e mon wonnoo. Kono Ruuhu Alla men on lootii on, laɓɓinii on, o jogorii on feewuɓe e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on.
Ko sabu ɗun mi heɓiri ɗii satteendeeji. Kono mi hersaa, ko fii miɗo andi ko hombo mi gomɗini, awa miɗo felliti himo mari bawgal hiwugol ko mi halfinaa kon haa e ɲalaande ɲaawoore nden.
Saa'i kala toroɗon wano Ruuhu Allaahu on woni ardorde on non e kala noone torndeeji, landoɗon ballal Alla, findinon hakkillaaji mon ɗin fii ɗun, duumoɗon e ɗun fota, toranoɗon yimɓe Alla ɓen fow.
Immorde e an min Puulusa, wondude e Silaasi e Timotee, haa e ngal moftal wongal Tesalonii, humondirɓe e Alla Baabaajo on e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on. Yo moƴƴere e ɓuttu wonan on.
Yo yimɓe ɓen fow andu newaare mon nden, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on ko Ɓadiiɗo.
Ko fii nde ɲaamoton oo bireedi woo, yaron e kun jardukun, on wowlay fii mayde Joomi on haa ɲande o artoyi.
Toraare waɗiraande gomɗinal no sellina nawnuɗo. E hoore ɗun, Joomiraaɗo on imminay mo. Si tawii ontigi no waɗi junuubi, ɗi yaafante mo.
Mi yettii Alla, on mo mi woni rewude, wano baabiraaɓe an ɓen non, e dow ɓernde laaɓunde, e hoore mi alaa yejjitude fii maa e nder torndeeji an ɗin jemma e ɲalorma.
e hoore hiɓe wi'a pelle ɗen e pete ɗen: «Yanee e hoore amen, suuɗon men gite oo Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu e tikkere Baalun kun!

‹Mo no mari nowru, yo jento ko Ruuhu Allaahu on woni wowlande mofte ɗen kon. Fooluɗo on, mi neeminay mo ‹manna› suuɗiiɗo, mi yeɗa mo kadi hayre raneere, hara no windii e nden hayre innde heyre nde hay gooto andaa si wonaa on hendiiɗo nde.› »
Immorde e miile maɓɓe ɗen, ɓe hiiliroya on konguɗi sincaaɗi. Kono gila neeɓii ko ɓe happanaa kon no ɓadaade tun, awa hayrannde maɓɓe nden ŋoŋaa.
Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla kadi accidi ɓe e doole ɗaynooje fii no ɓe gomɗinira fenaande nden,
Ko fii no windii: «Sabu mon innde Alla nden no hoyneede e hakkunde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.»
Ko wano Janeesi e Jambereesi dartornoo Muusaa non, ko wano non ɓen yimɓe kadi dartorta goonga on. Ɓen ko yimɓe ɓe hakkille mun bonnaa, ɓe gomɗinal mun wonaa haqiiqawal.
‹Kala ɓen ɓe mi yiɗi, mi felay ɓe, mi wurta. Awa jooni wakkilo, tuubaa.
Nde tawnoo en jogoraama feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal men ngal, hiɗen mari ɓuttu e Alla rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
Wattaa yiila e hoore maa e ko jannataa kon e nder cataare. Ko fii si a waɗirii non, a danday hoore maa, dandaa heɗotooɓe ma ɓen.

Awa kadi mi jokkayno ɓe soono woo e juulirɗe ɗen fow fii donkingol ɓe, miɗo ɓittinaynoo ɓe fii no ɓe yeddira gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal. E nder ko mi monantoo ɓe haa feƴƴita kon kadi, mi cukkotono ɓe haa ka ca'e janane.
Ko fii mbeleeɗe ɓandu ɗen no waalii e kene, ɗen-le ko jinaa e angal laaɓal e jiiɓaare
Ko ɗun waɗi hinaa tutuɗo on woni goɗɗun, hinaa kadi yarnuɗo on, kono ko Alla mawninɗo on.
Ko ɗun waɗi jooni, dokkal woo ŋakkanaa on e nder ndee habbannde nde wonɗon e mun fii feeɲoygol Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
Mi nani hawa ka kammu, wa hawa di'e ɗuuɗuɗe maa wa hawa riggannde tiiɗunde, tawi kan hawa ka mi nani no nandita e hito korli ɗi hoɗooɓe hoɗata.
Awa kadi annabaaɓe ɓen fow seeditaninoke mo wonde kala gomɗinɗo mo heɓay yaafuyee junuubaaji e innde makko.»
Ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan wonanay ŋaɲɲiiɓe e waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ɗaɓɓa darja on e teddungal e ngurndan ɗan lannataa ɗan,

Immorde e min Yuuhanna haa e mon onon ɗee mofte Iisaa jeeɗiɗi wonɗe e ngal diiwal Aazii: Yo ɓuttu e moƴƴere wonan on immorde e on Woodaaɗo, on Woodanooɗo e on Aroyoowo, wondude e ɗii ruuhuuji jeeɗiɗi wonɗi ka yeeso jullere laamu makko,
Puulusa wi'i: «Yaayaa ko fii tuubuubuyee looti, e hoore ɗun himo wi'aynoo yimɓe ɓen yo ɓe gomɗin aroyoowo ɓaawo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa.»
Awa ɗunɗoo fow no holli ko Joomiraaɗo on andi ko honno o dandirta yimɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen ndarndeede, o donkina ɓe feewaa ɓen haa ɲande ɲaawoore nden,
Kono ka haqiiqa hiɓe himmannoo nokkuure ɓurnde moƴƴude, ɗun ko ka kammu. Ko ɗun waɗi Alla hersiraa noddeede Alla maɓɓe, ko fii o moƴƴinanii ɓe hoɗo.
Kono an, bugito taali neɗɗanke mehi ɗi yummiraaɓe yewtata. Eltiraa hoore maa wuurirgol wano Alla faaliraa non.
Ɓe hebbini hoore leydi ndin fow, ɓe hundi daakorde yimɓe Alla ɓen e saare ɓuraande yiɗeede nden, kono yiite iwri ka kammu, muli ɓe.
Onsay o yamiri yo ɓe loote maande kisiyee e innde Iisaa Almasiihu on. Kamɓe kadi ɓe torii mo wondugol e maɓɓe e nder balɗe.
an oo hooliiɗo wonay ardotooɗo bumɓe, hoolii kadi wonanay ɓen wonɓe ka niwre ndaygu,
Awa e hino fodaari ndi o waɗani en ndin: ko ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan.
Kono faamu iwrungu ka Alla ngun, ko adii taho, ko ngu laaɓungu, awa kadi ko ngu ɓuttu, ko ngu newiingu, ko ngu deeƴinayngu, heewungu yurmeende e kuuɗe moƴƴe, ngu aldaa e ɓurnondiral e faasiqankaaku.
Baabaajo on no yiɗi Ɓiɗɗo on, awa kadi o wattii fow e juuɗe makko.
Awa Joomiraaɗo on alaa nennude hunnugol fodaari makko ndin, wano woɓɓe miijori non. Kono ka liddu ɗun, o muɲɲani on tun, ko fii o yiɗaa hay gooto hayra. Kono ko o yiɗi, ko yo fow aru e tuubuubuyee.
Miɗo yelii yo neɗɗo fow wa'u wa an min, kono mo kala no mari dokkal feerewal, ngal Alla yeɗi ɗun, mo kala e noone goo.
Awa ɗaɓɓee giggol ngol, himmanon dokke iwruɗe e Ruuhu Alla ɗen, tentinii haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun.
Ko fii ko on Alla daaluɗo: «Yo ndaygu ngun jalbu ka nder niwre», ko kanko kadi jalbini ɓerɗe amen ɗen, fii ndaygingol e amen andal mangu Alla wongu e yeeso Almasiihu on ngon.
Ɓawto ɗun, Yahuudiyankeejo waawuɗo haala, anduɗo kadi bindi daaluyee on, wi'eteeɗo Apoloosi jeyaaɗo Aleksandiri hewti Efeesi.
Ko ɗun waɗi si Iisaa kadi tampuno ka ɓaawo hoɗo fii laɓɓinirgol jamaa on ƴiiƴan makko ɗan tigi.
Ko ɗun haanuɗaa yewtude, wakkilinaa, felaa wa newnanaaɗo yamirgol. Wota hay gooto yawito ma e ɗun!
E hino no giggol Alla ngol feeɲiri e men: Allaahu on addii Ɓiɗɗo makko bajjo on e nder oo aduna fii no wuuriren immorde e makko.
«Baaba an, miɗo yiɗi yo ɓe okkuɗaa mi ɓen wonu ka mi woni ɗon, fii no ɓe yi'ira mangu an ngu yeɗuɗaa mi ngun, ɓay a yiɗiino lan ado aduna on woodeede.
yeebaare e tampere no ka ɗate maɓɓe.
Ɓay hiɗen mari hooreejo mawɗo yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla, taƴituɗo kammuuli ɗin, ɗun ko Iisaa Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, catoɗen e qirritannde gomɗinal men ngal.
Ko fii o hendike e juuɗe Alla Baabaajo on teddungal e darja fewndo ko o nanunoo hawa iwrude ka darja heewuɗo ɓural on, ko Allaahu on daalani mo: «Oo ɗoo ko Ɓiɗɗo an yiɗaaɗo, mo mi weltori on.»
Ko on Ruuhu gooto bajjo waɗata ɗii piiji fow, senditana mo kala e ko mun, wano o yiɗiri non.

Malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Feccere tammere naange ngen piyaa, wondude e feccere tammere lewru ndun e feccere tammere koode ɗen, fii no feccere tammere ɗin ndayguuji niɓɓitira, e no feccere tammere jalbeendi ɲallal ngal mutira, jemma on kadi wano non.
Tun, ɓe fow ɓe nangi Sosteene, ɗun ko ardiiɗo juulirde nden, ɓe woni e piyugol mo ka yeeso ɲaawirdu. Tawi Galiyuunu haajaaka e ɗun.
Ɓe ɗaɓɓi kadi no ɓe nangira mo, kono o laawii ɓe.
Ko ɗun waɗi si maayu ɓernde heɓataa men. Hay si ɓandu amen ndun ɲolii, kono haray nder amen on no heyɗitude ɲande woo ɲande.
Mariyama kadi ƴetti wa feccere liitir angiri laaɓundi, satta-cogguuri, no wi'ee ‹naar›, o juuri ka koyɗe Iisaa, o fittiri koyɗe on ɗen sukundu makko ndun, suudu ndun heewi urngol angiri ndin.
Ko gomɗinal o hoɗiri e ndin leydi fodaandi wa leydi jananiri, o hoɗi e nder cuuɗi bagi. Issaaqa e Yaaquuba kadi hoɗiri non, ɓe ronidi e makko fodaari wootiri ndin.
Wonee ɲembooɓe lan, yo musiɓɓe. Ƴetton misal e ɓen wuurirɓe wano men wuuriri non.
Rondondiranee anndeeji mon ɗin. Ko non timminirton Sariya Almasiihu on.
On yi'ii, ko sabu kuuɗe ɗen neɗɗo on jogoraa feewuɗo, hinaa sabu gomɗinal ngal tun.
Ko honɗun wi'eten jooni? Hara angal peewal no e Alla? Pellet oo'o!
Jaɓee on mo tiiɗaa gomɗinal e ɓaawo feloore.
Hare waɗi ka kammu, Miikaa'iilu e malaa'ikaaɓe mun ɓen piiridi e ngin ningiwii. Ningiwii ngin e malaa'ikaaɓe mun ɓen kadi piiridi e maɓɓe.
Si on aru seytinde, wota on waɗu junuubu, haray wota naange ngen mutu hiɗon tikki.
Wota bone woo yottore bone, maa yennee yottoo, kono ka liddu ɗun, onon ko yo on du'ano, ko fii ko ɗun noddiraɗon fii no roniron barki kin.
Nuluɗo lan on no wondi e an, o accitaali lan min tun, ko fii min miɗo waɗude soono woo ko welata mo kon.»
Awa daree catoɗon. Yo goonga on wonu dattol keeci mon ɗin, peewal ngal wona dolokke mon hiwitorɗo on.

Awa koode jeeɗiɗi ɗe yi'uɗaa ɗen ka jungo an ɲaamo, e joɗɗinirɗe pitilli tafiraaɗe kaŋŋe jeeɗiɗi ɗen, e hino ko ɗun firi kon: koode ɗen jeeɗiɗi ko malaa'ikaaɓe mofte ɗen jeeɗiɗi, awa joɗɗinirɗe pitilli ɗen jeeɗiɗi, ko mofte ɗen jeeɗiɗi.»

Kono non e hino ko tawɗen kon: ɓawto o waɗeede e ley malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen fii saa'ihun nii, kanko Iisaa o waɗanaama meetelol mangu e teddungal sabu mayde nde o tampiri nden, fii, tippude e moƴƴere Alla nden, yo o maayan yimɓe ɓen fow.
Ko fii ko Alla woni waɗude e mon faale on e huuwingol on ko yaadi e eɓɓoore makko moƴƴere nden.
Ko mi yewtirani on nii ko fii yo weltaare an nden wonu e mon, e fii yo weltaare mon nden onon kadi wonu timmunde.
Immorde e an min Puulusa, mo Alla, on Danduɗo en, e Iisaa Almasiihu, on wonɗo tama'u men, yamiri wonugol sahaabaajo Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Rewɓe ɓen kadi wano non, ɓe ɓornora no haaniri, hara hinaa no maniree e no hawnori, hara ɓe ukkaaki e morɗi hawniiɗi e cuɗorgol kaŋŋe e koɗe hittuɗe, maa conci satta-cogguuji,
Onsay o moƴƴini paatawol ɓoggi, o raɗii ɓe fow ka dingiral juulirde mawnde wondude e baali ɗin e na'i ɗin, o saakiti kaalisiiji waɗaynooɓe sensa-sensita ɓen, o liɓi taabe ɗen.
Ko fii ko en tagudi makko. Ko e humondiral men e Iisaa Almasiihu on tagaɗen fii no waɗiren kuuɗe moƴƴe, ɗe kanko Alla o eɓɓunoo gila law.
Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, wota on ŋalɗir nguli heɓuki on kin fii ndarndegol, wa si tawii ko huunde heyre heɓi on.
Weltoɗen, wonen e nder welo-welo, mawninen mo, ko fii peera Baalun kun hewtii, jombajjo makkun on hebulike,
Hippoɗon kadi kunnawal kisiyee ngal, jogoɗon kaafa Ruuhu on, kan-le ko daaluyee Alla on.
O yi'i goɗɗo e ɓen musiɓɓe makko no tampinee. O ari dandugol mo, o yottanii mo, o wari Misirayankoojo on.
Onon non, yo musiɓɓe, wota ɓerɗe mon maayan waɗugol ko moƴƴi.
Wattanee yiila tabiton e nder gomɗinal ngal, wakkiloɗon, tiiɗon.
Kono ɓay on rewii oo allaajo wi'eteeɗo Muluuka, on rewii kadi ndee hoodere oo allaajo mon wi'eteeɗo Ronfa, ɗin nandollaaji ɗi moƴƴinɗon fii ko rewon, min kadi mi bugoto on toonin Baabiila.›
Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe, wonee tabituɓe, jogitoɗon janndeeji ɗi men janni on ɗin, woni non ko e konguɗi, woni e ɓataake.
Awa on Hebulinɗo en fii nden eɓɓoore ko Alla, on Tolmuɗo Ruuhu mun on e men.
Awa kadi yo debbo jangu e nder deeƴere e yankinaare timmunde.
Wota a jaɓu tooɲe e hoore ardotooɗo woo, si hinaa a heɓu seeditiiɓe ɗiɗo maa tato.
Salmondiree, hirbondiron hirbondiral laaɓungal. Mofte Almasiihu on ɗen fow salminii on.

Tawi hiɓe bugotonoo mbullaari ka ko'e maɓɓe, yooma, wulla, hiɓe ewnoo wi'a: «Bone, bone wonanii ndee saare mawnde, nde kala on marɗo laana ka baharu alɗinori ngalu mun! E nder saa'ihun gootun pet nde caabii!»
Ndaaree noone giggol ngol Baabaajo on yeɗi en ngol, haa noddaɗen fayɓe Alla. Awa kadi ko en ɗun. E hino ko waɗi kon si aduna on andaa en, ko fii o andaali mo.
Onon kadi sukaaɓe wano non, yankinanee ardotooɓe moftal ngal, mo kala e mon jippina hoore mun yeeso oya, ko fii: «Alla liddoto mawnintiniiɓe ɓen, kono o yeɗa jippinɓe hoore mun ɓen sulfu.»
Pellet hinaa non! Hay si yimɓe ɓen fow ko fenooɓe, Alla kan ko goongaajo, wano windori non wonde: «Peewal maa ngal no feeɲira konguɗi maa ɗin, nde ɲaawaɗaa woo wonaa fooluɗo.»
Awa ɗoo kadi hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen no newnani mo haɓɓugol kala jantotooɗo innde maa nden.»

Woodiino e hakkunde jamaa on waɗitiiɓe annabaaɓe. Jannooɓe fenaande woniroyay non e hakkunde mon onon kadi, hara hiɓe ɓisa janndeeji fenaandeeji e nder ko ɓe jannata kon, nawrayɗi e halkaare. Ɓe yedda on Soodituɗo ɓe, ɗun ko Joomi on. Ko nii ɓe pooɗirta e maɓɓe halakuyee yaawuɗo.

Sabu ɗun hooreeɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen ɓurti ɗaɓɓude no warira mo, ɗun non hinaa fii tun himo bonni Sariya on e asewe, ɗun ko ɲalaande fowteteende nden, kono ko fii himo inni kadi Alla ko Ben makko, ko nii o waɗitori himo fota e Alla.
Mi mantii on fii ko on yejjitaali fii an kon e ɗi fow, e ko maanditiɗon janndeeji ɗin kon, wano mi hewtiniri on ɗi non.
Ko fii hari Daawuuda wi'irii nii fii makko, woo: ‹Mi yi'ay Joomiraaɗo on saa'i woo yeeso an, ko fii hari himo ka sengo ɲaamo an fii wota mi diwnu.
ɗun ko onon ɓee jibinaaɓe kesun, ɓe tawata hinaa awdi muloori kono ko luttoori, immorde e daaluyee Alla wuuruɗo tabiti on.
Awa, qirritee junuubaaji mon ɗin hakkunde mon, torondiranon kadi, fii no sellinireɗon. Torndeeji ɗi aaden feewuɗo torii ɗin ko dolnuɗi duncayɗi.
Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, kala gomɗinɗo haray heɓii ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan.
Mi accataa wonon aliyatiimaaɓe, mi aray e mon.
No mari nafa e ɗi fow. Ko adii kon, daaluyeeji Alla ɗin ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen halfinaa.
Onon kadi, yo jiyaaɓe, ɗoftee jeyɓe on jeyal adunayankewal ɓen e nder kulol e teddungal, e hoore ɓernde laaɓunde, wano ɗoftorɗon Almasiihu on non.
Kaa a yawiti ngaluuji moƴƴere makko nden e muɲal makko ngal e yondinaare makko nden, e ɓaawo andugol wonde moƴƴere Alla nden no pooɗude ma e tuubuubuyee?
Awa e hino hoolaare nde ɓattorten Alla nden: si en torike mo goɗɗun ko yaadi e faale makko on, o heɗoto en.
Yo Alla, Jom tama'u on, hebbin on weltaare e ɓuttu fow e nder gomɗinal ngal, fii no heewiron tanƴinaare immorde e bawgal Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
Tawi tutateeri no e nden nokkuure nde o fempaa e mun, e nder ndin tutateeri kadi tawi no ton qaburu keso mo hay gooto surraaka e mun taho.

Kullii ngin nangidaa e waɗitiiɗo annabaajo on, ɗun ko on waɗunooɗo maandeeji yeeso maggii ɗi o ɗaynirnoo heɓunooɓe maande kullii ngin ɓen, sujjani nandolla maggii on. Ɓe ɗiɗoo non ɓe bugaa ka weendu yiite ko ɓe wurɓe, ɗun ko ka mbollan yiite.
Ko fii no windii kadi: «Si gaɲo maa no weelaa, okkor mo, o ɲaama, si himo ɗonɗaa, okkor mo, o yara. Ko fii warrugol non, haray no wa'i wa si ko ƴulɓe yiite mooɓuɗaa ka hoore makko.»

Yo kongol Almasiihu on hebbin ɓerɗe mon ɗen. Jannindiree, hajondiron e dow faamu fow e nder ko beytiranton Alla beyti Zabuura e jaarooje e beyti hormorɗi, yettiron Alla beytirangol mo ɓerɗe mon ɗen fow.
Onon kadi worɓe, mo kala e mon yo yiɗu ɓeyngu mun, hara on hunƴanaali ɓe.
Si debbo gomɗinɗo no mari keynguuɓe ka mun, yo o wallito ɓe, hara hinaa moftal ngal fawtii ɓe, fii no moftal ngal waawira wallitorde keynguuɓe ɓe alaa ballo ɓen.
Awa e hino nden seeditoore: Alla okkii en ngurndan poomayankejan, ɗan ngurndan non no e Ɓiɗɗo makko on.
Kala humondirɗo e Ɓiɗɗo on no mari ngurndan ɗan. Kala mo humondiraa e Ɓiɗɗo Alla on haray alaa ɗan ngurndan.
Ko ɗun waɗi si Ɓiɗɗo on non rinɗinii on, haray on wonii rimɓe tigi.
Awa kadi miɗo torii on wota maayu ɓernde heɓu on sabu ko mi woni tampude fii mon kon, ko ɗun woni darja mon.
Ko fii sifa ɓen yimɓe kurkantaako Almasiihu on, on Joomi men, kono ko deedi maɓɓe ɗin tun ɓe kurkantoo. Ɓe faljinira ɓerɗe ɓen ɓe bonnaa, konguɗi maɓɓe welɗi e waccooje.
Ko ɓe heewuɓe nooneeji ɗi feewaa e bonkiiji e miile e bone e nawliigu e warugol e yeddondiral e kippugu e hunƴeendi e baddi.
Jogitoɗaa kaliifu moƴƴo mo hendorɗaa Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, ɗun ko Wonɗo e men on.
Mo sankii mbeleeɗe ɓandu wa'ay e mayru halakuyee, kono on sankuɗo faale Ruuhu on, o wa'ay e makko ngurndan poomayankejan.
Wota en ndarndo Almasiihu on, wano woɓɓe e maɓɓe ndarndornoo non, ɓen ɓe bolle mulunoo.
Ngol waasaa needi, ngol ɗaɓɓataa nafa maggol, ngol yaawataa seytinde, ngol marataa bone.
Tawi hiwitorɗi ɓerɗe majji on no wa'i wa beɗi njandi, e hitooji gabitanji majji on kadi no nandita e hito giri-giriije ɗe pucci ɗuuɗuɗi pooɗata, no dogana hare.
Si tawno mi araali, maa mi wowlanaano ɓe, harayno ɓe felnaaki. Kono jooni non ɓe alaa lamitorgal fii junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin.
E telen-ma ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, wondiree faamu, hara on accaali fajuhun woo feƴƴira on.
Ko fii hiɗen andi ngurndan men kiɗɗan ɗan fempidaama e makko, fii no ndun ɓandu junuubankeeru muliree, fii wota en laato hande kadi maccuɓe junuubu.
Awa e hino ko ɓangini hakkunde fayɓe Alla ɓen e fayɓe Ibuliisa ɓen: kala on mo waɗataa ko feewi, haray hinaa mo Alla, ko wano non kadi on mo yiɗaa musiɗɗo mun.
Ko fii mbeleeɗe ɓandu no aɲi Alla, ɓay ɓandu ndun yankinantaako Sariya Alla on, ko ɓay non ndu waawataa!
Ko ɗun waɗi si ɓernde an nden no heewi weltaare, ɗenngal an ngal no e nder welo-welo, hay ɓandu an ndun fowtoto e nder tanƴinaare.
Kono kon ko rewooɓe sanamuuji ɓen woni sakkaade, ko jinnaaji ɗin ɓe woni sakkanaade, hinaa Alla. E hin-le mi faalaaka yo on humondir e jinnaaji ɗin.

Tawi haalooɓe ko Alla longini ɗun e jannooɓe no e nder moftal wongal ngal Antiyoosi-Sirii, ɓen-le ko Barnabaasi e Sim'uunu jammaaɗo Ɓaleejo, e Lukiyuusi, oo mo Sirenii, e Saawulu e Manayiina, ɗun ko oo ne'idaaɗo e Heroodu lanɗo diiwal ngal.
Awa wota hay gooto ɗaynir on haalaaji mehi, ɓay ko fii ɗun tikkere Alla nden ardata e hoore murtuɓe ɓen.
Awa yo kundule maɓɓe ɗen ombe, ko fii hiɓe jiiɓa ɓeynguureeji goo fow jannirgol ɓe ko haanaaka janneede fii heɓirgol angal nunɗal.
Ko fii hari himo andi janfotooɗo mo on. Ko ɗun waɗi si o wi'i: ‹Hinaa on fow woni laaɓuɓe.›
«Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, on mo ƴawi nokku goo, naati ka kula baali, hara hinaa ka dambugal o rewri, haray on neɗɗo ko ngujjo, jattoowo.
ɓay ɓe accitii laawol feewungol ngol, ɓe majjirii sabu jokkugol laawol Bal'ama ngol, on ɓiɗɗo Be'uura, yiɗunooɗo njoddi heɓorndi bonki.

O wi'i mo kadi tammun: «Sim'uunu mo Yuunusa, e hara hiɗa yiɗi lan?» Ɗun aanini Petruusu fii ko o wi'i mo kon tammun si himo yiɗi mo. O jaabii mo, o wi'i: «Joomi an, hiɗa andi kala huunde. Hiɗa andi miɗo yiɗu-maa.» Iisaa wi'i mo kadi: «Awa danko baali an ɗin.
Hay fus e ko tuuni e hay gooto waɗoowo ko ɲiddi maa fenaande naatataa ɗon. Ko naatata ɗon woo ko ɓe inɗe mun windii ɓen ka nder deftere ngurndan Baalun kun.
Tawi on debbo no ɓornii conci boɗeeji e firsinaaɗi, himo cuɗori kaŋŋe e kaaƴe hittuɗe e koɗe hittuɗe. Tawi himo jogii feletere kaŋŋe heewunde ko ɲiddinaa e tuuɗe jinaa makko on.
Kono, e hoore ɗunɗoo fow, ɓornee giggol, sabu ko ngol yuɓɓindirta haa timma.
Onsay Iisaa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: «Saa'i mo Ɓii-Aaden on mawnintee e mun on hewtii.
An, oo wonɗo wi'ude wota jeene, hinaa hiɗa jeenude? An, oo aɲuɗo sanamu, hinaa hiɗa wujjude ɗi, huutoraa?
Onsay junuubu on ɓaarori yamiroore nden, o waɗi e an kala noone himme. Ko fii, si Sariya on araano, hanno junuubu on ko mayɗo.
Mi jattinoyte e hakkunde oo jamaa Yahuudiyanke, e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, ɓe mi imminoyay maa haa e mun, kamɓe ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen,
Ko fii hari enen kadi ko en faaɗa-hakkilɓe, ɓe ɗoftotaako, ɗaynaaɓe, maccuɓe kala himmeeji e mbeleeɗe neɗɗanke, wuuruɓe e nder hunƴeendi e nawliigu, aɲaaɓe, e aɲindirɓe.
E yeeso Alla e Iisaa Almasiihu on e malaa'ikaaɓe suɓaaɓe ɓen, mi yamirii ma jokkugol ɗee yamirooje e ɓaawo ɓurdindingol maa giɗaale.
Awa wota on accitu hoolaare mon addaynde mbarjaari mawndi nden.
Awa halfinaaɓe ɓen non no toraa wonugol sella-findeeɓe.
Kanko Petruusu o weeri Jaffaa ɗon seeɗa ka garankeejo no wi'ee Sim'uunu.
E on andaa ko onon woni suudu Alla ndun, awa kadi Ruuhu Allaahu on no hoɗi e mon?
Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an, ɓay hiɗen mari hoolaare fii naatugol ka nokkuure hormorde mawnde sabu oo sadaka ƴiiƴan Iisaa
Iisaa wi'i ɓe fahin: «Mi yahay, kono on ɗaɓɓitay lan, maayon e nder junuubu. Onon on waawataa hewtoyde ka min mi yahata ton.»
Ɓay ko on suɓaaɓe Alla, laaɓuɓe, e yiɗaaɓe makko, ɓornee yurmeende tiiɗunde e moƴƴuki e yankinaare e newaare e yondinaare.
Awa kala on kurkantooɗo lan yo jokkan, ko fii ko ka mi woni ɗon, ko ɗon kurkaadu an ndun wonata. Kala non on kurkaniiɗo lan, Baabaajo on teddinay mo.
hara ko ardotooɗo moƴƴa ɓeynguure mun nden tigi, e ne'uɗo fayɓe mun ɓen, hara hiɓe yankinanii mo e nder teddungal timmungal.
Awa, wakkilindiree, tiiɗindiron, wano wonɗon warrude non fewndo ɗoo.
E hino kibaaru mo nanuɗon on gila ka fuɗɗoode: yiɗindiren.
E hino ko mi miijii no moƴƴi kon, sabu satteendeeji fewndiiɗi ɗin: no moƴƴani neɗɗo ka o wonira no o woniri non.
Tawi no e hakkunde fedde Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen hooreejo Yahuudiyankeeɓe no wi'ee Nikodiyuusu.
Enee, oo cagaajo wi'eteeɗo Raabi, kanko kadi, taw si hinaa sabu kuuɗe ɗen o jogoranoo feewuɗo fewndo ko o wernunoo nulanooɓe fii tefugol ɓen, o holli ɓe laawol goo ngol ɓe rewa?
Kono fow e mun, debbo dandirte jiidi mun ndin si o duumike e nder gomɗinal ngal e giggol e laaɓal no haaniri.
Alla oo jamaa Isra'iilayankeeɓe suɓike baabiraaɓe men ɓen, on Yaɲɲuɗo kadi oo jamaa fewndo ko ɓe woni tuŋarankeeɓe e nder ndii leydi Misira, o yaltiniri ɓe ton kadi sookewo makko dolnungo ngon.
Alla, on Anduɗo ko woni e ɓerɗe, o seeditoranike ɓe yeɗugol ɓe Ruuhu Seniiɗo on wano men non.
Ko fii on Wi'uɗo: «wota mo jeena», no wi'i kadi: «wota mo itta hoore.» E hin-le si on waɗaali jinaa, kono on ittii hoore, haray on wonii bonnuɗo Sariya on.
Mi yeɗay ɗi ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan, hara ɗi mulataa han kadi, awa kadi hay gooto ittataa ɗi e juuɗe an.
Alla Jom ɓuttu on muncay Ibuliisa ka ley koyɗe mon ko neeɓaa. Yo moƴƴere Iisaa Joomi men on wonu e mon.
Hara hiɓe ɓangini e kene dewal ngal, kono hara hiɓe yeddi ko ngal wondi e bawgal kon. Awa pottito ɓen yimɓe ɗon.
ɗun non, fii kala hiɗen ɗuuɗi, en fow ko en ɓandu wooturu e nder humondiral e Almasiihu on, en fow ko en tere jogondirɗe.
Koo ko mi wi'i ɗoo ko haqiiqa. Miɗo faalaa yo a cato e ɗii piiji, fii no gomɗinɓe Alla ɓen fewtinira ɓerɗe mun ɗen e waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe ɗen. Ko ɗun woni ko moƴƴi kon e ko nafata yimɓe ɓen kon.
Ko non ko bindi ɗin wi'i kon laatori: «Ibraahiima gomɗini Alla, ngal gomɗinal makko jogoranaa mo peewal», haa o noddaa giɗo Alla.
Musiɓɓe an, ɓay ko on gomɗinɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men mo darja wonani on, reenee e ɓurdindingol yimɓe.
Kononɗi maɓɓe ɗin ko genaale udditiiɗe, hiɓe huutora ɗenɗe maɓɓe ɗen fii janfagol, tuutaaɗe toni maɓɓe ɗin ko tooke mboddi.
Wano non kadi, duhiiɓe ɓen haani yiɗirde sonnaaɓe mun ɓen wa ɓalli maɓɓe ɗin tigi. Kala on yiɗuɗo sonnaajo mun on, haray no yiɗitii kaɲun tigi.
Ko honɗun non wi'eten jooni? Ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, ɓe ɗaɓɓataano peewal ngal ɓen, ɓe heɓii peewal, ngal peewal iwrungal e gomɗinal ngal.
Hiɓe haani humaade e goonga lugguɗo gomɗinal ngal e nder ɓernde laaɓunde.

Ɓen jiyaaɓe, ɓe tawata jeyɓe ɗun ɓen ko gomɗinɓe, ɓe haanaa ka ɓe ronka ɓe teddinde, ɓay ɓen ko musiɓɓe maɓɓe. Kono hiɓe haani ɓurtude kurkanaade ɓe, ko fii ɓen wonɓe nafitorde golle maɓɓe ɗen, ko yiɓɓe maɓɓe gomɗinɓe. Ko ɗun haanuɗaa jannude waajoo.
E ko honɗun si woɓɓe e maɓɓe wonaali sella-findeeɓe? E hara ngal angal sella-findeyaagal maɓɓe ɗuytay goɗɗun e sella-findeyaagal Alla ngal?
Kono goɗɗo e suufaaɓe ɓen tufiri mo conkenwal ka beccal, tun ndiyan e ƴiiƴan yalti.
E hino yamiroore nde mi yamiri on nden: Yiɗindiree wano mi yiɗiri on non.
Wota on weeɓitan tere mon ɗen junuubu, wa aala fii angal peewal, kono wattee hoore mon onon tigi e Alla, wa wuuruɓe iwɓe e mayde, sakkanoɗon Alla tere mon ɗen wa aalaaji fii peewal ngal.
Enen-le hinaa en yiltorooɓe ɓaawo fii hayrugol, kono ko en gomɗinɓe fii dandegol.
Ontuma non Isra'iilayanko fow wonay dandaaɓe, wano windori non: «Jattinoowo on iwray Siyuuna, o pottina e bolondaa Yaaquuba on kala ko yaadaa e faale Alla on.
Ko ɓen wari Iisaa Joomi on, wari annabaaɓe ɓen, cukkii men, ɗun ko ɓen ɓe welataa Alla, wonɓe ayɓe yimɓe ɓen fow.
Ko fii si en duumike waɗugol junuubu e nder tewaare ɓawto en hendaade gandal goonga on, haray sadaka alaa hande kadi fii junuubaaji,
O immintinidii en e Iisaa Almasiihu on, o joɗɗindinii en e makko ka kammuuli,
Ko ɗun waɗi ko yo on seedu e fenaande, mo kala e mon yo wowlan ɗimmo mun on goonga, ko fii ko en tere ɗe ɓandu wooturu.
Kono men jaɓanaano ɓe ɗun hay nde wootere, men yankinanaaki ɓe kadi, fii no goonga wonɗo e nder Kibaaru Moƴƴo on tabitira e mon.
Ko ɗun waɗi, on wonɗo yewtude e haala janana longinaaka, yo toro fii no waawira nantinirde.
Kono tawi Saawulu kaɲun no waɗi ka wonkii mun kambirangol taalibaaɓe Joomi on mayde. Kanko Saawulu o yahi ka yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on,
«Jooni non miɗo yahude ka maa. Ko mi yewtiri ɗun ka aduna ɗoo, ko fii no weltaare an nden timmira e maɓɓe.
Kono weltoree tawdeede e tampereeji Almasiihu on ɗin, fii no heɓiroyon kadi weltaare ɲande feeɲugol mangu makko ngun.
Ɓay mi ndaarii ɗun, mi tenƴinii, mi yi'i ton kulle yaarayɗe koyɗe nay ɗen ka hoore leydi e kulle buruure ɗen e kulle daasotooɗe ɗen e colli wiirooji ɗin.
Kono jooni non, onon kadi bugitee ɗun fow: ɗun ko tikkere nden e monee on e hunƴeendi ndin e hoyre nden e haalaaji bonɗi yaltaynooɗi e kundule mon ɗin.
ɓay tawii ko mecce goote ɓe mari, o weeri ka maɓɓe, ɓe woni e gollidugol. Tawi ko wonnoo mecce maɓɓe ko moƴƴingol cuuɗi bagi.
Awa, wota junuubu laamo ɓalli mon maayayɗi ɗin, e wota on ɗofto himmeeji majji ɗin.
Men torike ɓen yimɓe, men jeejirii ɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, yo ɓe gollu e nder ɓuttu, ɓe ɲaama ko ɓe to'ani hoore maɓɓe kon.
«Ɓen maamiraaɓe men nawli Yuusufu, ɓe yeeyi mo fii naɓegol Misira.
Goɗɗo e ɓen no wi'ee Agabuusi, on immii hiitii tippude e Ruuhu Allaahu on, o wi'i wonde heege moolanaange waɗay e aduna on fow. (Ɗun waɗi-le e fewndo laamu Kuloodiyuusu.)
Ɓay o gaynii yewtude ɗun, onsay o jiccii fii du'ondirgol e maɓɓe ɓe fow.
Wonɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓen fempii ɓandu mun ndun wondude e himmeeji mun e faaleeji mun.
Ko onon yo musiɓɓe, si on rewrii e kala noone ndarndanɗe, haray jogitoree ɗun weltaare fow,
Si en innii hiɗen humondiri e makko, kono hiɗen yahude e nder niwre nden, haray en fenii, en wuuriraali goonga on.
o yi'i kammu ngun no udditii, o haynii huunde nanditaynde e sollewol fontiingol njanol jogaangol e coɓɓi ɗin nay no tippoo waaloo ka hoore leydi.
Ɗun ko enen ɓee Fartiyankooɓe e Maadiyankooɓe e Elaamiyankooɓe e ɓee hoɗuɓe Mesopotamii e ka diiwal Yahuuda e ɓe Kapadoosi ɓen e ɓe Pontii ɓen e ɓe Aazii ɓen,
fii no wuuriron noone no hawrirani Joomiraaɗo on, e no welira mo e kala noone, ngurnɗan mon ɗan rima kala noone kuuɗe moƴƴe, ɓeydoɗon e andugol Alla,
Ndee yamiroore nde mi yamir-maa, yo Timotee ɓiɗɗo an, wano hiitoraa fii maa non, ko yo a tippir tippiro moƴƴo ngon
Ɓawto ɗun, mi nani hawa tiiɗuka immorde e jamaa ɗuuɗuɗo ka kammu, no wi'a: «Mantoore wonanii Alla! Kisiyee e mangu e bawgal ko Alla men on wonani!
Onon non hari on maayii sabu bonnereeji mon ɗin e junuubaaji mon ɗin,
On waawataa yarirde jardukun Joomi on, yariron kadi jardukun jinnaaji ɗin. On waawataa heɓude ka ɲaametee Joomi on, heɓon kadi ka ɲaametee jinnaaji ɗin.
Wota jinaa e kala noone angal laaɓal maa himme maandine toode e hakkunde mon, ɓay ɗii piiji haananaa yimɓe Alla ɓen.
Laaɓuɓe ɓen kan, ko woni woo no laaɓani ɗun, kono yimɓe tuunuɓe ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, hay huunde laaɓanaa ɗun, ko fii hakkillaaji maɓɓe ɗin e ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen no tuuninaa.

Nanunooɓe ɗun ɓen fow ŋalɗi fota, ɓe wi'i: «Hinaa oo giddanaynoo mulugol ɓen jantotooɓe ndee innde Yerusalaam? Hinaa ko addunoo mo kadi ko fii nangugol ɓen wonnooɓe jantaade nde, naɓa ɓe yeeso hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen?»
Kono jooni, Almasiihu on heɓii golle ɓurɗe mawnude ɗe ɓeya ɗen, no o woniri non holnuɗo ahadi ɓurndi moƴƴude ndin, sincaandi e fodaariiji ɓurɗi kelɗude ɗin.
Ko fii min, ko Almasiihu on woni ngurndan an ɗan, mayde nden ko tono e an.
Miɗo felliti, Alla, on Fuɗɗiiɗo kuugal moƴƴal e mon, jokkay timmingol ɗun haa ɲande ardu Iisaa Almasiihu on.

Hiɗen andi kadi Ɓiɗɗo Alla on arii, o okkii en faamu fii andugol Goongaajo on. Hiɗen humondiri-le e Goongaajo on, ɓay hiɗen humondiri e Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu. Ko on woni Alla Goongaajo on e ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan.
Si tawii no gasa, yeru hiɗon waawi, wondee e yimɓe ɓen fow e nder ɓuttu.
Wonen catiiɓe tabiti e tama'u mo qirritiɗen on, ko fii Waɗanɗo en ɗin fodaariiji on ko Sella-findeejo.
Miɗo accande on ɓuttu, ko ɓuttu an ngun mi woni on okkude. Mi alaa on non okkirde wano aduna on okkirta non. Wota ɓerɗe mon ɗen jiɓo, wota ɗe hulu kadi.
Awa hiɗen heewi soono woo wakkilaare. Hiɗen andi kadi fodde hiɗen wondi e nduu ɓandu, haray hiɗen woɗɗondiri e Joomiraaɗo on.
Kala nanuɗo konguɗi an ɗin kadi, ronki ɗi huutorde, hinaa min ɲaawoyta mo. Ko fii mi ariraali fii ɲaawugol aduna on, kono ko fii dandugol aduna on.
Wota en wa'u wa Qaayiina, on mo Ibuliisa, warunooɗo miɲɲiraawo mun on. E ko fii honɗun o warannoo mo? Ko tawde kuuɗe makko ɗen kanko Qaayiina ko bonɗe, ɗe miɲɲiraawo makko on ɗen kan ko feewuɗe.
Suriije ɗen fow dogi, pelle ɗen kadi ronkaa yiiteede.
Ko ɗun waɗi si neɗɗo gooto, mo tawata mayde mun nden heɓiino ɗun, heɓi jurriya ɓurɗo koode ɗen ka kammu ɗuuɗude e njaareendi ndin ka sera baharu, ko tawata en waawataa limude.
Teddungal e mangu wonanii Lanɗo poomayankeejo, mo maayataa, mo yi'otaako, Alla bajjo, haa poomaa. Aamiina!
Tawi on malaa'ikaajo no wowla hawa tiiɗuka, wi'a: «Hulee Alla, mawninon mo, ko fii saa'i mo o ɲaawata e mun on hewtii. Awa sujjanee on Taguɗo kammu ngun e leydi ndin e baharu on e ɓulli ndiyan ɗin!»

Nde tawnoo taalibaaɓe ɓen no ɓeydaade tun e ɗen balɗe ɗon, Yahuudiyankeeɓe wowlooɓe haala Gereeki wonɓe hakkunde maɓɓe ɓen woni e ŋurŋurtugol ɓeya Yahuudiyankeeɓe, sabu ko ɓe welsindii waɗangol keynguuɓe maɓɓe ɓen ko ɓen handi ɲande woo kon.
Awa, ko fii ɗun noddiraɗon, ko fii Almasiihu on kadi tampii fii mon, o accanii on misal, fii no jokkiron batteeji makko ɗin,
E hoore ɗun, fewndo ko men wonnoo ka mon, men waɗanno on ndee yamiroore ɗoo: kala on saliiɗo gollude, wota ɲaamu kadi!
«Ko fii hakkee ko Alla yiɗi aduna on, o yeɗii mo Ɓiɗɗo makko bajjo on, fii kala gomɗinɗo mo wota halko, kono yo ontigi heɓu ngurndan poomayankejan.
Ngin jinnawii jaabii ɓe, wi'i: «Miɗo andi Iisaa, miɗo andi kadi ko hombo woni Puulusa, kono onon ko on homɓe?»
Onsay mi yi'i kullii ngin e lamɓe aduna ɓen e koneeli mun ɗin no mottondiri fii haɓugol waɗɗiiɗo puccu ranewu ngun e konu mun ngun.
Men bakii ɗon e laana iwruka Adiramiyuuna rewoyayka Aazii. Men yahi, tawi meɗen wondi e Masedoniyankoojo wi'eteeɗo Aristarke mo Tesalonii.
Anditee fii kasooɓe ɓen, wa si tawii hiɗon sokidaa e maɓɓe, e wonaaɓe e tampineede ɓen, wa si tawii ko onon wonaa tampineede.
Kala ko waɗoton, e kongol maa e kuugal, waɗee fow e innde Iisaa Joomi on, e jarnirgol mo Alla Baabaajo on.
Yo on wonaaɗo janneede daaluyee on sendodu kala piiji moƴƴi e wonɗo mo jannude on.

E hoore ɗun o yeɗaali mo ndondi woo e ndii leydi, hay non yeru ka o tippa koyngal. Kono o fodi mo okkugol mo ndi, ndi wona halal makko kanko e jurriya makko aroyoowo ɓaawo makko on. Wa fewndo ko Alla daalani mo ɗun, hari o maraa ɓiɗɗo.
On lanɗo ɗayni leɲol men ngol, o tampini maamiraaɓe men ɓen haa o hawkini ɓe ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ɓen fii wota ɓen wuuru.
Onsay Petruusu e oya taalibaajo yalti, yaari ka yenaande.
Ko ɗun waɗi si min kadi mi etoto fii heɓugol ɓernde nde aldaa e feloore yeeso Alla e yeeso yimɓe ɓen.

Ko wano morlooɗe ndiyan ɲaaɗuɗe bugitortoo ngufo ka sera baharu, tuunina mo non, ko wano non kamɓe kadi ɓe tuuninirta woɓɓe goo kuuɗe maɓɓe hersiniiɗe. Hiɓe wa'i wa koode yiilotooɗe, ɓe niwre niɓe maranaa haa poomaa.
Ko fii min mi heɓiraali mo neɗɗanke, awa kadi wonaa neɗɗo jannimmi mo, kono ko Iisaa Almasiihu on tigi feɲɲinanimmi mo.
Ko fii, fewndo jokkunoɗen mbeleeɗe ɓandu men ndun, hari faaleeji bonɗi yaaduɗi e junuubu immorde e Sariya on no ardotonoo tere men ɗen, fawa en kadi kuuɗe nawrayɗe e mayde.
Ko fii feɲɲingol on seedee waɗi si mi waɗiraa waajotooɗo e yottinoowo, (mi wowlay goonga, mi fenataa), fii ko janna ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen ko woni gomɗinal goongawal ngal kon.
Kala on ɗoftiiɗo yamirooje makko ɗen, haray no humondiri e Alla, Alla kadi no humondiri e makko. Awa kadi e hino no andirten wonde himo humondiri e men: ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo mo o yeɗi en on andirɗen ɗun.
Wota gooto ɗaɓɓu nafa mun on, kono yo ɗaɓɓu fii heddiiɓe ɓen.
Miijondiranee miijo wooto, wota on mawnintino, kono jaɓon jippinde hoore mon. Wota on waɗu hoore mon faamuɓe.
Yo kala metteeɗe e tikkere e monee e sonko e hoyre e kala bonki iwu hakkunde mon.
Ko ngal moftal mi wonani kurkaadu, wano Alla nelirimmi non fii feɲɲinangol on daaluyee makko on e ko woni e mun kon fow,
tawi hoore makko nden no rawniri wa leeɓi baalii maa wa cuddi, gite makko ɗen no wa'ita wa joyngol yiite,
Ko fii, ɗun fow ko woni ardude ko fii mon, fii yo sulfu on ɓurtu hewtude yimɓe ɗuuɗuɓe, fii no yettooje ɗen ka mangu Alla laatora ɗuuɗuɗe.
Ko fii kala ɲaamuɗo teewu an ngun, yari ƴiiƴan an ɗan, haray o humondirii e an, min kadi mi humondirii e makko.
Mariyatu wi'i mo: «Eyyo, yaa an Koohoojo, miɗo gomɗini ko an woni Almasiihu on, Ɓiɗɗo Alla, haanuɗo arude ka aduna on.»
Onsay ɓe duumii e janndeeji ɓen sahaabaaɓe, e mottondirgol fii jokkere enɗan e ɲaamidugol e toragol Alla.
A yiɗii peewal ngal, a aɲii angal peewal ngal. Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla Joomiraaɗo maa on toɗɗor maa nebban weltaare ɓuri wondiɓɓe maa ɓen.»
O wariri Yaaquuba kaafa, ɗun ko oo kotiraawo Yuuhanna.
Reenoɗaa e haalaaji mehi ɗi yaadaa e faale Alla on, ko fii jokkuɓe ɗi ɓen ɓurtay tun woɗɗitaade Alla.
Kala on aɲuɗo musiɗɗo mun, haray ko waroowo. Hiɗon andi-le kala waroowo, haray ngurndan poomayankejan alaa e makko.

Ɓay ɓe gaynii ɲaamude, Iisaa wi'i Sim'uunu Petruusu: «Ko an yo Sim'uunu mo Yuunusa, e hara hiɗa yiɗi lan ɓuri ɓee ɗoo?» O jaabii mo, o wi'i: «Hiiyii Joomi an, hiɗa andi miɗo yiɗu-maa.» Onsay Iisaa wi'i mo: «Awa danko baaloy an koy.»
Ko ɗun waɗi, Ruuhu on yeɗay goɗɗo on kongol faamu, on Ruuhu gooto yeɗa oya on kongol gandal,
Ka laawol ɗimmol, Yuusufu andintinii ben-gootooɓe mun ɓen, ko onsay Fir'awna andi iwdi Yuusufu ndin.
Ko fii: «Si tawii goɗɗo no faalaa wuurude ngurndan welɗan, e yi'ugol ɲalaaɗe hettaare, haray yo ontigi reenu ɗenngal mun ngal e wowlugol ko boni, o reena toni makko ɗin e janfagol.
Gomɗinɓe ɓen fow wonti ɓernde wootere e miijo wooto, tawi hay gooto e maɓɓe wi'ataa ko jeyi kon ko halal mun, tawi ko ɓe kafu e fow.
Ko adii kon, ko ko mi hendii kon mi feɲɲinani on: Almasiihu on ko fii junuubaaji men ɗin maayiri, wano windori non ka defte annabaaɓe ɓen,
Awa kadi ko e maa ƴiiƴan annabaaɓe ɓen e gomɗinɓe ɓen e kala waraaɗo ka hoore leydi hibbaa.»
Ɓay ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen nanii ɗun, ɓe weltii, ɓe manti daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on, tawnooɓe no muuyanaa ngurndan poomayankejan ɗan ɓen fow gomɗini.
On Seediiɗo ɗun fow wi'i: «Ko goonga, miɗo ara ko ɓooyaa.» Aamiina! Aree, yo Joomi amen Iisaa!
Awa, ko andirɗon mi kon, e ko heɓirɗon mi kon, e ko nanuɗon miɗo wowla kon, e ko yi'uɗon miɗo waɗa kon, waɗee ɗun. Ɗun, Alla Jom ɓuttu on wonday e mon.
Wota on jogor mo non wa gaɲo, kono hajoree mo wa musiɗɗo mon.
Reenee, wota hay gooto e mon hiile, nangiree faamu neɗɗanke e ɗayni meereeji immorde e aadaaji neɗɗanke e mbawdiiji adunayankeeji, ɗi tawata wonaa e Almasiihu on iwri.
Miɗo dogande timmoode nden, fii no mi heɓira njoddi ndi Alla noddiri en fii mun ka kammu ndin rewrude e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
O okkitirii hoore makko kanko tigi fii men, fii sottugol en e kala ko boni, fii laɓɓinangol hoore makko jamaa suɓaaɗo, himmanɗo waɗugol kuuɗe moƴƴe.

«Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, kala on heɗiiɗo kongol an ngol, gomɗini Nuluɗo lan on, haray on no e ngurndan poomayankejan. Awa kadi o aretaake e ɲaaweede, ko fii haray o iwii e mayde, o arii e ngurndan.
Tawi on wonnooɗo lan yewtude no joginoo sawru kaŋŋe fii ko o eɓɓira ittiri saare nden e dambuɗe mayre ɗen, wondude e tata mayre on.
Sakkitoode maɓɓe nden ko halkagol, ko deedi maɓɓe ɗin woni alla maɓɓe on, hiɓe waɗi darja maɓɓe on ka hersinta ɓe, awa kadi ko fii piiji oo aduna tun ɓe miijotoo.
Yo taw wonaa gomɗinɗo kesun, fii wota o heewu townitaare, haa o yana e ɲaawoore nde Ibuliisa ɲaawaa nden.

Yiɓɓe, e nder ko mi marnoo faale tiiɗuɗo fii windangol on fii kisiyee mo hawtuɗen on, mi taw bee mi winda taho fii wakkilingol on no tippiranon gomɗinal hewtinaangal yimɓe Alla ɓen nde wootere haa poomaa.
Ko fii hari ɓe haaɓii ko ɓen woni waajaade jamaa on kon e ko ɓen woni ɓanginde kon wonde ko e Iisaa ummutal mayɓe ɓen woni.
Ko fii junuubaaji mayre ɗin dewnondirii haa ka kammu, awa kadi Alla anditii angal peewal mayre on.
O yiltitii kadi Kanaa, ɗun ko e nder Jaliilu, ka o waylunoo ndiyan ɗan njaram wiiɲu ɗon. Tawi ɓiɗɗo yeesoojo laamateeri ndin, wonɗo Kafernahuum, no nawni.
Wakkiloɗon hara on aamaali, kurkoranon Joomiraaɗo on ɓerɗe mon ɗen fow.
On yiɗii mo kanko Iisaa e hoore on yi'aali mo, on hoolike mo kadi e ɓaawo yi'ugol mo. E hoore ɗun, hiɗon hebbinori weltaare tiiɗunde, nde wonkii woo waawataa sifaade fii mun,
E hino no andirten hiɗen humondiri e makko, kanko kadi himo humondiri e men: ko sabu Ruuhu makko mo o yeɗi en on.
Tawi loonde tew njaram lammuɗan no ɗon. Ɓe waɗi linsere e salndu leggal no wi'ee hisoopu, ɓe yolli nde ka ndiyan, ɓe ɓanni ka hunduko makko.
on Jattinɗo en mbawdi niɓe ɗen, o addii en ka laamateeri Ɓiɗɗo makko yiɗaaɗo on,
Mi wakkilinii on, yo musiɓɓe an, e reenagol ko wonata sabu sendondire e pegge ko luutondiri e jannde nde hendiɗon nden. Woɗɗitee ɓen wonayɓe sabu ɗun.
Si ko dokkal fii wallugol, yo o wallu, si ko dokkal jannugol, yo o jannu.
E nden ɲalaande, on landotaako lan fii hay huunde hande kadi, ko fii, ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, Baabaajo on okkay on kala ko toriɗon e innde an.
Tawi didoodiiji tata nden saare no fotiniraa kala noone kaaƴe hittuɗe. Didoodi araniri ndin ko yasbe, ɗimmiri ndin ko saafira, tammiri ndin ko kalseduwan, nayaɓiri ndin ko zumuruudu,
Si goɗɗo no andi moƴƴere nde o haani waɗude, o waɗaali ɗun, haray o waɗii junuubu.
Hawa kadi yalti ka jullere laamu no wi'a: «Ko onon yo jiyaaɓe makko, hulooɓe mo, fanɗuɓe e njanɗuɓe, on fow mantee Alla men on!»
Awa kadi e nder ɗin togooji, hiɗen woytaade fii faale ɓornagol wonunde kammuyankeere nden,
Mo kala yo tasko kuuɗe mun ɗen tigi, o yi'anay hoore makko hara hinaa e ɓeya, ɗun o anday no o mantora,
On mo no tanƴinii ko lo'uɗo e fee jiwo mo o ƴami, feƴƴuɗo duuɓi kellefuyee, o tawi ƴettindirgol e makko no moƴƴi, yo o waɗu ko o faalaa kon, haray o waɗaali junuubu si ɓe resindirii.
Ko fii ɓe yaltinoyay on ka juulirɗe, hay saa'i kadi aroyay nde tawata kala warɗo on sikkay o waɗii ko Alla yiɗi.

Onsay mi yi'i maande moolanaande ŋalɗinnde goo kadi ka kammu, nden-le ko malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo jogiiɓe albala'uuji ɗin jeeɗiɗi. Ko ɗin albala'uuji woni sakkitori ɗin, ko fii ko kanji woni timmoode tikkere Alla nden.
Iisaa jaabii, wi'i: «Si mi wowlii ko boni, hollu ko honɗun e ko boni. Si tawii non ko ko moƴƴi mi wowli, haray ko honɗun piyirtaa mi?»

An men, yo mo mi gollidata, sella-findeejo, mi torike ma wallitagol ɓee rewɓe walluɓe lan tippirde fii yottingol Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, wondude e Akilimandu e ɓeya ɓe mi gollidata fow, ɓe tawata inɗe mun no windii ka deftere ngurndan.
Ko fii ɓe hibbiino ƴiiƴan yimɓe Alla ɓen wondude e ƴiiƴan annabaaɓe ɓen, awa jooni a yeɗii ɓe ƴiiƴan ko ɓe yara, hiɓe foddi e ɗun!»
Pellet hinaa non! Enen, ɓee mayɓe e telen-ma junuubu, ko honno non wuurirten e nder junuubu kadi?
Kullii woodanoongii, ngii woodaaka jooni ngin, kangii tigi ko ngii lanɗo njeetataɓo, ko ngii goɗɗo kadi e njeeɗiɗooɓe ɓen, hingii yahude ka hayrannde.
Ko honɗun bindi ɗin wi'i? Ko: «Raɗo korɗo on e ɓiɗɗo mun on, ko fii ɓiɗɗo korɗo on ronidataa e mo debbo dimo on jibini on.»
Kono ɓen faalaaɓe alɗude yanay e nder jarrabuyee, e nder pircol, e faaleeji ɗuuɗuɗi njofooji, bonnayɗi, ko yollata yimɓe ɓen e nder yeebaare e halkaare.
Galaaɗi sappo ɗi yi'uɗaa ɗin wondude e kullii ngin aɲoyay cagaajo on, ɗi ƴetta kala ko o jeyi, ɗi ɓoora mo, ɗi ɲaama ɓandu makko ndun, ɗi sunnira mo yiite.
Kono si goɗɗo yiɗii Alla, haray Alla no andi mo.
Awa, enen Yahuudiyankeeɓe, ko honɗun ɓurɗen ɓeya? Hay fus! Ko fii en ɓanginii wonde kala Yahuudiyankeejo e mo wonaa Yahuudiyanke no e nder junuubu,
E nder ɗen balɗe ɗon ɓe moƴƴini nandolla ga'un nagge, ɓe addani ndun nandollaaru sadaka, ɓe weltori kon ko ɓe moƴƴiniri juuɗe maɓɓe.

Yimɓe heddinooɓe ɓe wariraaka ɗin albala'uuji ronki tuubude kuuɗe ɗe ɓe waɗiri juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen. Ɓe accaano sujjangol jinnaaji ɗin e sanamuuji tafiraaɗi kaŋŋe e kaalisi e sila e kaaƴe e leɗɗe, ɗi waawataa yi'ude maa wowlude maa yahude.
Awa, ɓay men andii ko woni hulugol Joomiraaɗo on, meɗen ɗaɓɓude no men fellintinira yimɓe ɓen. Alla no andi ko men homɓe, awa miɗo tanƴinii onon kadi ka nder ɓerɗe mon hiɗon andi men.
En fow kadi hiɗen tawdanoo e maɓɓe, hari hiɗen jokkunoo himmeeji ɓandu, hiɗen jokkunoo faaleeji ɓandu men ndun e miijooji men ɗin, hari ko en mbaadi fayɓe handunooɓe e tikkere wa ɓeya.
Awa ko konguɗi ɗuuɗuɗi goo kadi o seeditorani ɓe, e himo waajotonoo ɓe kadi, wi'a: «Dandee hoore mon e nguu jamaanu ɓoyliingu.»
Si tawii ko mbeleeɗe ɓandu wuurirɗon, on maayay. Kono si tawii ko Ruuhu Allaahu on warirɗon mbeleeɗe ɓandu ɗen, on wuuray.
Wano bindi ɗin wi'iri non: «Kala gomɗinɗo e makko hersinoytaake.»
Miɗo jarnude taho on Alla an, immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu on, fii mon on fow, ko fii gomɗinal mon ngal ko lollungal e aduna on fow.
Meɗen andi, yo musiɓɓe ɓe Alla yiɗi, ko on suɓaaɓe,
Ko adii kon, yiɗindiree giggol tabitungol, ko fii giggol ngol no monta adadu junuubaaji ujune ujune.
Ɓay wonii aadaama men bakoto ɗon e laana ndiyan fii yahugol Italii, ɓe ƴetti Puulusa e kasooɓe goo, ɓe watti e juuɗe Yuliyuusu, ɗun ko yeesoojo dental suufaaɓe jeyaangal ka lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on.

Hiɓe beyta beytol Muusaa, on jiyaaɗo Alla, e beytol Baalun kun, hiɓe wi'a: «Yaa an Alla, Joomiraaɗo, Jom Bawgal, kuuɗe maa ɗen ko mawɗe, awa kadi ko hawniiɗe, laawi maa ɗin ko feewuɗi, goonginɗi, yo Lanɗo leƴƴi fow!
yiɗiron daaluyee on wano boobo kecco yiɗiri ɓiraaɗan kencan laaɓuɗan, fii no mawniron e nder kisiyee on sabu makko,

Mi nani kadi hawa ka kammu, no wi'a: «Windu wonde: ‹Mayɓe gila jooni no humondiri e Joomi on ɓen ko malaaɓe.› » Ruuhu Allaahu on wi'i: «Ko non woniri, ɓe fowtoto golleeji maɓɓe ɗin, ɓay kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen no jokki ɓe.»
Dewal laaɓungal, ngal aldaa e koju ngal yeeso Alla Baabaajo on, ko dankagol aliyatiimaaɓe ɓen e dankagol keynguuɓe ɓen e nder satteendeeji maɓɓe ɗin, e rentagol e tuundiiji aduna ɗin.
Ko mi wi'iri ɗun, ko fii wota hay gooto faljinir on yewtereeji welɗi.

Onsay mi nani kala ko tagaa, ko woni ka kammu e ka hoore leydi e ka nder leydi e ka baharu, e tagu ngun fow, no wi'a: «Mantoore e teddungal e mangu e bawgal yo wonan on Jooɗiiɗo ka jullere laamu, e Baalun kun, haa poomaa!»
Malaa'ikaajo ɗimmo on kadi wutti liital mun ngal. Ko nanditata e fello moolanaango huɓɓungo bugaa ka baharu. Feccere tammere baharu on wonti ƴiiƴan,
Ɓe raɗii mo haa ka ɓaawo saare, ɓe wariri mo kaaƴe. Seedeeɓe ɓen acci conci mun ɗin e ley koyɗe suka no wi'ee Saawulu.
No windii ton kadi fahin: «Onon leƴƴi ɗin fow, jarnee Joomiraaɗo on, awa kadi yo jamaaji ɗin fow mantu mo!»
Ko fii fow ko immorde e makko, tippude e makko, e fii makko. Ko kanko mangu wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
Bimbi nden ɲande, Yaayaa haccii ka Iisaa arata e makko, o ewnii, o wi'i: «E hino Baalun Alla ɓooraykun junuubi aduna on kun.
Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi waɗi si Raabi, oo debbo cagaajo, maydaano e heeferɓe ɓen, sabu ko o wernirnoo tefooɓe ɓen kon ɓuttu.
Ngujjo on kan ko aranta ko fii wujjugol, wara, hayrina. Min non ko mi arani ko fii yo baali ɗin heɓu ngurndan, hara ko ngurndan heewuɗan.
Enen, ko en jeyaaɓe ka aljanna ka Dandoowo mo habborɗen hawjere on iwata ton, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on,
Jaɓɓondiree no moƴƴiri, wano Almasiihu on jaɓɓori on non, fii mangu Alla ngun.
Ƴettu ɓen, laɓɓindinoɗaa e maɓɓe, fawtoɗaa njoddi fembagol maɓɓe ngol, ɗun fow anday goonga alaa e ko ɓe wowlanaa kon fii maa, kono an kadi hiɗa ɗoftii Sariya on.
O laatii kadi ben sunninaaɓe ɓen, hinaa non sunninaaɓe ɓen tun, kono kadi ko o ben ɓen jokkuɓe laawi gomɗinal ngal kanko ben men Ibraahiima o heɓunoo ngal wa fewndo ko o teddinanooka taho.
Ɓe waɗi urɓa hakkunde ɓen ɗiɗo, urɓa on hawri e Matiyaasa, on tawtinaa sahaabaaɓe ɓen sappoo e go'o.
«Maloore wonanii ɓen ɓe bonkiiji mun ɗin yaafaa, ɓe tawata junuubaaji mun ɗin montaama.
Ko ɓen woni leɗɗe zaytuuni ɗen ɗiɗi e joɗɗinirɗe pitilli ɗen ɗiɗi wonɗe yeeso Joomiraaɗo leydi ndin.
Woytee, yoomon, wullon. Yo jaleeɗe mon ɗen wontu yoomugol, weltaare mon nden wonta ɓiɗagol.
Awa yo giɗo an, wota a ɲembu ko boni, kono ɲembu ko moƴƴi. Kala on waɗuɗo ko moƴƴi, haray ko mo Alla, kala non on waɗuɗo ko boni, haray andaali Alla.

fewndo o hendii maande sunninegol ngol, wa ɓattatere peewal ngal o heɓiri gomɗinal ngal, fewndo ko o teddinanooka. Ko non o woniri ben kala gomɗinɗo, hay ɓe sunninanooka ɓen, fii no ɓe jogoree feewuɓe.
Ko fii kala mayɗo fuutike bawgal junuubu.
Meɗen wondi e mayde Iisaa nden saa'i kala ka ɓalli amen, fii no ngurndan Iisaa ɗan feeɲira ka ɓalli amen.
Ko fii fow ko nafa mun on woni ɗaɓɓude, hinaa nafa wonɗo e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Ko sabu gomɗinal ngal kadi, fii kala Saarata kaɲun ko mo jiidotaako, o heɓiri feere jurriyagol e nder nayeewu makko, ɓay himo hoolii wonde Alla ko hunnoowo ko o fodi kon.
Ko fii e hino faale on Nuluɗo lan: ko wota hay gooto e ɓe o yeɗimmi ɓen hayru, kono ko yo mi immintin ɓe ka ɲalaande sakkitorde.
Kono enen ko Alla gooto marɗen, on Baabaajo, on mo kala huunde iwri e mun, e on mo wonanɗen, e Joomi gooto, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo piiji ɗin fow woniri, e on mo wonirɗen.

Awa Timotee ko e hewtitude woni ka amen iwrude ka mon, o addoranii men kibaaru moƴƴo fii gomɗinal mon ngal e giggol mon ngol. O innii men, tigi-tigi on, hiɗon joganii men maande moƴƴere, awa kadi hiɗon himmani yi'ugol men, wano men himmirani yi'ugol on non.
Ɗun, nde Hooreejo Ngaynaakooɓe ɓen feeɲoyi, on hendoyto meetelol darja, ngol ŋari mun bontataa haa poomaa.
Awa oo tama'u ɗoo no okki en hoolaare tiiɗunde.
Kono ɓen jannooɓe fenaandeeɓe ko wa'uɓe wa kulle buruure ɗe alaa miijoo-miccoo, tagiraaɗe fii nangeede mulee, ko fii hiɓe hoynude ko ɓe andaa. Ɓe muliray wa kulle buruure nii,
Tawi o wiiraali ɗun wa si tawii himo aanannoo miskinɓe ɓen, kono ko ɓay hari ko o ngujjo, awa kadi ko kanko joginoo bonfo on, o ƴettayno ko waɗaa ton woo.
Awa, enen en andii, en gomɗinii giggol ngol Alla yiɗi en ngol. Alla ko giggol. Kala on wonduɗo e giggol, haray himo humondiri e Alla, Alla kadi no humondiri e makko.
Saakitinooɓe ɓen sabu ɓittineede ɓawto waregol Astefaana, ɓe yahi haa Fenisii e ka suriire Siipuru e haa Antiyoosi-Sirii. Tawi ɓe alaa ɓanginande hay gooto daaluyee on si wonaa Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.
Ko goonga, dewal ngal ko tono moolanaaɗo, si tawii en yondinorii ko jogiɗen kon.
Tawi ngin kullii no newnanaa haɓidugol e yimɓe Alla ɓen, foola ɓe. Tawi hingii okkaa bawgal e hoore bolondaaji ɗin fow e jamaaji ɗin fow e kala haala, e hoore leƴƴi ɗin fow kadi.
Ko hongal e teddungal marɗon, si on muɲɲike tampere sabu waɗugol junuubu? Kono si on muɲɲike tampere sabu waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ɗun ko huunde moƴƴere yeeso Alla.

Ko ɗun waɗi si ko kanko woni holnuɗo ahadi heyri ndin, fii yo noddaaɓe ɓen hendo ndondi poomayankeeri ndi Alla fodi ɓe ndin. Ko fii mayde makko nden wonii sadaka fii sottugol ɓe e ɗin bonnereeji waɗaaɗi ka fewndo ahadi hinndi.
Awa ko honɗun wi'eten? En duumoto e waɗugol junuubu on fii yo sulfu on ɓeydo?
Wota haalaaji bonɗi maa ɗi aldaa e faamu wowle, hay non si ko awmagol, ɗun hinaa ko haani, kono yo Alla yette.

Mi ndaari, mi tawi e hino puccu fultiingu. Waɗɗinooɗo ngu on no wi'ee Mayde, tawi jahannama no jokki mo. Ɓe jonnaa bawgal e hoore peccun nayaɓun kun ka leydi fii mulirgol yimɓe ɓen kaafa e heege e ɲabbeeli e kulle buruure ɗen ka leydi.

Awa, ko ɗun waɗi ko gomɗinal ngal fodaari ndin ronirtee, fii no laatora dokkal moƴƴere, fii no jurriya on fow hendora fodaari ndin, wonaa non jogiiɓe Sariya on tun, kono ko hay jogiiɓe gomɗinal Ibraahiima maama men ngal en fow,
Ɓay ɓen gaynii landaade lan, ɓe faalaa lan accitude, ɓay ɓe yi'aali e an huunde ko foddi e mayde.
Ko ɗun waɗi, ɗun hinaa immorde e faale neɗɗanke, maa e wakkilaare makko, kono ko immorde e Alla, on Yurmeteeɗo.
Awa wota en jokku jinaa, wano woɓɓe e maɓɓe waɗirnoo non, haa guluuje noogay e tato maayi ɲande wootere.
kono miɗo yi'ude ka tere an sariya goo, wonɗo dartaade sariya faamu an ngun, wonɗo lan e wattude maccuɗo sariya junuubu, wonɗo e tere an ɗen.
Ko ɗun waɗi, sutanoɗen jannde ƴoƴunde nden, feƴƴen jannde baggere fii Almasiihu on nden, hara en fuɗɗitaaki jannugol fii tuubugol kuuɗe nawrayɗe e mayde ɗen, e fii gomɗingol Alla,
Awa wota gooto aybin mo. Neltee mo e jam fii no o hewtira ka an. Ko fii miɗo habbodi mo e musiɓɓe ɓen.
Musiɓɓe an, ko nafa honɗun woodani neɗɗo wi'ugol himo mari gomɗinal, si o alaa ɓanginirde ɗun kuuɗe? Taw si sifa ngal gomɗinal no waawi dandude mo?
Tun, woɓɓe e hoɗuɓe Yerusalaam ɓen woni e wi'ugol: «E hara hinaa oo wonaa ɗaɓɓeede fii waregol?
Ɓawto ɗin konguɗi, o wutti e hoore maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: «Jaɓee Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
Ɓay ɓe andaali peewal iwrungal e Alla ngal, e ɓay ɓe ɗaɓɓii no ɓe tabintinira peewal maɓɓe ngal kamɓe tigi, ɓe ronki yankinanaade peewal Alla ngal.
Kala on gomɗinɗo Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, haray nden seeditoore no e makko. Kono on mo gomɗinaa Alla non, haray o waɗii mo fenoowo, ko fii haray o gomɗinaa seeditoore nde Alla seeditii fii Ɓiɗɗo mun on nden.
Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, kala on gomɗinɗo lan, kaɲun kadi waɗay kuuɗe ɗe mi waɗata ɗen, o waɗa ko ɓuri mawnude, ko fii miɗo yaarude ka Baabaajo on.
Yamiraa kadi jiyaaɓe ɓen yankinanagol jeyɓe ɓe ɓen e kala huunde, ɓe ɗaɓɓa no ɓe weltinira ɓe, ɓe reenoo e yeddondirgol e maɓɓe.
Reenee fii wota hay gooto ŋakkire moƴƴere Alla nden, wota ɗaɗol haaɗungol woo kadi funtu, wona sabu jiiɓoldu haa raaɓa buy e mon.
Bee o heɓira ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen kadi seeditoore moƴƴere, fii wota o heɓu feloore, o yana e pircol Ibuliisa.
Kono mo kala e men yeɗaama moƴƴere nden, embere dokkal ngal Almasiihu on yeɗi en ngal.
Ɗimmo on kadi hibbi feletere mun nden ka baharu, on baharu wonti ƴiiƴan wa ƴiiƴan mayɗo. Kala ko wuurunoo ka baharu maayi.
Ɗun non, hara hinaa e gite maɓɓe tun, maa wano welirta yimɓe ɓen non, kono wa kurkaaɗi Almasiihu on, waɗirooɓe faale Alla on ɓerɗe mun ɗen fow.
Waɗiron ɗun newaare e teddungal e nder ɓernde mon laaɓunde nden, fii yo wonɓe on wowlude ko boni e hoore jikku mon moƴƴo on e telen-ma Almasiihu on, heɓoy ko hersinta ɓe e fee konguɗi maɓɓe ɗin.
Ko woni faale Ben an on kon, ko kala yi'uɗo Ɓiɗɗo on, gomɗini mo, yo heɓu ngurndan poomayankejan, awa kadi mi immintina mo ka ɲalaande sakkitorde.»
Ɗon kisan malaa'ikaajo Joomiraaɗo on liɓi nawnaare e makko, sabu tawde o jonnitaali Alla mangural ngal, o yilmi, o maayi.
Mantoore wonanii Alla, Ben Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, on Baabaajo yurmeteeɗo e on Alla Jom wakkilaare fow,
Woɓɓe ɓen sortii e ɗen pehe, ukkii e haalaaji mehi,
Ko fii mi hersiraa Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ɗun ko bawgal Alla fii kisiyee wonannde kala gomɗinɗo, ko adii kon taho ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, hikki ɗon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
Fii ndelo ngon kan, hay gooto waawataa moƴƴinde ndelo goo si wonaa wongo ɗon ngon, e maanaa ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Ko heddii kon, yo mo kala e mon yiɗir sonnaajo mun on wa hoore mun, awa kadi yo sonnaajo on teddin moodi mun.
Onon, ɓe tawata maayiino sabu bonnereeji mon e sabu angal sunninegol mon, kanko Alla o wurnitidii on e Almasiihu on. O yaafanike en bonnereeji men ɗin fow.
Wota a weddito e dokkal maa ngal, ngal yeɗiranoɗaa hiitaango ngal, fewndo ko ardotooɓe moftal ngal fawi juuɗe e hoore maa.
Ɓawto ɗun, mi yi'i kammu hesu e aduna keso, ɓay hari nguya kammu hinngu e oya aduna kiɗɗo feƴƴii, tawi kadi baharu alaa.
Wonee saa'i kala weltiiɓe,
E nder ɗen balɗe ɗon, yimɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓay mayde nden, kono ɓe yi'ataa nde few. Ɓe suɓoto mayde, kono mayde nden doga ɓe woɗɗitoo.
Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay hiɗen gomɗini Iisaa maayii, awa kadi o immintinaama, hiɗen gomɗini kadi Alla artiray maayuɓe no gomɗini Iisaa ɓen wondude e makko.
Kala on qirritiiɗo wonde Iisaa ko Ɓiɗɗo Alla, haray Alla no humondiri e makko, kanko kadi himo humondiri e Alla.
haray hiɗon haani ɓortaade jikku mon feƴƴuɗo on e tagudi mon hindi ndin, ɗun ko on tuuniniroowo on himmeeji faljinooji,
Ko min woni dambugal ngal. Mo naatirii lan o dandete, o naatay, o yalta, o heɓa faggorde.
Woɓɓe ɓen wariraa kaaƴe, woɓɓe ɓen tampinaa taƴaa ɗiɗi, maa wariraa kaafa. Woɓɓe nawri ngurndan mun ɗan yaarugol hen fow, hara no ɓornii guri baali maa be'i, ɓillorɓe ɗi fow, cukkee tampinee.
Si tawii hiɗon andi ko o Feewuɗo, haray andee kala waɗuɗo ko feewi ko jibinannde makko.
Ko fii, ko nii Joomiraaɗo on yamiriri men, o daali: ‹Mi suɓike on fii yo on wonan leƴƴi ɗin ndaygu, e naɓugol kisiyee on haa ka kattudi leyɗe.› »
Men sali kala ko suuɗii hersinii, men wuurirtaa kadi ƴoyre, men ɓoylataa kadi daaluyee Alla on, kono ko e nder ko men feɲɲinta goonga on kon, ɗun holnay kala ɓernde neɗɗanke fii amen yeeso Alla.
Alla ɓantirii mo ka sengo mun ɲaamo, o hendike e juuɗe Baabaajo on ko fodanoo kon, ɗun ko Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, kanko kadi o tippinii ɗun, wano wonɗon yiirude nii, e no wonɗon nanirde nii.
ɓornii tagu hesu heyɗintinaangu e noone mbaadi on Taguɗo ngu, fii no waawiron mo andude haa timma.
Ɓay Iisaa humpitike ɗun, o wi'i: «Wonaa ndee nawnaare ɗoo warata mo, kono nde hollay mangural Alla ngal, fii no Ɓiɗɗo Alla on mawniniree sabu mayre.»
Ko ɗun waɗi, peewal Alla ngal no ɓanginireede Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, gila ka gomɗinal fuɗɗi haa ka ngal hatti, wano windori non: «Feewuɗo on wuuriray gomɗinal ngal.»
Iisaa yalti e nden saare, himo rondanii hoore makko leggal altindiraangal ngal. O sutanii nokkuure wi'eteende Golgotaa e haala Yahuudiyanke, ko woni firo ɗun ko ‹Nokkuure Laalagal Hoore›.
Kono hiɗen mari dokke seeduɗe, wano Alla yeɗiri mo kala e men moƴƴere non. Si tawii ko dokkal haalugol ko Alla longini ɗun, yo taw ko ko yaadi e gomɗinal.
Tagoore aranere nden no wa'i wa ngayuuri, ɗimmere nden no wa'i wa kalaldi nagge, yeeso tammere nden no wa'i wa yeeso aaden, nayaɓere nden no wa'i wa simbirre wiiraynde.
Awa wattanee yiila e ngurndan mon ɗan, hara on wuuriraali wa komooɓe ɓen, kono ko wa jooma-faamu'en.
Awa, alaa ko sendindiri Yahuudiyanke e ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke, ɓe fow ko Joomiraaɗo gooto ɓe mari, on Alɗanɗo kala jantiiɗo mo.
Ko fii, ko Almasiihu on woni timmoode Sariya on fii no kala gomɗinɗo heɓira peewal.
Wota on aanu huunde, kono e kala huunde weeɓitiranee Alla faaleeji mon ɗin toragol mo, landoo mo ballal, weltanoo mo.
Awa ɗun fow ko waɗiri ko fii hollugol en mise, fii wota en heɓu faaleeji bonɗi wano ɓe heɓirnoo non.
Nde udditi gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin, yalti ka nder gaygii ton curki, wa curki beembal yiite moolanaangal. Naange ngen e yaasi on niɓɓitiri sabu curki ngin gaygii.
E telen-ma ɗun, wota hay gooto bonnu musiɗɗo mun maa huutora mo ƴoyre, ko fii Joomiraaɗo on yoɓay sifa ɗin noone ellaaji fow. Hari men wowlaniino on ɗun, men hajike on e ɗun.
Si tawii goɗɗo no humondiri e Almasiihu on, haray ko o tagudi heyri, haray piiji kiɗɗi ɗin feƴƴirii mo, haray piiji ɗin fow wontii kesi.
Ko fii Baabaajo on no yiɗi Ɓiɗɗo on, o hollay mo kadi kala ko o waɗata. Awa kadi o hollay mo kuuɗe ɓurɗe ɗee ɗoo, fii no woniron e nder ŋalaw.
Wujjaynooɗo woo wota wujju han kadi, kono yo o gollir juuɗe makko ɗen e nder nunɗal, o waɗa goɗɗun ko nafi, o okkora hatonjinɗo.
E hoore ɗun, eɓɓanan werde, miɗo tanƴinii yahugol ka mon sabu torndeeji mon ɗin.
Wota on jaɓu kala noone janndeeji janani selna on. Ko fii no moƴƴi ka ɓernde nden tiiɗiniree moƴƴere Alla nden, hara hinaa sariyaaji fii ɲaameteeji ɗi nafaali huunde ɓen jokkuɓe ɗi.
Men torike on, yo musiɓɓe, anditanee wonɓe gollude hakkunde mon ɓen, ɓen ɓe Joomiraaɗo on suɓii ko ardoo on, hajoo on.
Tawi ko mawɓe makko ɓen wi'iri ɗun ko fii hari hiɓe huli hooreeɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, ko fii hari ɓen nanondirii wonde mo qirritike Iisaa ko Almasiihu, ontigi yaltinte ka juulirde.
Ko fii, sunninaaɓe tigi-tigiiɓe ɓen ko enen, enen ɓee rewirooɓe Alla Ruuhu makko on, enen ɓee mantorɓe Iisaa Almasiihu on, enen ɓee ɓe hooloraa ɓandu mun.
Awa e hino yamiroore makko nden: ko yo en gomɗin innde Ɓiɗɗo makko on, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, yiɗindiren kadi wano o yamiri en non.
Ɓawto ɗun, mi yi'i kullii goo no sortoo ka nder leydi, marngii galaaɗi ɗiɗi nanditayɗi e galaaɗi ga'un baalun, hingii wowliraynoo wa ningiwii.
Musiɓɓe an, wota on miijor wa paykoy. E telen-ma ka bone, wonee paykoy tosokoy, kono miijoron wa mokobaaɓe.
E hara goɗɗo e mon no e nder tampere? Yo ontigi toro Alla. Kaa hara goɗɗo e mon no e nder weltaare? Yo ootigi beytu.
Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'ay on, ɓantee juuɗe mon lo'uɗe ɗen, sattinon koppi mon lo'uɗi ɗin,
Ɓay on noddirii oo Fonnuɗo fow «Baaba», ɗun ko on Ɲaawiroowo mo bee embere kuuɗe mun ɗen, haray yo on hulu mo fannin hiɗon koɗii aduna on.
Ko fii hiɗon haani ŋaɲɲaade, fii, nde timminoyɗon faale Alla on, yo on hendoyo ko o fodi on kon.
E hin-le, gomɗinal ngal ko pellital fii piiji ɗi tanƴiniɗen, e hoolaare fii piiji ɗi en yi'aali taho.
Awa e hino ko mi wi'ata on, mi andina on e innde Joomiraaɗo on: On haanaa wuurirde han kadi wa ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, ɓen jokkuɓe miijooji mun mehi.
Awa ko ɗun waɗi, wota gooto ɲaawu on fii ko ɲaamoton kon e ko yaroton kon, maa fii juldeere, maa lewru heyru, maa ɲalaaɗe fowteteeɗe e mun ɗen.
Ko ɗun waɗi si: Hiɓe ka yeeso jullere laamu Alla, hiɓe rewa mo jemma e ɲalorma ka suudu makko. Jooɗiiɗo on ka jullere laamu ɗuwiray ɓe suudu mun ndun.
Onsay Puulusa tippii, o ugginii e hoore makko, o ƴetti mo, o tambii, o wi'i: «Wota on aanu, ko fii himo wuuri.»
Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo wakkilii fow sabu suɓaaɓe ɓen, fii kamɓe kadi no ɓe heɓira kisiyee wonɗo e Iisaa Almasiihu on, wondude e darja poomayankeejo on.
Awa hiwrondiree lunnondiral giggol siɗɗankaaku. Yo ɓuttu wonan on, onon humondirɓe e Almasiihu on ɓen fow.
Ɗoftondiree e dow teddingol Almasiihu on.
Onon non, yo yiɓɓe, ɓay on hajaama, reenee fii wota on selu jokkon ɗayni ɓe ɗoftaaki yamirooje Alla ɗen, haa ka yoolon tabital mon ngal.
Rewɓe, mo kala e mon, yo yankinano moodi mun, wano hawrirani Joomiraaɗo on non.
Duumiiɓe e waɗugol junuubu ɓen, wurtu ɓe e yeeso fow, fii no heddiiɓe ɓen kadi hulira.
Awa, wota en ɲaawindir hande kadi, ɗun-le wuren ardinee hakkil, fii wota on waɗu yeeso musiɗɗo mon on hayre fegginaynde maa wonon sabu yanal.
Kono darja e teddungal e ɓuttu wonanii kala on waɗoowo ko moƴƴi, ko adii kon ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen, hikki ɗon ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen.
Ɓe ɗannini giiteeli bonnooji, ɓe daɗi mbelndi kaafa, ɓe heewi doole fii kala hiɓe lo'unoo, ɓe hollitii ka nder hareeji, ɓe raɗii koneeli jananɓe ɓen.
Ka heddii ɗoo, wota hay gooto tampinan, ko fii ɓattaate Iisaa ɗen no ka ɓandu an.
Onsay malaa'ikaajo dolnuɗo ƴetti hayre nanditaynde e laggorde moolanaande, bugii ka baharu, e hoore himo wi'a: «Ko nii saare Baabiila mawnde nden bugortee doole, hara nde yiitetaake hande kadi!
Kono onon non yo yiɓɓe, tiiɗinee ngurndan mon ɗan e hoore gomɗinal mon hormorteengal ngal, tororon Alla bawgal Ruuhu Seniiɗo on,
Wota on ɲembu aduna fewndiiɗo on, kono wonee waylaaɓe, ɓe hakkillaaji mun heyɗintinaa, fii no andiron ko honɗun woni faale Alla on: ɗun ko ko moƴƴi kon e ko welata mo kon e ko timmi kon.
Ko fii hari min mi hewtaa sahaabaaɓe ɓen, mi handaa kadi e noddeede sahaabaajo, ko fii miɗo cukkotonoo moftal Alla ngal.
Wota on yiɗu aduna on e ko woni e aduna on kon. On mo yiɗi aduna on, haray giggol Baabaajo on alaa e makko.
An kadi non, oo feloowo, a maraa lamitorgal woo. Ko fii nde hiɗa fela ɓeya, haray hiɗa fawude hoore maa ɲaawoore an tigi. Ko fii an, wonɗo felude on, hiɗa waɗirde wa maɓɓe.

Nde tawnoo Yaaquuba e Petruusu e Yuuhanna, jogoraaɓe wa tugaale dental ngal, fellitii fii moƴƴere nde mi yeɗaa nden, ɓe tamindiri juuɗe amen ɲaame ɗen, min e Barnabaasi, fii naɓidal amen, fii yo menen men yaaru ka ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen, kamɓe ɓe yaara ka Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen.

Ɓay wonii suufaaɓe ɓen fempii Iisaa, ɓe ƴetti conci makko ɗin, ɓe waɗi ɗi pecce nay, suufaajo kala heɓi feccere. Ɓe ƴetti kadi fokiya makko on, tawi on hinaa ɲo'aaɗo, ko o alluwal gootal gila dow haa ley.
awa an, oo wonɗo jannude ɓeya, e hara a alaa jannitaade an tigi? An, oo waajotooɗo wota wujje, hinaa hiɗa wujjude?
E hari on andaa ɗunɗoo? Ko ɓandu mon ndun woni suudu Ruuhu Seniiɗo wonɗo e mon on, on mo Alla okki on. Hinaa onon jeyi hoore mon,
Ko fii giggol Almasiihu on no laamii men, menen ɓee fellituɓe ɗunɗoo: aaden gooto maayanii fow, awa fow maayii.

Ko ɗun waɗi, yo musiɓɓe an laaɓuɓe, ɓe mi hawti noddaandu Alla ndun, feŋee miijo mon ngon e hoore mo Alla toɗɗii neli on, on Yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, on mo qirritiɗen ka gomɗinal men, ɗun ko Iisaa.
E nder ɗun fow, mi hollii on yo on gollir nii fii yo on wallito lo'uɓe ɓen, anditon kadi konguɗi Iisaa Joomi on ko o wi'i kon kanko tigi wonde: ‹Ko okkugol ɓuri moƴƴude edii okkoreede.› »
Yo mo kala teddin dewgal ngal, awa kadi yo ƴettindirɓe ɓen yonindiran, ko fii telen-ma ɗon, Alla ɲaaway fijooɓe ɓen e jinooɓe ɓen.
O ugginii, o yi'i kasannge on ka waalii, kono o naataali.
Maƴanɗe e digge e parɲitte waɗi wondude e dimbannde leydi tiiɗunde, nde sifa mun e tiiɗude hari waɗaali gila yimɓe ɓen woni ka hoore leydi.

Onsay mi jiccii ka koyɗe makko fii sujjangol mo. Kono o wi'immi: «Accu, wota a waɗu ɗun! Ko mi kurkodoowo e maa e musiɓɓe maa ɓen, jogiiɓe seeditoore Iisaa nden. Sujjan Alla! Ko seeditoore Iisaa nden woni ruuhu longinoowo annabaaɓe ɓen.»
Ko e men Alla ɓanginiri ɗun Ruuhu mun on. Ko fii Ruuhu on hollay ko woni woo, hay piiji Alla lugguɗi ɗin.
Jaɓɓee mo e innde Joomiraaɗo on, wondude e weltaare timmunde, teddinon kadi sifa ɓen yimɓe.
Onon kadi fayɓe, ɗoftee mawɓe mon ɓen e ɗi fow, ko fii ɗun no wela Joomiraaɗo on.

Ko men woni mantorde kon, ko ko ɓernde amen nden ɓanginani men kon, wonde men wuuririi e oo aduna, tentinii telen-ma mon, nunɗal e haqiiqa ko iwri ka Alla, hara hinaa ko iwri e faamu neɗɗanke, kono ko e sulfu Alla on.
Yiɗuɗo lan on ko jaɓuɗo yamirooje an ɗen, ɗoftii. Kala yiɗuɗo lan, Ben an yiɗay mo, min kadi mi yiɗay mo, mi hollitoo mo.»
Pellet, ko goonga, ɗin aadaaji no nandi e faamu, ɓay hiɗi catii e dewal anniyaangal immorde e neɗɗanke, e yankinaare e yangugol ɓandu, kono ɗi alanaa neɗɗanke no o wawtora hoore makko.
Ɓe seeditike fii giggol maa ngol yeeso moftal ngal. Haray a waɗii ko moƴƴi si a faaborii ɓe ko haani e nder yaadu maɓɓe ndun, hara ko noone no welirta Alla,
Bugitoɗaa yeddondire njofooje ɗe aldaa e nafa ɗen, ɗe anduɗaa adday hawreeji ɗen.
Enen, ɓe geece mun buumaaki ɓen fow, jalbirɓe mangu Joomiraaɗo on wa ndaarorgal, hiɗen e nder wattegol mbaadi makko, mangu e hoore mangu, immorde e Joomiraaɗo on, ɗun ko on Ruuhu.

kono Almasiihu on kaɲun ko hoore mun tigi ittani Alla sadaka e ɓaawo ella, e hoore ardoreede Ruuhu Poomayankeejo on, ko haa honto non ƴiiƴan makko ɗan laɓɓinta ɓerɗe men, itta en e kuuɗe nawrayɗe en e mayde, fii no rewiren Alla Wuuruɗo on!
Ɓay Allaahu on yeɗii ɓe kamɓe kadi ko o yeɗunoo en kon, enen ɓee gomɗinɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on, hari ko mi hombo haa ka mi dartoo Alla?»
Wota on aanin Ruuhu Alla Seniiɗo on, on mo maandiniraɗon fii ndee ɲalaande cottudi wonkii.
Anditu no nanirɗaa Kibaaru Moƴƴo on non, e no hendorɗaa mo non. Ɗoftoɗaa mo, tuubaa! Si a finaali, mi arday wa ngujjo, awa kadi a andataa ko e saa'i hombo mi arata, mi juhe.
Ko onon, yo fayɓe, wota hay gooto ɗaynu on, ko fii kala on waɗuɗo ko feewi, haray ko feewuɗo, wano kanko Almasiihu on o woniri feewuɗo non.
Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, wota on hoolo kala neɗɗo wi'uɗo Ruuhu Alla on no e makko, kono taskee ɓe fii andugol si ruuhu wonɗo e maɓɓe on ko e Alla iwri, ko fii waɗitiiɓe annaba ɗuuɗuɓe arii e oo aduna.
«Ko onon non, yo musiɓɓe amen, andee dey ko sabu makko kanko Iisaa feɲɲiniranaɗon yaafuyee junuubaaji ɗin.
Ka rawnoode, yo musiɓɓe an, weltoree Joomiraaɗo on. Ko fii tampintaa lan ka mi fillitoo windangol on, ko fii ɗun ko ko dandata on.
On mo tawi no weelaa, yo ɲaamu ka mun, fii wota on mottondir fawon ɲaawoore e hoore mon. Mi jaaboyto ɗeya lande, nde mi hewtoyi.
Ko e hoore ɗun Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: «Ƴettee mo, onon tigi, ɲaawiron mo sariya mon on.» Kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen wi'i mo: «Men newnanaaka warugol goɗɗo.»
Kono himmanee dokke ɓurɗe moƴƴude ɗen. Awa mi hollay on kadi laawol ɓurngol moƴƴude ngol.
Ko wano on yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka tigi haanannoo en, hara ko seniiɗo, mo bonnaali, mo aldaa e junuubu, seeduɗo e junuubanke'en, e ɓurɗo kammuuli ɗin ɓanteede,
Mi waawii fow sabu on Tiiɗinɗo lan.
Ko Alla faalaa ko yo on laato laaɓuɓe, e fii yo on woɗɗito jinaa,
Duumee e toragol Alla, hakkilanon e ɗun e dow yettugol mo.
Sabu ngol kongol, Muusaa dogi, yahi daakoyii e ndii leydi wi'eteendi Midiyaani, o daɲi ɗon ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo.
Kono duhiiɗo haanaa ka hippoo, ko fii ko o mbaadi e darja Alla, debbo non ko darja gorko.
Yo ɓuttu Almasiihu ngu noddiraɗon fii wonugol ɓandu wooturu ngun ardo ɓerɗe mon ɗen. Wonee anditanooɓe.
E dow ardagol fayɓe buy ka mangu, tawi no hawrani on Taguɗo piiji fow, e mo piiji ɗin fow wonani on, laatinirgol Iisaa timmuɗo e nder tampereeji, on Sincuɗo kisiyee maɓɓe on.
Ko honto ɗee poodotire e ɗee yeddondire hakkunde mon iwri? E hara hinaa faaleeji bonɗi woni waɗude hare ka ɓerɗe mon?
Awa saa'i woo jiiɓaare goo no naneede hakkunde mon, hara ko jiiɓaare nde yi'etaake hay ka ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen, hay goɗɗo e mon no murtini ɓeyngu ben mun!

Ndarndannde woo heɓaali on nde goɗɗo goo heɓaali. Alla ko Sella-Findeejo, o newnataa ndarndeɗon toonin doole mon ɗen, kono e nder ndarndannde nden o adday feere no sortoron e mun, e no waawiron nde dartorde.
Miɗo andi si mi iwoyii ɗoo, caapaali hunƴuɗi aroyay hakkunde mon ɗi tawata accoytaa wuro ngon.
E hoore ɗun, meɗen mantorde on e nder mofte Alla ɗen, sabu ŋaɲɲaare mon nden e gomɗinal mon ngal e nder cukkanɗe ɗe cukkaɗon ɗen fow e satteendeeji ɗi wakkiliɗon ɗin.
Hay gooto yi'aali Alla haa hande, kono si en yiɗindirii, haray Alla no humondiri e men, giggol makko wonungol e men ngol timma.
Immorde e an min Puulusa, oo sahaabaajo, mo tawata hinaa yimɓe ɓen toɗɗii ɗun, hinaa kadi e hay gooto ɗun rewi si hinaa e Iisaa Almasiihu on e Alla Baabaajo on, on Immintinɗo mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen,
Miijitee fii on ŋaɲɲiiɗo ndee liddannde nde junuubanke'en liddii mo, fii wota ronkere heɓu on haa ɓerɗe mon maaya.
Ko ɗun waɗi, si en yuɓɓondirii e makko ka mayde makko, pellet en woniray kadi wano non ka immintineede makko.
No windii ton kadi: «Ko onon, yo leƴƴi, weltodee e jamaa makko on!»
Kono Ruuhu Allaahu on no holli no laaɓiri wonde, ka saa'iiji sakkitori woɓɓe ɓen tertoyto gomɗinal ngal fii jokkugol ruuhuuji ɗaynayɗi e janndeeji jinna,
Andintin ɓe hiɓe haani yankinanaade laamuuji ɗin e laamiiɓe ɓen, ɓe ɗoftoo ɓe, ɓe hebilanoo kala kuugal moƴƴal.
Kono ɓe tewi ɓe yejjiti wonde, ko daaluyee Alla on waɗi si kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin woodiranoo, leydi ndin suutaa e ndiyan, ndi moƴƴiniraa ndiyan.
E hin-le Almasiihu on kadi maayii fii junuubaaji ɗin nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa, on Feewuɗo fii ɓe feewaa ɓen, fii addugol on e Alla. O waraama ka ɓandu, o wurnitiraama Ruuhu Allaahu on.
No ɓurani ɓe ka tawata ɓe andaano laawol peewal ngol, edii, andugol ngol, sela yamiroore hormorteende nde ɓe andinaa nden.
Men yamirii on e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, yo musiɓɓe, yo on woɗɗito kala musiɗɗo wuuruɗo e nder puyndan, ko yaadaa e jannde nde hendorɗon men nden.
Ko ɗun waɗi, ko wano non, sabu aaden gooto, junuubu naatiri e aduna on, e sabu on junuubu kadi mayde nden ari, ko wano non kadi mayde nden rewiri e hoore yimɓe ɓen fow, ko fii fow waɗii junuubu.
Ko gomɗinal ngal ɓe fooliri laamateeriiji, ɓe tabintini peewal, ɓe heɓi fodaariiji, ɓe ombi sekko ngayuuje.
Men cukkaa, kono men hawkaaka. Men liɓaa, kono men hayraali.
Ko onon, yo jamaa jinooɓe! E on andaa yiɗugol aduna on ko aɲugol Alla? Awa si goɗɗo no faalaa yiɗude aduna on, haray o waɗitike gaɲo Alla.
Nde tawnoo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on newnanaali ɓe feɲɲinoygol daaluyee on e nder Aazii on, ɓe yahi ɓe taƴitoyi Firgii wondude e leydi Galaasi ndin.
Kono e hino ko peewal iwrungal e gomɗinal ngal wi'i kon: «Wota a miijo ka ɓernde maa: ‹ko hombo ƴawata ka kammu?› » (ɗun haray ko tippingol Almasiihu on),
Arano on yahi, hibbi feletere mun nden ka hoore leydi, tun temmeeje kaanuɗe muusuɗe heɓi ɓe nden maande ngin kullii wonnoo e mun, sujjani nandolla maggii on.

Ɓay Baalun kun hendike deftere nden, ɗen tagooje nay wuuruɗe e mawɓe ɓen noogay e nayo ari jiccii yeeso kun Baalun. Tawi mo kala e ɓen no jogii hoddu, e pelette kaŋŋe heewuɗe urngallooji, ɗi tawata ko torndeeji gomɗinɓe ɓen.
Kala on gomɗinɗo wonde ko Iisaa woni Almasiihu on, haray ko jibinaaɗo immorde e Alla, e kala yiɗuɗo Baabaajo on yiɗay Ɓiɗɗo on kadi.
Wota en wonu mawnintiniiɓe, maa bagondiren, maa nawlindiren.
Awa kadi wota a felir nayeejo no sattiri, kono waajor mo wa si ko o ben maa, sukaaɓe worɓe ɓen kadi wa miɲɲiraaɓe maa,
Wuuriree no moƴƴiri e hakkunde ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen fii nde hiɓe tooɲira on wa waɗooɓe ko boni, yo ɓe yi'u kuuɗe mon moƴƴe ɗen, ɗun ɓe mawninoyay Alla nde o aroyi.
Hakkee ko mi himmunoo, mi cukkotono gomɗinɓe Iisaa ɓen, e ley yamiroore Sariya on, tawi mi felnaaki.
O landii ɓe ko e saa'i hombo hayfani paykun kun. Ɓen jaabii mo: «Ko hanki tumbere ɲalorma nguli ɓandu kin yalti e makko.»

Nde tawnoo nden ɲande ko hebulanagol fii ɲalaande fowteteende nden e tawde kadi nden ɲalaande ko mawnde. Tawi Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen faalaaka yo fureeji ɗin acce ka leɗɗe altindiraaɗe. Onsay ɓe torii Pilaatu yo koyɗe fureeji ɗin hele si ɗi ittee ɗon.

Gila e on saa'i ɗon, tawi Pilaatu no ɗaɓɓude no accitira mo, kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen woni e ewnagol wi'a: «Si a accitii mo, haray hinaa a giɗo lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on! Ko fii kala waɗitiiɗo lanɗo, haray hollitike ko o gaɲo lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on!»
«Wota ɓerɗe mon ɗen aanu. Gomɗinee Alla, gomɗinon lan, min kadi.
hara on jaɓaali hulɓinireede huunde immorde e ayɓe ɓen. Ɗun wonanay ɓe maande halkagol maɓɓe ngol, kono onon ɗun wonana on maande kisiyee mon on, ɗun ko immorde e Alla.
Awa kadi hinaa onon suɓii lan, kono ko min suɓii on, toɗɗii on kadi, fii yo on yahu rimoyon, kon ko rimuɗon lutta, e yo Baabaajo on yeɗu on kala ko toriɗon mo e innde an.

Ko gomɗinal ngal Haabiila yeɗiri Alla sadaka ɓurɗo moƴƴude mo Qaayiina on. O kuljiraa feewuɗo sabu ngal gomɗinal. Alla tigi kulji ɗen dokke makko. Fii kala kanko Haabiila o maayii, kono ngal gomɗinal no ɓanginde fii makko.
Ko ɗun waɗi, yo men jogore wa kurkaaɗi Almasiihu on e halfinaaɓe goongaaji Alla wirniiɗi ɗin.
Tawi koode ɗen ka kammu no saamude ka leydi, wa kuraaje wonɗe saamude nde hendu tiiɗundu dimbi kurahi.
Ko ɗun waɗi, yo yiɓɓe an, dogee rewugol sanamu.
Wota bone foolu on, kono fooliree bone on moƴƴere.
E hino ko haanuɗaa andintinde kon: jeejaa yimɓe ɓen yeeso Alla wonde, yo ɓe accu pooɗotiro haala ka aldaa e nafa. Si hinaa ɗun, ɗun nawray heɗotooɓe ɓen e majjere.
Ɓadee Alla, ɗun o ɓadoto on. Laɓɓinee juuɗe mon ɗen, yo onon junuubankeeɓe. Laɓɓinon ɓerɗe mon ɗen, yo onon sikkitiiɓe.
Kono si on ɓurdindinii yimɓe ɓen, haray on waɗii junuubu, Sariya on no jogori on wa bonnuɗo Sariya.
Ko fii Alla noddiraali en wuurirgol angal laaɓal, kono ko wuurirgol laaɓal.
Tikkere Alla nden no ɓangi iwrude ka kammu e hoore kala junuubu e kala bone ko yimɓe suuɗirayɓe goonga on kuuɗe mun bonɗe waɗata.
Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, yiɗindiren, ko fii giggol ko ka Alla iwri, awa kala yiɗuɗo ko jibinaaɗo immorde e Alla, haray himo andi Alla.
On wi'uɗo no ka ndaygu e hoore aɲugol musiɗɗo mun, haray haa jooni himo ka niwre.
Si on hoynaama fii innde Almasiihu on, haray ko on malaaɓe, ko fii Ruuhu darjinɗo on, ɗun ko on Ruuhu Alla, no e hoore mon.
