Ɓay Puulusa gaynii ɓe hiwraade, o nangi e fillitanagol ɓe, fensita ko Allaahu on waɗi e hakkunde ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen e nder golle makko ɗen.
Ko hombo e mon waawi hollude wonde mi waɗii junuubu? Si mi wowlii goonga, ko honɗun haɗata hooloɗon mi?
O ɓeyditi e ɗun: «Mi anditoytaa hande kadi fii junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin e angal peewal maɓɓe ngal.»
ɗun ko e nder humondiral e makko alɗirɗon kala huunde e kala kongol e kala gandal.
Mi wakkilinii on sabu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on yo musiɓɓe an, e sabu giggol Ruuhu Alla on, dartodugol e an e nder fewtingol Alla toraaje fii an,
Yimɓe ɓen jaabii mo, wi'i: «An, jinnaaru no e maa! Ko hombo woni ɗaɓɓude no warire?»

on mo Alla toɗɗii wonugol sadaka fii, rewrude e ƴiiƴan makko ɗan, no gomɗinɓe mo ɓen heɓira yaafuyee junuubaaji. Alla waɗi ɗun fii ɓangingol peewal mun ngal, ko fii o donkinaali ɓee waɗunooɓe junuubi feƴƴunooɗi ɗin fewndo muɲal makko ngal.
Tawi kurkaaɗi ɗin e aynooɓe ɓen, ɗun ko darinooɓe ɗon ɓen, no huɓɓi yiite, ko fii hari jaangol ngol no woodi, ɓe woni e iwlagol. Tawi Petruusu kadi no wondi e maɓɓe, no iwloo.
Ɓornoɗon aalaaji Alla ɗin fow, fii no waawiron catorde dartoo pehe Ibuliisa ɗen.
Petruusu wi'i mo fahin: «Koohoojo, ko honɗun haɗata mi waawe jokkude fewndo ɗoo? Mi okkitiray ngurndan an ɗan fii maa!»
Ɗun, ɓuttu ngu Alla yeɗata, feƴƴitungu kala faamu ngun, hiway ɓerɗe mon ɗen e miijooji mon ɗin e nder humondiral mon e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Ko kangal mantirten Ben men Joomiraaɗo on, ko kangal kadi huɗirten yimɓe tagaaɓe e mbaadi Alla ɓen.
Kono hinaa fii miɗo faalaa wi'ude bee tun selon ɓee yimɓe oo aduna, jeenooɓe, maa reereɗuɓe, maa jattooɓe, maa rewooɓe sanamuuji. Si hinaa ɗun, haray bee yalton e oo aduna.
«Min tigi hari miɗo miijoo wonde miɗo haani rewude pehe ɗen fow fii liddagol ndee innde Iisaa, oo jeyaaɗo Naasirata.
Gite maɓɓe ɗen no heewi jinaa, awa kadi ɓe haaɓataa waɗugol junuubu. Hiɓe pooɗa wonkiiji ɗi tabitaa ɗin, nawra ɗi e ko boni. Ɓerɗe ɓen jannooɓe fenaandeeɓe no eltiraa miile, ɓen ko ɓe fayɓe huɗaaɓe,
Kono wonaa faggiroowo fii njoddi on woni ngaynaako on, wonaa on jeyi baali ɗin. No onɗon yi'iri saafaandu no ara, o accay ɗon baali ɗin, o doga, saafaandu ndun ukkoo e majji, saakita ɗi.
Andee ɗun, yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe, yo neɗɗo kala yaawu heɗaade, nenna si yewta, nenna si tikka.
Ko wano non kadi Joomi on no yamiri wonde feɲɲinooɓe Kibaaru Moƴƴo on ko e makko wuurata.
Ko fii wonugol Ndaygu addimmi e oo aduna, hara kala gomɗinɗo lan wonaali e nder niwre nden.
Ɓawto ɗun Iisaa tawti mo ka juulirde mawnde, o wi'i mo: «E hino a hettii cellal. Wota a waɗitu junuubu hande kadi, fii wota goɗɗun goo heɓe ko ɓuri ɗunɗoo bonde.»
Ko waɗoton woo waɗiree giggol.
«Si hiɗon yiɗi lan, on ɗoftoto yamirooje an ɗen.

Awa reenee wota on salo heɗaade on Wonɗo on yewtude. Ɓen Isra'iilayankeeɓe, salinooɓe heɗaade on Wonnooɗo ɓe yamirde ka hoore leydi, ɓe daɗaano lette ɗen. E ko honno non woniranta en si en huccii on Wonɗo en yewtude ka kammuuli dow?
Wa fewndo ko on andaa Alla, hari ko on maccuɓe sanamuuji ɗi tawata wonaa goɗɗun tigi e oo aduna.
Ko fii mon onon taho Allaahu on addirnoo oo Jiyaaɗo makko, mo o immintini e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, fii ko barkinira on, sendugol mo kala e mon e waɗugol ko boni.»
«Ko men seedee kadi ko o waɗi kon fow e nder ndii leydi Yahuudiyankeeɓe haa naɓani Yerusalaam. Ɓe wariri mo fempugol mo e leggal, wenga.

Mi wakkilinii on, yo musiɓɓe, e innde Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, on fow jogee kongol gootol fii wota sendondiral wonu hakkunde mon, e maanaa fedde-fedde, kono wonee e nder nanondiral tiiɗungal e nder miijo wooto e hakkille goote.
Onon kadi, ɓee woɗɗitinooɓe Alla e ayɓe makko sabu miijooji mon ɗin e kuuɗe mon bonɗe ɗen,
Awa dogu himmeeji cukankaaku ɗin, ɗaɓɓaa peewal ngal e gomɗinal ngal e giggol ngol e ɓuttu on, wondude e jantorayɓe Joomiraaɗo on ɓernde laaɓunde.
Ɓay non on wurnitidaama e Almasiihu on, haray ɗaɓɓee piiji wonɗi ka dow ɗin, ka Almasiihu on jooɗori ka sengo ɲaamo Alla ton.
Arano on wutti liital mun ngal. Marmalle e yiite jillunge ƴiiƴan waɗi, bugaa ka leydi. Peccun tammun leydi ndin e peccun tammun leɗɗe ɗen sumi, huɗo hecco kon fow sumi.
e hoore hiɓe wi'a: «Men jarnii ma, yo Alla Joomiraaɗo, Jom Bawgal, Woodaaɗo e Woodanooɗo, ko huutorɗaa bawgal maa tiiɗungal ngal kon e ko joɗɗinɗaa laamu maa ngun kon.
Iisaa jaabii mo, wi'i: «Si hiɗa andunoo dokkal Alla ngal e Wi'uɗo ma ‹okkoran mi yara› on, hanno ko an torotonoo mo ko yaraa, o okkore ndiyan wurnayɗan.»
Awa, nde Almasiihu on, ɗun ko ngurndan mon ɗan, feeɲiti, haray on feeɲiday e makko ka mangural.
Kono ɗunɗoo ko windanaa ko fii no gomɗiniron wonde ko Iisaa woni Almasiihu on e Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, e fii no heɓiron ngurndan e nder gomɗingol innde makko nden.
Enen-le, ko en ɓe Alla. Kala on anduɗo Alla heɗoto en, kono on mo tawata non wonaa mo Alla heɗotaako en. Ko non andirten Ruuhu Goongaajo on e ruuhu fenaandeejo on.

Ko ɓe baade ɓaleeje ka mottondire mon fii hiraande jokkere enɗan. Hiɓe waɗa mbeleeɗe e ɓaawo hersa, hiɓe hittini fii hoore maɓɓe tun. Ko ɓe duule ɗe aldaa e ndiyan, ɗe hendu sorotoo naɓa. Ko ɓe leɗɗe dabbunde ɗe aldaa e ɓiɓɓe, mayɗe laabi ɗiɗi, ɓoraa.
Awa kadi nawnuɓe no addetenoo ka sera ballaŋe, wallinee e buutuuji maa e gate, fii nde Petruusu no feƴƴa, hay si ko yo ɗowdi makko ndin hawru e goɗɗo e maɓɓe.
E nder kala huunde, jogoree gomɗinal ngal wa hiwitorgo, ngo waawoton ɗanninirde ndagaaje yiite Ibuliisa ɗen fow.
Kala ko waɗoton, waɗiree ɗun ittiri wonkii mon kin fow, wa si tawii ko Joomiraaɗo on wonɗon waɗande, hara hinaa yimɓe ɓen,
Reenee fii wota hay gooto e mon jeenu, maa wona keefeero wa Iisu, on yeeyitunooɗo afoyaagal mun ngal fii nafakka gooto.
Onsay ɓe ewnii, ɓe wi'i: «Kono hinaa non oo ɗoo, ko Barabaasi!» Tawi-le Barabaasi ko murtunooɗo.
janfotooɓe, huuwirooɓe angal faamu, heewuɓe townitaare, yiɗuɓe faale mun on ɓuri Alla.
Ko ɗun waɗi si Alla towni mo ka ɓuri toowude ton, o yeɗi mo innde ɓurnde mawnude inɗe ɗen fow,
Awa, hinaa men ɓaarorɓe taariikaaji sinciraaɗi ƴoyre, fewndo ko men ɓanginani on ardu Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on e bawgal makko ngal. Kono men yi'irii gite amen ɗen tigi mangu makko ngun.

Ko ɗun o woni waɗude e ɓataake ɗen fow, ka o wowli fii ɗin piiji ɗon, e ka windanɗe mettuɗe faamude ɗen woni ɗon, ɗe tawata yimɓe ɓe faamaa ɓen e ɓe tabitaa ɓen ɓoylii noone on, wano ɓe waɗiri non e ko heddii e bindi ɗin kon, fii hayrannde maɓɓe kamɓe tigi.
Ɓay sahaabaaɓe ɓen nanii ɗun, ɗun ko Barnabaasi e Puulusa, ɓe seeki dolokkaaji maɓɓe ɗin, ɓe wubbi, ɓe ukkitoyii e hakkunde jamaa on e hoore hiɓe sonkana yimɓe ɓen, wi'a:
Ko mi woni wi'ude, ko Almasiihu on wonii kurkaadu Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen fii ɓangingol goonga Alla on, e nder haqinqingol fodaariiji waɗanaaɗi baabiraaɓe ɓen,
On mo sikki ko dewo, e ɓaawo waawugol ɗenngal mun ngal, haray on ɗaynii hoore mun, ngal dewal ko meerewal.
Anditee ngol kongol ngol mi wi'unoo on wonde kurkaadu ɓuraa jom mun teddude. Si ɓe cukkike lan, ɓe cukkoyto on onon kadi. Si ɓe ɗoftike kongol an ngol, ɓe ɗoftoyto konguɗi mon ɗin kadi.
Onsay Iisaa wi'i Yahuudiyankeeɓe gomɗinɓe mo ɓen: «Si on duumike e wuurirgol kongol an ngol, haray ka haqiiqa, ko on taalibaaɓe an.
Ɓawto ɗun, heege waɗi e nder leydi Misira ndin fow haa hewtoyi Kanaana, tampere nden tiiɗi, tawi ɓen maamiraaɓe men alaa heɓude ko ɲaama.
Mi weltike fota ko mi tawi kon woɓɓe e fayɓe maa ɓen no jokki laawol goonga on, wano Baabaajo on yamiriri en non.
On mo dankaaki siɓɓe mun ɓen, tentinii ɓeynguure mun nden, haray o bugitike gomɗinal ngal, awa kadi haray hay mo gomɗinaa no ɓuri mo.
ɓadoren Alla ɓernde nunɗunde e gomɗinal heewungal pellital, e ɓernde laɓɓinaande kala miijooji bonɗi, e ɓandu lootiraandu ndiyan laaɓuɗan.
Ɓe naniino tun no wi'ee wonde: Oo cukkinooɗo ɓe oya tuma, no waajaade e ngal gomɗinal ngal o faalanoo lancude.
Mi wakkilinii on jooni ɲaamugol, ko fii ɗun no haani fii no daɗiron, awa kadi hay gooto e mon cukulol hoore mun hayrataa.»
Hiɗa ŋaɲɲii, tampi sabu innde an nden, kono a haaɓaali.
wi'aa mawɓe ɓen, yo ɓe wonu waawuɓe hoore maɓɓe, teddintooɓe, hara wonaa uɓɓitooɓe, kono hara ko tabituɓe e gomɗinal ngal e nder giggol e ŋaɲɲaare.
Hari Allaahu on jogoraano yimɓe ɓen ko ɓe andaano mo kon, kono jooni o daalanii yimɓe ɓen fow e nder nokkeeli ɗin fow yo ɓe tuubu.
Tawi yumma makko e miɲɲiraawo yumma makko, ɗun ko Mariyama sonna oo wi'eteeɗo Kulopaasi, e Mariyama Magaduuna no darii ka binde leggal altindiraangal ngal Iisaa fempaa e mun ngal.
Dolokke mo o ɓornii on no moddi ƴiiƴan. Himo wi'ee Daaluyee Alla on.
Ko woni tun, reenee fii wota ko newnanaɗon waɗugol kon wonan lo'uɓe ɓen peggal.
«Kon ko Alla immintini Iisaa e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen, hara o luttaali ka ɲolu, ko ɗun o daalunoo, o wi'i: ‹Mi yeɗay on barkiiji laaɓuɗi holniiɗi ɗi mi fodunoo Daawuuda ɗin.›
Nden ɲande on andoyay wonde miɗo humondiri e Baaba an, onon kadi hiɗon humondiri e an, min kadi miɗo humondiri e mon.
Si en ɗoftike yamirooje makko ɗen, haray hiɗen felliti wonde hiɗen andi mo.
Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wi'ay on, on maayay e nder junuubi mon. Ko fii, si on gomɗinaali wonde ko min woni Wonɗo on, on maayay e nder junuubu mon.»
Mi yi'i on debbo no mandiliri ƴiiƴan yimɓe Alla ɓen, e ƴiiƴan seedeeɓe Iisaa ɓen. Ɓay mi yi'ii mo, mi ŋalɗi fota.
Hiɗon andi, ɓawto ɗun, wa fewndo ko o faalaa heɓude du'aa ben makko on, o bugitano, ko fii o heɓaano feere waylugol miijo ben makko ngon, fii kala hari himo ɗaɓɓirde ɗun gonɗi.
Tawi ŋunu-ŋunu fii makko on no ɗuuɗi e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen. Woɓɓe e maɓɓe no wi'a: «Ko o neɗɗo moƴƴo», ɓeya ɓen kadi no wi'a: «Oo'o, o majjinay woni jamaa on.»
Tawi jungo Joomiraaɗo on no e hoore maɓɓe, yimɓe buy gomɗini, jaɓi Joomi on.
kono ɓay Alla tawii meɗen foddi e halfineede Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, ko ɗun waɗi si men yewtirtaa no welirta yimɓe ɓen, kono ko no welirta Alla, on ndarndotooɗo ɓerɗe amen ɗen.
Yo mantoore wonan Alla, on Yeɗuɗo en polgal immorde e Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
Keynguujo tigi-tigiijo mo alaa ballo on no waɗi tama'u mun on e Alla, duumii e toragol mo jemma e ɲalorma.
Ko fii haa jooni on toraaki hay huunde e innde an. Toree, on heɓay, fii no weltaare mon nden timmira.

Kamɓe kadi wano non. Si ɓe duumaaki e angal gomɗinal ngal, ɓe tokkete, ko fii Alla no mari bawgal tokkugol ɓe kadi.

Wota ɲamaande woo wonu hakkunde mon e goɗɗo si wonaa yiɗindirgol, ko fii kala yiɗuɗo wondiɓɓe mun ɓen, haray timminii Sariya on.
Yimɓe ɓen sunniraa nguleendi tiiɗundi, ɓe woni e hoynugol innde Alla nden, on marɗo bawgal e hoore ɗin albala'uuji, ɓe ronki tuubude fii no ɓe mawninira mo, kanko Alla.
Tawi tata mayre on no njanɗi, no toowi, hinde mari kadi dambuɗe sappoo e ɗiɗi. Malaa'ikaaɓe sappoo e ɗiɗo no e ɗen dambuɗe, tawi inɗe bolondaaji ɓiɓɓe Isra'iila ɓen sappoo e ɗiɗi no windii e majje.
Ko e nder ko kuddi ndin wontani Almasiihu on fii men kon, o sotti en e ley kuddi Sariya on, ko fii no windii: «Kuddi wonanii kala on wengaaɗo e leggal»,
On naniino fii ɗee kuuɗe an e saa'iiji goo wa fewndo ko mi woni ka diina Yahuudiyanke, ɗun ko fewndo ko mi cukkii moftal Alla ngal haa feƴƴiti, miɗo lanca.
O nangi ningiwii ngin, e maanaa ndiya mboddi araniri, ɗun ko Ibuliisa maa Seytaane, o jolki ndi fii duuɓi wuluure.
Kono tawi ado ɗun, gorko wi'eteeɗo Sim'uunu no e nden saare, waɗaynooɗo mbilankaaku ŋalɗina jamaa Samariiya on, waɗitiiɗo ko tedduɗo.
Faandaare an nden ko andugol mo kanko Almasiihu on, anda bawgal immintineede makko nden, mi hawtida e makko tampereeji makko ɗin, mi wa'a wa makko ka mayde makko,
Wota a hawju fawugol juuɗe e hoore hay gooto toɗɗoo mo fii golle Alla ɗen. Wota a tawde e junuubaaji woɓɓe. Reeno, wonaa laaɓuɗo.
Yo woniran non kadi yummiraaɓe ɓen, hara jikku maɓɓe on ko moƴƴo, hara ɓe wonaali ɲo'ooɓe, maa yarooɓe, ɓe wona e jannugol ko moƴƴi,
Awa ko nii woniri: on tigguɗo jiwo mo o ƴami on, haray o waɗii ko moƴƴi, on mo tiggaali jiwo mo o ƴamaynoo on kadi, ɓurtu moƴƴinde.
Wonee huutorooɓe daaluyee on, hara hinaa on heɗotooɓe mo tun, si hinaa ɗun, haray onon tigi on ɗaynitoto woni.
Ɓawto ɗun Iisaa woni e jindugol e nder diiwal Jaliilu ngal, tawi o yiɗaa jindude few e nder diiwal Yahuuda ngal, ko fii hari hooreeɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen no ɗaɓɓude no warira mo.
E hin-le, ko kanko humindiri on e Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo tawata ko e immorde e Alla waɗiraa fii men faamu e peewal e senaare e cottudi,
Onsay o wancini ndiyan e miran, o woni e sembugol taalibaaɓe ɓen, o fittira koyɗe maɓɓe ɗen bagi mo o daditinoo on.
Miɗo cukkotonoo ɓen jokkuɓe laawol Iisaa haa woɓɓe maayori, mi haɓɓa, mi soka worɓe e rewɓe.
Ɗun waɗi haa jamaa on yeddondiri sabu makko.

Kono ndagawal mayde ko junuubu, awa kadi doole junuubu ko Sariya.

Awa tertee kala bonki e kala kippugu e faasiqiyaagal e nawliigu e kala ɲoore,
Debbo no humondiri e moodi mun fannin moodi makko no wuuri. Kono si gorko on maayii, haray no newanii mo reseede ka o faalaa woo, ko woni tun, ko yo taw ko no yaadiri e faale Joomiraaɗo on.
ɓen seluɓe goonga on, no bonnira gomɗinal woɓɓe ɓen wi'ugol wonde ummutal ngal waɗiino.
Ko fii, ko hitti e wonɓe e Iisaa Almasiihu on ɓen kon hinaa sunninegol maa angal sunninegol, kono ko gomɗinal feɲɲiniroowal hoore mun giggol.
Ɓay wonii o waɗaama Timmuɗo, o wonani ɗoftiiɓe mo ɓen fow ɓundu kisiyee poomayankeejo.
E telen-ma mottindirgol fii wallitagol yimɓe Alla ɓen, waɗiree onon kadi wano mi yamiriri mofte wonɗe Galaasi ɗen non.
Onon kadi, yo sonnaaɓe, mo kala yo yankinano moodi mun wano yankinorani non Joomiraaɗo on.
Ɓawto ɗun Iisaa yewti yimɓe ɓen, o wi'i: «Ko min woni Ndaygu aduna on. Kala on jokkuɗo lan yahataa han kadi ka nder niɓe, e hoore ɗun, ontigi heɓay ndaygu ngurndan ɗan.»
Kono onon, yo yiɓɓe, anditee fii waajuuji ɗi ɓee sahaabaaɓe Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on hiitinoo,
Hinaa neɗɗanke waɗanta mo, wa si tawii himo hatonjini e goɗɗun, ko on woni Yeɗoowo mo kala ngurndan e poopaali e kala huunde.
Hiɗen jaɓude seeditooje yimɓe ɓen, kono ko seeditoore Alla nden ɓuri mawnude, ɗun ko seeditoore nde Alla seeditii fii Ɓiɗɗo makko on nden.
Kono ɓornoɗon Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, hara on ɗaɓɓaali mbeleeɗe ɓandu fii weltingol himmeeji.
Ko gomɗinal ngal kadi tata on Yeerikoo yaniri, ɓay ɓe gaynii taaraade mo e nder balɗe jeeɗiɗi.
Tawi Allaahu on no waɗaynoo kaawakeeji moƴƴi hawniiɗi rewrude e Puulusa,
Iisaa jaabii, wi'i: «Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, kala waɗoowo junuubu haray ko o maccuɗo junuubu.
Ɓay Alla yiɗirii en nii, yo yiɓɓe, haray enen kadi hiɗen haani yiɗindirde.
A andinii lan laawi ngurndan ɗin, a hebbinay lan weltaare yeeso maa.›
Ɗoo e mi arude, cato e jangangol yimɓe ɓen daaluyee on, waajoɗaa ɓe, jannaa ɓe.
Men ɓittiraama nooneeji ɗin fow, kono men muncaaki. Men jiɓii, kono men taƴaaki.
Kono woɓɓe no awmotonoo ɓe, wi'a: «Ɓee ko yaruɓe haa mandili!»
Tawi on tata ko hayre yasbe darniraa. Tawi saare nden kaɲun ko kaŋŋe laaɓirɗo wa biini.
Tawi malaa'ikaaɓe njeeɗiɗo jogiiɓe albala'uuji ɗin jeeɗiɗi no yalta e nden nokkuure. Tawi ɓen no ɓornii conci laaɓuɗi jalbuɗi, hiɓe daditii dattii kaŋŋe ka fewndo ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Du'anoɗon cukkotooɓe on ɓen, du'ee, wota on huɗu.
koyɗe ɗen no wa'i wa sila-dane wonɗo e nder beembal yiite, hito makko ngon no wa'iti wa hito jurnde ndiyan.

On mo salanaaki en Ɓiɗɗo mun Bajjo on, kono o itti mo sadaka fii men en fow, ko honno o ronkirta en okkirde piiji ɗin fow wondude e Ɓiɗɗo on, sabu moƴƴere makko nden!

Hinaa fii meɗen laamii on e hoore gomɗinal mon ngal, kono ko men gollidooɓe e mon fii weltaare mon nden, ɓay hiɗon tabiti e nder gomɗinal ngal.
Gorko wi'eteeɗo Laazaru nawnuno ka saare Betanii, ka Mariyatu e miɲan mun Mariyama hoɗunoo ɗon.
Ko ɗun waɗi, on bugitiiɗo ngal gandal, haray hinaa neɗɗo o bugitii, kono ko Alla, on Yeɗuɗo on Ruuhu mun Seniiɗo on.
E hino no andirton si konguɗi maɓɓe ɗin ko e Ruuhu Alla on iwri: kala qirritiiɗo wonde Iisaa Almasiihu on wontuno neɗɗo, o ari ka aduna, haray ko mo Alla.
Ko wano non kadi, ɓen yimɓe ko miijotooɓe miijooji mehi, ɓe tuunina ɓandu ndun, ɓe hoyna laamateeri Joomiraaɗo on e ruuhuuji ɗin ka kammu.
Yo ontigi woɗɗito ko boni, o waɗa ko moƴƴi, o ɗaɓɓita ɓuttu on, o jokka ɗun,

kono non, ko si tawii hiɗon duumii e gomɗinal ngal, hiɗon tabintinaa, ɲiiɓinaa e maggal, hara on woɗɗitaaki tama'u mo heɓirɗon Kibaaru Moƴƴo mo nanuɗon on. On Kibaaru feɲɲinanaaɗo kala tagaaɗo ka ley kammu, ko on min Puulusa mi wonti kurkaadu mun.
Ko sabu ɗin konguɗi ɓe hocciri kaaƴe fii fiɗugol mo, kono Iisaa suuɗii, yalti ka juulirde mawnde.
ɓornoɗon tagudi mon heyri ndi Alla tagiri mbaadi mun e nder peewal e laaɓal ko rimata goonga.

Kono Allaahu on immintini mo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen.

miɗo tanƴinii, on nanii fii ɗee golle moƴƴere Alla, ɗe mi halfinaa fii mon.
Kala waɗoowo sendondiral, si a hajike mo nde wootere haa laabi ɗiɗi, o jaɓaali, pottin mo takko maa.
Sabu ɗin konguɗi, yeddondiral waɗi hakkunde Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen kadi.
Kala on jaɓuɗo nden seeditoore makko, haray ɓanginii wonde Alla ko goonga.
Ko ɗun waɗi, yo yiɓɓe, e nder nden habbannde, etee fii, nde o aroyi, no o tawira on e nder ɓuttu, hara on aldaa e waadere, on aldaa e ella.
Ka rawnoode, yo musiɓɓe, toranee men fii no daaluyee Joomiraaɗo on lollira e no mawniniree, wano o lolliri e mawniri ka mon non,
e nder andugol wonde, on Immintinɗo Iisaa Joomi on, o immintiniday en kadi e Iisaa, o weeɓitida men e mon yeeso makko.
E hara kadi goɗɗo e mon no nawni? Yo ontigi noddu ardotooɓe moftal ngal, ɓentigi toranoo mo e hoore juurugol nebban e hoore makko e innde Joomiraaɗo on.
«Ɓay wonii o timminii duuɓi cappanɗe nay, o miijii e ɓernde makko fii ƴewtoyagol musiɓɓe makko ɓen, ɗun ko Banii-Isra'iila'en.
«Awa oo neɗɗo mo mi naɓani on, ko Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen wonnoo ko nangi mo fii warugol. Nde mi humpitinoo wonde ko o jeyaaɗo e laamateeri Roomu, mi ardi e mojobere suufaaɓe, mi jattini mo ɓe.
Onsay saare nden fow jiiɓondiri, ɓe wubbidi, ɓe saalori ɓee Masedoniyankooɓe ɓe Puulusa jindidaynoo, ɗun ko Gayuusi e Aristarke, ɓe naɓori ɓe ka fijirde mawnde.
Kono onon yedduɗon on Seniiɗo Feewuɗo, toriɗon sulfu fii yo on accitane warnooɗo yimɓe goo,
O waɗaali hay fus ko serti hakkunde men e maɓɓe, ko fii ko gomɗinal maɓɓe ngal o laɓɓiniri ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗen.
Awa, yo mo kala miijitano hoore mun si o ɲaama on bireedi, maa o yarira kun jardukun.
Awa yo musiɓɓe an yiɗaaɓe, wonee tabituɓe ɓe dillintaako, ɓurtee ɓeydaade e golle Joomiraaɗo on, e hoore andugol wonde, golle mon ɗen e telen-ma Joomiraaɗo on hinaa meere.
Awa mi wakkilinii on yo on wonu ɲembooɓe lan.
Ko fii, ɓay aduna on e faamu mun ngun andaali Alla e nder faamu Alla ngun, tawi no wela Alla ka o dandira gomɗinɓe ɓen waaju men wa'ungu wa feetere ngun.
Onon kadi yo rewɓe wano non, mo kala e mon yo yankinano moodi mun. Ɗun si woɓɓe e maɓɓe ɗoftaaki daaluyee on, ɓe gomɗiniray sabu kuuɗe rewɓe maɓɓe ɓen e ɓaawo kongol,
Awa ko men ɓe Almasiihu on immini wa si tawii Alla no rewrude e amen fii waajagol. Awa men jeejii on e innde Almasiihu on: wonee weldituɓe e Alla.
Allaahu on immintinii mo, o sortii mo e nder ndin muuseendi mayde, ko fii hari gasataa ka nguli mayde kin jogoo mo ton.
E hinaa ɓen woni hoynooɓe innde teddunde nde inniraɗon nden?
hara hinaa yaroowo mandila, hinaa ɲaaɗuɗo, kono hara ko o newiiɗo, hara hinaa yeddondirteeɗo, hara ko mo haajaaka e ngaluuji aduna,
On yaruɗo non ndiyan ɗan mi okkorta mo ɗan, ɗonɗetaake hande kadi. Kono ndiyan ɗan mi okkorta mo ɗan wontay e makko ɓundu ndiyan, ɓuloojan fii yeɗugol ngurndan poomayankejan.»
Kono kala ɗoftiiɗo daaluyee makko on, haray giggol Alla ngol no timmi e makko, ko non andirten hiɗen humondiri e makko.
Mi yi'i ruuhuuji tati tuunuɗi nanditayɗi e toti-paccala no yalta ka sekko ngin ningiwii e ka sekko kullii ngin e ka hunduko waɗitiiɗo annabaajo on.
Kono si on ɗoftike sariya mawɗo on, wano bindi ɗin wi'iri non wonde: «Yo a yiɗir ɲokondo maa on wano yiɗirɗaa hoore maa non», haray on waɗii ko moƴƴi.
Hinaa fii amen tigi men woni waajaade, kono ko fii Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi on men woni waajaade, menen non ko men kurkaaɗi mon sabu Iisaa.
Awa wota on ɗaynito, ko fii wondiɓɓe bonɓe bonnay jikkuuji moƴƴi.
Yo Alla Jom Ɓuttu on, on Artirɗo e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen Iisaa Joomi men, Ngaynaako Mawɗo baali ɗin, rewrude e ƴiiƴan ahadi poomayankeeri ndin,

Ko woni tun, woniree e noone no haanirani Kibaaru Moƴƴo Almasiihu on. Woni mi aru yi'ugol on, woni mi araali, yo mi nanu tun no wowlee fii mon wonde hiɗon tabiti e miijo wooto, tippiranon gomɗinal Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e nder anniyee gooto,
Awa kadi Alla, on Immintinɗo Joomi on, immintiniray en bawgal makko ngal.
Ko ɗun waɗi si mi wakkilinii ma huɓɓitugol ngal dokkal Alla, ngal hendornoɗaa fawugol juuɗe an ɗen e hoore maa.
Ko ɗun waɗi si hay mayɓe ɓen feɲɲinanaa Kibaaru Moƴƴo on, fii nde ɓe ɲaawiroyaa wa neɗɗanke ka ɓandu, yo ɓe wuuroy ka ruuhu wano Alla wuuriri non.
Awa on sottiraama coggu sattungu, wota on wontu maccuɓe yimɓe ɓen.
Wota on ŋermu, wano ɓeya ŋermirnoo non, ɓen ɓe malaa'ikaajo muloowo on warunoo.
Ko fii men wa'aa wa woɓɓe, baanorɓe daaluyee Alla on, kono ko e nder haqiiqa men yewtirta e innde Alla, e yeeso Alla e nder humondiral amen e Almasiihu on.
Enen tiiɗuɓe e gomɗinal ɓen, hiɗen haani tambitaade lo'ereeji ɓen ɓe tiiɗaa ka gomɗinal, e wota en ɗaɓɓu ko welata en kon.
Awa kadi miɗo hoolori Joomiraaɗo on, wonde min tigi mi yahay ko neeɓaa.
Ɓawto ɗun mi yi'i malaa'ikaaɓe nayo no darii e coɓɓuli leydi ndin nay, hiɓe jogitii keneeli cenɗe aduna on nay fii wota hendu wifu e hoore leydi ndin e ka hoore baharu e hoore leggal woo kadi.

Awa e saa'i feƴƴunooɗo on, on ɓooyii waɗude ko ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen yiɗi waɗude kon, fewndo jokkondirɗon e maɓɓe e nder jiiɓaare e himmeeji bonɗi e mandilugol e fasaadu e mottondirgol ka mandiletee e dewal sanamuuji harmungal.
Si goɗɗo no faalaa ɓe waɗude ko boni, yiite yaltay ka kundule maɓɓe, ɲaama ayɓe maɓɓe ɓen. Ko nii kala faalaaɗo ɓe waɗude ko boni warirte.
Onsay Puulusa jaabii, wi'i: «Musiɓɓe, hari mi andaa wonde ko yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka on nii, ko fii no windii: Wota mo wowla yeesoojo jamaa mun on ko boni.»
Kono dawaaɗi ɗin e mbileeɓe ɓen e jinooɓe ɓen e ittooɓe ko'e ɓen e rewooɓe sanamu ɓen e kala on yiɗuɗo fenaande huutori yo wonu ka yaasi.

‹Kono no woodi ton ko mettimmi e maa. Hiɗa mari ton yimɓe jogitiiɓe jannde Bal'ama nden, on jannunooɗo oo wi'eteeɗo Balaka fegginirgol Banii-Isra'iila'en ɲammingol ɓe tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji, jokkina ɓe jinaa.
Meɗen haani, yo musiɓɓe, duumaade e jarnugol Alla fii mon, ɗun-le ko ko feewi, ko fii gomɗinal mon ngal no ɓeydaade, awa kadi giggol ngol yiɗindirɗon ngol ko e ɓeydaade tun woni.
Hiɗon andi fewndo ko on gomɗinaa, hiɗon selnaa, nawraa e sanamuuji mbobooji.
Onon kadi, yo duhiiɓe, mo kala e mon yo yiɗu sonnaajo mun on wano Almasiihu on yiɗiri moftal ngal non, haa o okkitiri hoore makko fii maggal.
Wota on yoɓitir gooto bone bone. Waɗee ko yimɓe ɓen fow ndaarata tawa no moƴƴi.
Awa, jippinee hoore mon e ley jungo Alla dolnungo ngon fii yo o ɓantoy on e saa'i mo o toɗɗii on.

e hoore o accaali seeditorgol moƴƴere nde o waɗata nden, ɗun ko yeɗugol on ndiyan saaƴoojan iwrude ka kammu e saa'iiji moƴƴooji fii demal, e timminangol on neemaaji e hebbingol ɓerɗe mon ɗen welo-welo.»
Rewɓe ɓen kadi wano non, yo ɓe wonu tedduɓe, hara ɓe wonaali ɲo'ooɓe, ɓe wona waawuɓe hoore maɓɓe e sella-findeeɓe e kala huunde.
Mi okkii mo saa'i fii no o tuubira, kono o faalaaka tuubude on jinaa makko.

Tawi kanko Heroodu himo haɓidi e Tiiriyankooɓe ɓen e Siduunayankooɓe ɓen. Ɓe ari ɓe tawi mo e nder nanondiral maɓɓe. Ɓay ɓe hettii Balastuusa oo dankotooɗo kaybonru lanɗo on, ɓe torii ɓuttu, sabu tawde ko leydi on lanɗo tambitinoo leydi maɓɓe ndin.
Kono Iisaa jaabii ɓe, wi'i: «Min, jinna alaa e an, kono mi teddinay woni Ben an, kono onon hiɗon hayfinde lan.
Onsay hendu dolnundu wifi, ndiyan weendu ndun yeƴii.
Miɗo felliti tampereeji oo saa'i fewndiiɗo foddaa eɓɓindireede e mangu aroyoowu feɲɲinanoyteengu en ngun.
Miɗo windande on, yo fayɓe, ɓay junuubaaji mon ɗin yaaforaama sabu innde makko nden.

on Danduɗo en, noddi en fii no naɓiren ngurndan men ɗan no laaɓiri, hara hinaa sabu kuuɗe men ɗen, kono ko sabu haajaande makko nden tigi e moƴƴere nde yeɗiraɗen sabu Iisaa Almasiihu on nden, ado saa'iiji poomayankeeji ɗin.

Ɓay hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen e suufaaɓe ɓen yi'ii mo, ɓe ewnii, ɓe wi'i: «Fempee mo! Fempee mo!» Pilaatu kadi wi'i ɓe: «Ƴettee mo onon tigi, fempon. Ko fii min mi yi'aali hujja fawuɗo mo donkineede.»
Oo kisiyee ko huunde nde annabaaɓe ɓen ɗaɓɓitunoo tefi fii mun, ɗun ko ɓee hiitinooɓe fii oo sulfu sutiiɗo on.
Ko fii ɗaynooɓe ɗuuɗuɓe naatii e nder aduna on, ɓe jaɓaali wonde Iisaa Almasiihu on wontuno neɗɗo o ari ka aduna. Ko ɓee woni ɗaynooɓe e liddotooɓe Almasiihu on ɓen.
«Men taw oo neɗɗo ko gerenteejo, memminoowo yeddondire e hakkunde Yahuudiyankeeɓe aduna on fow. Ko o yeesoojo fedde Naasirayaaɓe ɓen kadi.

Awa kadi no fellitaa wonde gundoo ngal dewal no mawni: «Ɗun ko on feeɲirɗo ɓandu, holliraaɗo Ruuhu Alla ko o feewuɗo, feeɲanɗo malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen, on jantaaɗo fii mun e hakkunde leƴƴi ɗin, o gomɗinaa e nder aduna on, o ƴentinaa ka kammu e nder mangural.»

Marmalle njane, ɗe tawata nde bee e majje ko wa kilooji cappanɗe nay, iwi ka kammu, yani e hoore yimɓe ɓen. Ɓe woni e hoynugol Alla sabu on albala'u iwruɗo e ɗen marmalle, ko fii hari on albala'u ko tiiɗuɗo haa feƴƴiti.
Kono enen hiɗen habbii fodaari Alla ndin, ɗun ko kammu hesu e leydi heyri ka peewal ngal hoɗoyta ɗon.
Tawi kammu ngun no dira taggora wa gatal, awa kadi pelle ɗen e suriije ɗen fow dirti ka wonnoo ɗon.
Awa, ko sabu faale Alla on laɓɓinaɗen fii wonugol yimɓe makko, rewrude e oo sadaka mo Iisaa Almasiihu on ittiri ɓandu mun ndun tigi nde wootere ko yoni haa poomaa.
Meɗen duumii e jarnugol Alla fii mon on fow, e meɗen anditude fii mon on fow e nder torndeeji amen ɗin.
Ɗon kadi puccu goo yalti, tawi hingu wojjiri wa yiite. Waɗɗinooɗo ngu on hendii bawgal ittugol ɓuttu ngun ka hoore leydi fii no yimɓe ɓen warindirira. O jonnaa kaafa njana.
Yo jiyaaɓe ɓen fow jogor jeyɓe ɗun ɓen wa handuɓe e teddungal timmungal, fii wota innde Alla nden e jannde nden hoyne.
Wota on fenindiran, onon ɓee ɓortiiɓe tagu hinngu ngun e kuuɗe mun,

‹Kono feloore nde mi jogani-maa nden, ko ko accuɗaa oo debbo wi'eteeɗo Yeezabeela, wi'itiiɗo ko annabaajo, janni faljini kurkaaɗi an ɗin kon fii yo ɓe jokku jinaa, ɓe ɲaama tebbeeli sakkanaaɗi sanamuuji.

Awa kadi bindi ɗin no wi'i wonde Alla jogitoroyay ɓe wonaa Yahuudiyanke ɓen feewuɓe sabu gomɗinal ngal, ɗun ko ka Allaahu on adii feɲɲinde Kibaaru Moƴƴo on e Ibraahiima ɗon, o daali: «Leƴƴi ɗin fow barkinte sabu maa.»
Awa kadi on yejjitii kongol ngol Allaahu on wakkiliri on ngol wa ɓiɓɓe makko: «Ɓiɗɗo an, wota a jogitor wurtannde Joomiraaɗo on no hayfiri, awa kadi wota ɓernde maa maayu nde o wurtu-maa.
Ɗoftee ardotooɓe on ɓen, yankinanoɗon ɓe. Ko fii hiɓe ayni fota wonkiiji mon ɗin, wa hunitoytooɓe ka Alla. Awa etee ɓe waɗa ɗun e hoore weltaare, hara hinaa no mettirta ɓe. Si hinaa ɗun, nafoytaa on.
Onsay ɓay o mulii leƴƴi jeeɗiɗi e nder ndii leydi Kanaana, o yeɗi baabiraaɓe men ɓen laral leydi ɓen ndin.
Si goɗɗo no jannirde noone goo, hara o alaa jokkude konguɗi selluɗi Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on, e janndeeji yaaduɗi e laawol Alla ngol,
On mo ari e mon, addoraali nden jannde, wota on wernu mo ka suudu mon, awa kadi wota on hiwro mo.
Ko fii, ko wano tampereeji Almasiihu on layirta e hoore men non, ko wano non wakkilaare men nden layirta immorde e Almasiihu on.
Bone wonanii ɓe, ko fii ɓe jokkii laawol Qaayiina ngol, ɓe ukkori e ella fii heɓugol njoddi wano Bal'ama non, awa kadi ɓe muliri sabu murtaldu maɓɓe wano Qooraha non.
Kono ɓen yimɓe no hoyna ko ɓe andaa, ko ɓe andani hoore maɓɓe kon kadi no wa'i wa mummunte ɗi alaa miijoo-miccoo, ɗun-le ko halkayɗun ɓe.

Ko gomɗinal ngal fahin Nuuhu moƴƴinirnoo laana fii dandugol ɓeynguure mun nden. Ko nii o teddiniri ko Alla hiitaninoo mo fii ko aroyta yi'aaka taho kon. Ɓay o warrii non kanko Nuuhu, tawi o hollii wonde yimɓe aduna on ko felniiɓe. Alla jogori Nuuhu feewuɗo sabu gomɗinal makko ngal.
Nde tawnoo ɗun fow ko non joɗɗiniranoo, yottinooɓe sadaka ka Alla ɓen naatayno soono woo ka nokkuure aranere e nder rewirdu ndun, fii waɗugol golle diina maɓɓe kan.
«Ko onon yo yimɓe yoora-hooreeɓe, ɓe ɓerɗe mun e ɓe noppi mun uddi, onon non ko on dartotooɓe soono woo Ruuhu Seniiɗo on, wano baabiraaɓe mon ɓen dartoraynoo non!

Awa kadi anden Sariya on waɗiraaka fii feewuɓe ɓen, kono ko fii bonɓe ɓen e dartiiɓe ɓen e heeferɓe ɓen e junuubankeeɓe ɓen e ɓe rewataa Alla ɓen e hayfinooɓe fii Alla ɓen e warooɓe ben mun e yumma mun ɓen e ittooɓe ko'e ɓen
Mi windanii on ka nder ɓatakuru an wonde, wota on humondir e jeenooɓe ɓen.
Kono, nde Allaahu on, on Suɓinooɗo lan gila ka teege yumma an, ɗun ko on Noddirɗo lan moƴƴere mun nden,
Ko fii mi faamaa ko mi woni waɗude kon. Ko mi yiɗi kon kadi mi alaa waɗude ɗun, kono ko ko mi aɲi kon mi woni waɗude.
Awa ɓeydee yaarude yeeso e nder moƴƴere nden e andugol Joomi men on, on Dandoowo, ɗun ko Iisaa Almasiihu on, on mo mangural wonani jooni e haa poomaa. Aamiina!
Ko men jogoraaɓe wa feetuɓe sabu Almasiihu on, kono onon ko on faamuɓe sabu Almasiihu on! Ko men jogoraaɓe wa lo'uɓe, kono onon ko on dolnuɓe. Ko on teddinaaɓe, kono menen ko men hayfinaaɓe!
Dartoree mo kanko Ibuliisa no tiiɗiri e nder gomɗinal ngal, e hoore yo on andu ko tampereeji gooti fawaɗon onon e musiɓɓe mon wonɓe e nder aduna on fow.

Onon kadi yo jiyaaɓe, ɗoftee jeyɓe on jeyal adunayankewal ɓen e ɗi fow, hara hinaa non e gite maɓɓe tun, wa si tawii on ɗaɓɓay woni no yimɓe ɓen yiɗira on, kono hara ko ɓernde laaɓunde e nder kulol Joomiraaɗo on.
«Galaaɗi sappo ɗi yi'uɗaa ɗin ko lamɓe sappo, ɓe fuɗɗaaki taho laamaade, kono ko hendorayɓe laamu wa lamɓe e nder saa'i gooto fii laamodugol e kullii ngin.
E hin-le enen, hinaa ruuhu oo aduna hendiɗen, kono ko Ruuhu iwruɗo e Alla, fii no andiren ko Alla yeɗiri en sulfu makko on kon.
Jooni non, yo onon alɗuɓe, wullee sowru tiiɗundu, sabu tampereeji aroyayɗi e hoore mon ɗin!

Wota a hulu ko faandiɗaa tampude kon. Awa Ibuliisa no faandii bugaade woɓɓe e mon ka kaso fii no ndarndore ɗon. On heɓay ton tampere e nder balɗe sappo. Kono gomɗin haa maayaa, ɗun mi yeɗete meetelol ngurndan ngol.
An non, oo aaden Alla, dogu ɗin piiji, ɗaɓɓitaa peewal ngal e wuurirgol no Alla faaliraa non e gomɗinal ngal e giggol ngol e wakkilaare nden e newaare nden.
On wuuririi ka aduna ɗoo e nder mbeleeɗe e ko foti. On fayinii hoore mon e ndee ɲalaande nde hirseteɗon e mun.
Tawi kadi julle laamu noogay e nay no hundunoo nden jullere laamu, awa kadi mawɓe noogay e nayo, ɓorniiɓe daneeji, taaruɓe meetelli kaŋŋe, no jooɗinoo e majje.

Wano nde mawninornoo non, e no nde yollornoo e mbeleeɗe non, jonnitiree nde wano non tampere e yoomere! Ko fii hinde wi'i ka ɓernde mayre: ‹Min miɗo jooɗii e nder laamu, hinaa mi heynotooɗo, awa kadi mi yoomataa few!›

Onon moodiɓɓe ɓen kadi wano non, mo kala e mon yo wondir e sonnaajo mun on e hoore andugol wonde rewɓe ɓen ko ɓe neɗɗanke ɓurɓe lo'ude. Teddiniron ɓe wa ronidooɓe e mon ngurndan ɗan Alla yeɗi on ɗan, fii wota hay huunde haɗu torndeeji mon ɗin.
Mi yamiraali non debbo jannugol, maa laamagol gorko, kono ko yo o deeƴu.
Alla ko Sella-Findeejo, ɗun ko on Nodduɗo on fii yuɓɓondirgol e Ɓiɗɗo makko on, Iisaa Almasiihu Joomi men on.
Musiɓɓe, jooni on noddaama ka ndimankaaku. Wota on ɓaaror ngun ndimankaaku mon fii waɗugol mbeleeɗe ɓandu, kono kurkondiranee e nder giggol.
Awa yewtiree huuwiron wa yimɓe ɲaawiroyteeɓe Sariya rinɗinoowo on.
Balle ɗen kadi no serti, kono Joomiraaɗo on ko gooto.
e maamankaaku Isra'iila'en ngun wonani. Awa kadi Almasiihu on ko ƴiiƴan maɓɓe, on Wonɗo Alla e dow kala huunde, mo mantoore wonani haa poomaa. Aamiina!
Si tawii men tampii, ko fii wakkilaare mon nden e fii kisiyee mon on. Si tawii men wakkilinaama, ko fii no wakkilinireɗon, no wawnireɗon ŋaɲɲaade tampereeji gooti e ɗi men woni naɓude ɗin.
Ko Alla woni fellintinanoowo en fow wonde hiɗen humondiri e Almasiihu on. Ko kanko kadi suɓii en,
Ka ɗimmun o nani hawa kan no wi'a mo: «Wota a jogor ko Allaahu on laɓɓini kon wa ko tuuni.»
Lamɓe aduna ɓen fow, wattodunooɓe e mayre e nder jinaa e mbeleeɗe, wulloyay fesa fii mayre, nde ɓe yi'i curki sumugol mayre on.
Iisaa jaabii mo, wi'i : «Kala yiɗuɗo lan ɗoftoto kongol an ngol, Ben an yiɗa mo, men ara e makko, men daakoo ka makko.
E hino ko woni ngol giggol kon: hinaa ko yiɗuɗen Alla kon, kono ko ko o yiɗi en kon, o addiri Ɓiɗɗo makko on sadaka fii no heɓiren yaafuyee junuubaaji men ɗin.
Kono si tawii hiɗen yahude e nder ndaygu ngun, wano o woniri non kanko tigi ka nder ndaygu, haray hiɗen humondiri, ɗun haray ƴiiƴan Iisaa Ɓiɗɗo makko on no laɓɓinde en e kala junuubu.
Ɗun haray hinaa a maccuɗo hande kadi, kono ko a ɓiɗɗo. Si tawii-le ko a ɓiɗɗo, haray ko a ronoowo immorde e Alla.
Kono fii Ɓiɗɗo on o daali: «Jullere maa laamu nden, yaa an Alla, luttay haa poomaa, labbooru maa laamu ndun ko labbooru peewal.
Onsay Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen jaabii mo, wi'i: «Men fiɗirtaa ma fii kuugal moƴƴal, kono ko fii ko hoynuɗaa kon, e tawde kadi an, ko a neɗɗo, hiɗa waɗitii Alla.»
Curki lette maɓɓe ɗen ƴaway haa poomaa, e hoore fowtaare alanaa ɓe jemma e ɲalorma, ɗun non ko kala on sujjanɗo ngin kullii e nandolla maggii on, e kala on heɓuɗo maande innde maggii on.»
Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓay Alla yeɗii men ɗen golle e nder yurmeende makko nden, maayu ɓernde heɓataa men.
Mo kala e men no waawi wi'ude e nder pellital: «Ko Joomiraaɗo on woni faabo an ngon, mi hulataa. Ko honɗun neɗɗo waawanimmi?»
On ɲaamoowo ko woni woo, wota ɲiddin few mo ɲaamataa ko woni woo on. On mo ɲaamataa kadi, wota felu ɲaamoowo on, ko fii Alla no jaɓi mo kala.
Yo Alla, Jom ŋaɲɲaare nden e Jom wakkilaare nden, yeɗu on wonugol miijo wooto, e nder jokkugol misal Iisaa Almasiihu on,

mo hatonjinaa e ittugol sadakaaji wano yottinooɓe mawɓe ɓen ittirta ɲande woo sadakaaji fii junuubaaji maɓɓe ɗin, kamɓe tigi taho, e ɗi jamaa on ɗin kadi. Iisaa waɗii ɗun nde wootere ko yoni fii saa'iiji ɗin fow, e nder ko o itti hoore makko sadaka kon.
Si tawii goɗɗo no mari ngaluuji aduna, o yi'ii musiɗɗo makko sokolɗo, o ombanii mo gite, haray ko honno giggol Alla ngol wonirta e makko?
Hiɗen heewi wakkilaare, ko ɓurɗen faaleede ko seedugol e nduu ɓandu hoɗa moggo Joomiraaɗo on.
Ko onon, yo yiɓɓe, hoɓɓe jananɓe, mi wakkilinii on e reenagol ɗii himmeeji neɗɗanke, ɗi tawata ko haɓooji wonkii.
Teddinee fow, yiɗon musiɓɓe gomɗinɓe ɓen, hulon Alla, teddinon lanɗo on.
Tawi himo sikka musiɓɓe makko ɓen faamay wonde Allaahu on yeɗii ɓe kisiyee tippude e sookeeje makko ɗen, kono kamɓe ɓe faamaali ɗun.
Awa reenee e dawaaɗi ɗin, reenoɗon e gollooɓe bonɓe ɓen, reenoɗon e barajeliiɓe ɓen.
Hiɓe wi'i ko ɓe anduɓe Alla, kono kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗen no yeddi ɗun, ko fii ko ɓe harmuɓe, murtuɓe, ɓe waawataa laatinde kala kuugal moƴƴal.
Kono miɗo seeditanaade ɓe ɗunɗoo: hiɓe himmani fii Alla, kono hinaa tippude e gandal.
on wakkilinoowo en e nder kala tampereeji men, fii no enen kadi waawiren wakkilinirde ɓen wonɓe e nder kala noone tampereeji wakkilaare nde heɓirɗen Alla nden enen tigi.
Eto no weeɓitoraa yeeso Alla wa neɗɗo haanaaɗo jaɓeede, ɗun ko golloowo mo hersaa, e tindinoowo daaluyee goongaajo on no feewiri.
ɗun ko on dartotooɗo immoo daroo e hoore kala ko neɗɗanke inni ko alla e hoore kala ko rewetee, o yaha haa o jooɗoyoo ka juulirde Alla mawnde, o wi'itoo kanko tigi Alla.
Onon kadi non, yo baabiraaɓe, wota on mettin ɓerɗe fayɓe mon ɓen, kono ne'iree ɓe waajagol ɓe, eltira laawol Joomiraaɗo on.
Kono e nder ɗun fow, ko en fooluɓe, hiɗen ɓuri fooluɓe kadi, sabu Yiɗuɗo en on.

Men fow men yani ka leydi. Onsay mi nani hawa no wi'ammi e haala Yahuudiyanke: ‹Saawulu! Saawulu! Ko fii honɗun wonɗaa mi cukkanaade? Ko fii no mettan-maa fii dartorgol wa ngaari dartotoondi soggirdu jom mun.›

‹Miɗo andi tampere nde tampuɗaa nden e miskinankaaku maa ngun, hara-le ko a galo. Awa kadi miɗo andi hoyre nde ɓee wi'itiiɓe Yahuudiyankeeɓe, hara hinaa ɓe ɗun, wonu-maa hoynude nden, hara ɓen ko ɓe moftal Ibuliisa.
Ngol weltortaa angal peewal, kono ko goonga ngol weltorta.
Awa sertee e kala ko tuuninta e kala bonki layuki, jaɓiron newaare daaluyee aawaaɗo e mon on, ɗun ko on waawuɗo dandude wonkiiji mon ɗin.
Min mi tutu, Apoloosi yarni, kono ko Allaahu on mawnini.
Malaa'ikaajo ɗimmo hikkiiɗo e arano on kadi wi'i: «Nde yanii! Ndee saare Baabiila mawnde mandilinirnde leƴƴi ɗin fow himmeeji jinaa mun, yanii!»
Si on waɗii ko mi yamiri on kon, haray ko on yiɓɓe an.
Ko onon, yo fayɓe, reenee e sanamuuji ɗin!
No woodi e maɓɓe naatooɓe ka cuuɗi, pooɗa rewɓe lo'uɓe fawiiɓe junuubi, ɓe kala noone himmeeji ardii.
Kono, wowlugol goonga e nder giggol, en mawnay e kala huunde e telen-ma on wonɗo hoore, ɗun ko Almasiihu on.
Etee no tabintiniron pottal, ngal Ruuhu on yeɗata, e nder ɓuttu yuɓɓindirɗo on on.
On jaabii, o wi'i: «Ko an hombo nii, yaa an Joomi an?» Onsay kanko Joomi on o jaabii mo, o wi'i: «Ko min woni Iisaa on mo wonɗaa cukkaade.
Hormoree Almasiihu on ka ɓerɗe mon wa Joomi on. Wonee ɲande woo hebuliiɓe fii jaabagol landotooɓe on dalil tama'u mon on ɓen.
«Joomiraaɗo on daalani mo kadi, wi'i: ‹Solu paɗe maa ɗen, ko fii ndee nokkuure nde wonɗaa e mun ko nokkuure hormorde.›
Onon non, ko nanuɗon kon gila ka fuɗɗoode no haani wonude ka ɓerɗe mon. Si tawii ko nanuɗon kon gila ka fuɗɗoode wonii ka ɓerɗe mon, haray onon kadi on humondirii e Ɓiɗɗo on e Baabaajo on.
Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, mo ɗoftike kongol an ngol, o maayataa few.»
Mi yi'i kadi jullere laamu moolanaande daneere e jooɗiiɗo e mayre on. Tun kammu ngun e leydi ndin dogi mo, ɗin ronki heɓude ka wona.
Neemaaji ɗin ko fii reedu, reedu ndun kadi fii neemaaji ɗin, Alla kadi mulay ɗi fow. Awa kadi ɓandu ndun hinaa fii jinaa, kono ko ndu fii Joomiraaɗo on, Joomiraaɗo on kadi fii ɓandu ndun.
Onon kadi wano non, jogoree hoore mon wa mayɓe e telen-ma junuubu, e wa wuuranɓe Alla e nder humondiral e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Yo mantoore wonan Alla, on Wonɗo en okkude polgal soono woo e nder humondiral men e Almasiihu on, on Wonɗo en huutorde fii feɲɲingol nokku kala urngol andugol Almasiihu on.
E hino kibaaru mo men naniri mo on, meɗen ɓanginande on mo: Alla ko ndaygu, niwre woo alaa e makko.
Kono ɓe Baabaajo on yeɗi lan ɓen fow aray e an, kala non on arɗo e an mi raɗotaako mo.
Yo giggol siɗɗankaaku ngol duumo.
Ko ɗun waɗi kadi, himo waawi dandude few ɓen wonɓe ɓadorde Alla sabu makko kanko Iisaa, ɓay himo wuuri haa poomaa fii fattanagol ɓe.

Kono ɓe ewnii, ɓe wi'i: «Yo o ware! Yo o ware! Fempee mo!» Pilaatu kadi landii ɓe: «Yo mi fempu Lanɗo mon on?» Onsay hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka ɓen jaabii mo, wi'i: «Menen men maraa lanɗo goo si wonaa lanɗo mawɗo Roomu on!»
Ko wano non kadi e oo saa'i fewndiiɗo, no woodi heddiiɓe ɓe Alla suɓori sulfu mun on.
Ko e makko, kanko on debbo cagaajo, lamɓe aduna ɓen jokkiri jinaa, e hoɗuɓe ka aduna ɓen mandiliri jinaa makko on!»
Yiɗindiron giggol siɗɗankaaku, mo kala e mon jogitora oya wa burɗo ɗun teddude.
Ko fii kala ɓe Ruuhu Alla on ardii, ko ɓiɓɓe Alla.
Maande goo kadi feeɲi ka kammu: tawi e hino ningiwii njanin boɗewii, ngii ko'e jeeɗiɗi e galaaɗi sappo, tawi katanji jeeɗiɗi no e hoore ɗen ko'e.
Ko ɗun waɗi, si tawii ko en ɓiɓɓe makko, haray kadi ko en ronooɓe mo kanko Alla, ronidooɓe e Almasiihu on, si tawii e nder haqiiqa hiɗen tampidude e makko fii no tawireɗen e mangural makko ngal.
Ardotooɓe moftal ngal moƴƴa no handi e teddungal sowondirngal, tentinii ɓen wakkiliiɓe yangi waajagol e jannugol.
Kono fow alaa ngal gandal. Ko ɗun waɗi, ɓen wowtuɓe sanamuuji, haa jooni si no ɲaamude ngun teewu anditay fii ko sakkaa kon. Nde tawnoo ɓernde maɓɓe nden no lo'i, ɗun tuuninay ɓe.
O taƴay kala salndu wonndu e an ndu rimataa, o feppita rimooji ɗin fow haa ɗi laaɓa fii yo ɗi ɓurtu rimude.
Wota on hollu mbawdi e hoore ɓe halfinaɗon ɓen, kono wonanon wuro ngon misal.
Men faalaaka, yo musiɓɓe, yo on ronku andude fii mayɓe ɓen, fii wota on heɓu sokola, wano ɓeya ɓe alaa tama'u ɓen.
Ko gomɗinal ngal fahin ɓe taƴitiri Baharu Boɗeejo on wa leydi yorndi, kono nde Misirayankooɓe ɓen eɓɓunoo waɗirgol non, ɓe yoolino.
Ko fewndo on saa'i ɗon Muusaa jibinaa, tawi himo labaa yeeso Alla. O muyninaa lebbi tati ka galle ben makko.
Himo waawi yurmeede ɓe faamaa ɓen e seluɓe ɓen, ko fii kanko tigi lo'ereeji no hundi mo.
Jemma on muutike, ɓadike weetude, awa ɓortoɗen kuuɗe niwre nden, ɓornoɗen aalaaji ndaygu ngun.
Onon non kadi, yo rimɓe, waɗiree wano non e telen-ma jiyaaɓe mon ɓen, reenoɗon e kambugol, e nder andugol wonde Jeyɗo ɓe on e Jeyɗo on on no ka kammu, awa kadi yeeso makko giɗaale alaa.
Weltodee e ɓen wonɓe weltaade, wullidon e wonɓe wullude ɓen.
Kono sabu sattere maa fii nden e ɓernde maa yoorunde nden, hiɗa mooɓa tikkere fii ɲalaande tikkere nden, ɗun ko fii ɲande feeɲugol ɲaawoore Alla feewunde nden,
Onsay Yahuudiyankeeɓe iwri Antiyoosi-Pisidii e Ikoniim, ɓe murtini jamaa on, ɓe hawtiti, ɓe fiɗi Puulusa kaaƴe haa ɓe sikki o maayii, ɓe daasi mo, ɓe naɓi ka ɓaawo saare.
Ɓay wonii kanko Iisaa o yewtii ɗun, ɓernde makko nden aani, o holli ɗunɗoo, o wi'i: «Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, goɗɗo e mon janfoto lan.»
Ko ɗun waɗi si bindi ɗin wi'i fow no sokaa e ley junuubi, fii no fodaari ndin yeɗiree gomɗinɓe ɓen sabu ko ɓe gomɗini Iisaa Almasiihu on kon.
Nde ɓe timminoyi seeditoore maɓɓe nden, kullii iwroyayngii ka gaygii ngin alaa kattudi ngin haɓoyay ɓe, ngii foola ɓe, ngii wara.
Ko fii en wonii kafiduɓe e Almasiihu on, si tawii en jogitike fota pellital men aranal ngal haa ka sakkitorun,
Si tawii Almasiihu on no e mon, haray ɓandu ndun maayii sabu junuubu on, kono haray ruuhu on no wuuri sabu peewal ngal.
E hara, ko hombo e annabaaɓe ɓen wonnoo mo baabiraaɓe mon ɓen ɓittinaano? Hay ɓe warno ɓen adinooɓe hiitaade fii arugol Feewuɗo on, on mo janfiɗon warɗon,
e ngaɲaneendi e mandilugol e fasaadu e ko nandi e mun. Miɗo haɗude on, wano mi haɗirnoo on non wonde, ɓen wuurirɓe nii heɓoytaa geɓal ka laamu Alla.
Awa fewndo ka marɗon ndaygu ɗon, hoolee ngu, fii no woniron fayɓe ndaygu ngun.» Ɓay Iisaa wi'ii ɗun, onsay o yahi, o suuɗii ɓe.
O wonno sella-findeejo e telen-ma on Toɗɗiiɗo mo, wano Muusaa wonirnoo non e nder suudu Alla ndun fow.
Ko Iisaa Almasiihu, Danduɗo en on, Alla tippiniri on Ruuhu e hoore men haa heewi,
Yuusufu kadi, ɗun ko on mo sahaabaaɓe ɓen jammi Barnabaasi (ko woni firo ɗun ko «wakkilinoowo»), on ko Lewiyankeejo mo Siipuru,
Wota en haaɓu waɗugol ko moƴƴi, ko fii en wa'oyay e saa'i haanuɗo si maayu ɓernde heɓaali en.
E telen-ma Sariya on, ko mi mayɗo ka baŋŋe Sariya fii no mi wuurirana Allaahu on.
Mi jonnaa kadi kuɗol kalin nanditayngol e sawru, mi wi'aa: «Immo etaa suudu Alla ndun e layyorde nden, limaa rewooɓe ton ɓen.

Ɗun ko ɓen ɓe tuuninoraali rewɓe, ɓe woni laaɓuɓe, ɓe andaali debbo. Ɓe jokki Baalun kun kala ka kun yaari. Ɓe woni sottaaɓe e hakkunde yimɓe ɓen, ɓe weeɓitanaa Alla e Baalun kun wa ko adaa soɲiteede.
Ɗin kanuuji no nandita e pucci eltaaɗi fii hare. Tawi no ka ko'e majji ko nanditata e meetelli kaŋŋe, geece majji on no nandita e geece neɗɗanke.
Wuuriree wa rindinaaɓe, e ɓaawo waɗugol ngun ndimu wirngallo buumayngo bonki, kono wa kurkantooɓe Alla.
Ko wonɗen gollirde tippira, ko fii en waɗii tama'u men on e Alla Wuuruɗo on, on Dandoowo yimɓe ɓen fow, tentinii gomɗinɓe ɓen.

E miijo mon onon, si goɗɗo hayfinii Ɓiɗɗo Alla on, si o jogitorii ƴiiƴan ahadi ɗan wa ɗan aldaa e fiira, ɗan ɗan o laɓɓiniraa, e si o hoynii Ruuhu Allaahu on, on Jom Sulfu, e hara on miijaaki himo handi e lette ɓurɗe muusude kadi?
Iisaa wi'i ɓe kadi fahin: «Yo jam wonu e mon! Min kadi mi nulirii on wano Baabaajo on nulirimmi non!»
Ɓen ko yimɓe ŋormotooɓe, woytotooɓe, jokkuɓe himmeeji mun, ɓe tawata kundule mun no wowla haalaaji manti, mantooɓe yimɓe fii nafa mun.
Lamɓe aduna ɓen e tedduɓe ɓen e hooreeɓe suufaaɓe ɓen e alɗuɓe ɓen e dolnuɓe ɓen e jiyaaɓe ɓen fow e rimɓe ɓen no suuɗoyii ka pammeeje e ka lombi pete pelle,

Kono waɗayɓe hula yiltitoo ɓen e ɓe gomɗinaa ɓen e tuunuɓe ɓen e ittooɓe ko'e ɓen e jinooɓe ɓen e mbileeɓe ɓen e rewooɓe sanamu ɓen, e fenooɓe ɓen fow: geɓal ɓen ngal ko ka weendu yiite huɓɓundu e mbollan mun woni! Ko ndun non woni mayde ɗimmere nden!»
Jooni non ko honɗun wonɗaa nennanaade? Immo looteɗaa maande kisiyee, laɓɓineɗaa junuubaaji maa ɗin e nder jantagol innde makko nden.› »
Hiɗi mariri sukundu wa debbo, ɲiiƴe majji on kadi no nandita e ɲiiƴe ngayuuje.
Ko fii haanaa ka kurkantooɗo Joomiraaɗo on haɓidee. Himo haani wonde newaniiɗo fow, muɲɲiiɗo, o waawa jannude.

Ko fii, si tawii mi tawdaaka e mon e ɓandu, kono haray miɗo wondi e mon ka ɓernde, miɗo weltori yi'ugol nanondiral yaadungal wongal hakkunde mon ngal, e tiiɗeendi gomɗinal mon ngal e telen-ma Almasiihu on.
ko fii giiɗe Joomiraaɗo on no e hoore feewuɓe ɓen, awa kadi noppi makko ɗin no udditanii toraaje maɓɓe ɗen, kono yeeso Joomiraaɗo on no huccana ɓen waɗooɓe bone.»

Telen-ma amen menen, yo musiɓɓe ɓe Joomiraaɗo on yiɗi, meɗen haani duumaade e jarnugol Alla fii mon, ko fii Allaahu on suɓino on gila ka fuɗɗoode fii kisiyee on, e hoore laɓɓinirgol on Ruuhu Allaahu on e gomɗingol goonga on.
Awa kadi ɓe feewaa ɓen yo duumo e jokkugol angal peewal mun, ɓe laaɓaa ɓen kadi duumoo e jokkugol angal laaɓal mun, feewuɓe ɓen duumoo e peewal mun, laaɓuɓe ɓen duumoo e laaɓal mun!»
Petruusu wi'i ɓe: «Tuubee, mo kala e mon kadi lootoo maande kisiyee e innde Iisaa Almasiihu on, fii yaafuyee junuubaaji mon ɗin. Onsay on heɓay dokkal Ruuhu Seniiɗo on.
Wattanon yiila fii wota hay gooto yoɓir bone bone, kono waɗee soono woo ko moƴƴi, woni non ko e hakkunde mon, woni e telen-ma wonɗo woo.
Worɓe ɓen kadi wano non, ɓe seli yiidugol e rewɓe ɓen, hiɓe huɓɓani faaleeji hakkunde maɓɓe kamɓe worɓe ɓen, hiɓe yiida hakkunde maɓɓe e mbalndi, hiɓe hettude njoddi handundi e majjere maɓɓe nden.
Onon kadi weltoree wano non, weltodon e an!
Jooni non, tuubee, ruttoɗon fii yo junuubaaji mon ɗin monte,
Dame mayre ɗen ombetaake e nder ɲallal ngal few, ɓay ɗon kaɲun jemmataa.
Ko fii kala ɲaamuɗo teewu an ngun, yari ƴiiƴan an ɗan, haray heɓii ngurndan poomayankejan, awa kadi mi immintinay mo ka ɲalaande sakkitorde.
Onsay Iisaa jaabii mo, wi'i: «A heɓataa feere woo e hoore an si hinaa taw hara a yeɗa immorde ka dow. Ko ɗun waɗi, on wattuɗo lan e juuɗe maa fawtike junuubu ɓurɗo mawnude.»
Gomɗinal ngal kadi ko wano non: si ngal aldaa e kuuɗe, ko ngal mayngal kangal tigi.

Ko fii Alla timminii ko Sariya on ronki kon, ɓay lo'ere neɗɗanke nden mehinɗinii mo. Alla muncii bawgal junuubu on ka ɓandu e nder addirgol Ɓiɗɗo makko on ɓandu nanditayndu e junuubankeeru neɗɗanke ndun.
Ɗun-le wuren hay si on tampii fii peewal ngal, on maloyte. Awa wota on hulu yimɓe ɓen, wota on laato maapiiɓe.
Onon kadi baabiraaɓe, wota on mettin ɓerɗe fayɓe mon ɓen, fii wota ɓerɗe maɓɓe maayu.
O ewnii ko tiiɗi, o wi'i: «Nde yanii! Saare Baabiila mawnde nden yanii! Nde wontii hoɗo jinnaaji, suuɗorde kala ruuhu tuunuɗo, e suuɗorde kala sondu harmundu e aɲaandu.
Ko hombo non woni on fenoowo, si hinaa on yedduɗo wonde Iisaa ko Almasiihu? On ko liddotooɗo Almasiihu on, yedduɗo Baabaajo on e Ɓiɗɗo on.
Ko ɗun waɗi, kala on ɲaamuɗo on bireedi, yari e kun jardukun Joomi on, hara ko no haaniraa, o wonay felniiɗo e telen-ma ɓandu e ƴiiƴan Joomi on.
Ko an yo njofoojo! Hiɗa faalaa faamude wonde gomɗinal ngal aldaa e kuuɗe ko meerewal?
Yudaasi ardi e dental suufaaɓe e yeesooɓe goo, ɓe tawata ko hooreeɓe yottinooɓe sadaka e Fariisiyaaɓe ɓen immini, ɓe yahi ka o woni ɗon, tawi hiɓe jogii lampuuji e jowli e jogaaji.
Kono Joomiraaɗo on ko Sella-Findeejo, o tabintinay on, o hisina on bonɗo on.
Ɓay o accaama ka yaasi, jiwo Fir'awna on hocci mo, ne'iri mo wa ɓiɗɗo mun.
Malaa'ikaajo on ƴetti tindohun sunnirkun urngallooji kun, hebbini kun yiite layyorde nden, o bugii ka hoore leydi. Parɲitte waɗi, e digge e maƴanɗe e dimbannde leydi.
Ko fii leƴƴi ɗin fow mandilirii himme jinaa mayre on, lamɓe aduna ɓen kadi wattodi e mayre e nder jinaa mayre on, awa kadi njulaaɓe ɓen ka leydi alɗinorii ngalu mayre feƴƴitungu ngun.»
Awa ko fii ɗunɗoo Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen yaniri e an ka juulirde mawnde, haa ɓe etii no ɓe mulirammi.
Ɓe udda noppi maɓɓe ɗin e goonga on, ɓe fewta tindi mehi ɗin.
Kono woɓɓe no e hakkunde mon ɓe gomɗinaa.» (Ko Iisaa wi'irnoo ɗun, ko fii hari himo andi gila ka fuɗɗoode ko hombo woni mo gomɗinaa, e ko hombo janfoytoo mo.)
Onsay Iisaa jaabii mo, wi'i: «Ko mo mi jullani kuntun bireedi ka mi ɲaamata ɗon, mi jonni woo.» Onsay o julli bireedi on, o jonni Yudaasi mo Sim'uunu Iskariiyu.
Ko an yo Timotee, jogito koo ko halfinaɗaa, e nder reenagol e haalaaji mehi, ɗi yaadaa e faale Alla on, e yeddondire fii gandal fenaandewal,

Kono Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen nawli ɗun, ɓe ƴetti woɓɓe e bonɓe wonɓe ka fottirde ɓen, ɓe wattidi e maɓɓe, ɓe waɗi haa sonko waɗi e nder saare nden e haa yimɓe ɓen dilliri hen fow. Ɓe yahi ka suudu oo wi'eteeɗo Yaasuunu fii ɗaɓɓitugol Puulusa e Silaasi ɓe adda ɓe e yeeso jamaa on.

On mo yi'i musiɗɗo mun no waɗa junuubu mo nawrataa e mayde, yo o torano mo, Alla yeɗay mo ngurndan, ɗun non ko ɓen waɗooɓe junuubu mo nawrataa e mayde. Kono no woodi junuubu nawroowo e mayde, hinaa fii on junuubu mi wi'i yo tore.
Ka haqiiqa haqiiqa mi andinii on, kala jaɓuɗo mo mi nuloyta on, haray jaɓii lan, awa kadi kala jaɓuɗo lan, haray jaɓii Nuluɗo lan on.»
Ɓay laamu ngu hendotoɗen ngun hinaa dimbotoongu, weltanoɗen Alla, kurkanoɗen mo noone no welirta mo e nder teddungal e kulol.

Yahuudiyankeeɓe goo, jindaynooɓe wi'a no raɗoo jinna, woni e jantagol e hoore ɓen ɓe jinnaaji woni e mun innde Iisaa Joomi on, hara hiɓe wi'a: «Mi yamirii on yaltugol e innde Iisaa, on mo Puulusa woni waajaade fii mun!»
Puulusa kaɲun suɓii Silaasi ko o yaada, ɓawto musiɓɓe ɓen halfinde mo kanko Puulusa sulfu Joomiraaɗo on.
Awa, reenee onon tigi, fii wota battane golle men ɗen bonu, kono fii yo on heɓu njoddi heewundi.

Hiɓe mari bawgal ombugol kammu ngun fii wota ndiyan aru e balɗe ɗe ɓe haalata ko Alla longini ɓe kon. Hiɓe mari kadi bawgal waylugol di'e ɗen ƴiiƴan, e libugol ka hoore leydi kala noone ɲabbeeli saa'i mo ɓe faalaa woo.
Ko fii a alaa geɓal, a alaa ndondi e nder ɗun, ɓay ɓernde maa nden laaɓaa yeeso Alla.
Wano tawiri non kala ko mi jeyi ko an jeyi, awa kadi kala ko jeyuɗaa ko min jeyi, e hoore ɗun ko e maɓɓe mangu an ngun feeɲiri.
Fow ko huccuɓe Alla, awa kadi ɓe fow ko ɓe ɓoyliiɓe, hay gooto alaa wonɗo waɗude ko moƴƴi, hinaa non hay e gooto!
Wota on warru huunde haasidi maa manti mehi, kono e nder yankinaare jogoron heddiiɓe ɓen wa ɓurɓe on.
Tawi wa'uɗo wa Ɓii-Aaden no hakkunde ɗen joɗɗinirɗe pitilli, ɓorniiɗo kaftaane juutuɗo, haɓɓitii dattol kaŋŋe ka ɓernde,
Haray kuddi alaa hande kadi. Jullere laamu Alla nden e Baalun kun wonoyay e nden saare. Onsay jiyaaɓe makko ɓen kurkanto mo,
Lannoode piiji ɗin fow hewtii. Awa wonee hakkilanɓe waawon hoore mon fii no waawiron tororde.
Ɓe bakii ɗon e laana fii yiltitagol Antiyoosi-Sirii, ka ɓe ƴettanoo ɗon ɓe halfinaa sulfu Alla on fii ɗee golle ɗe ɓe ari e laatinde ɗoo.
Kono, si a resii, haray a waɗaali junuubu. Si jiwo kadi resaama, haray o waɗaali junuubu. Kono non yimɓe resindirɓe ɓen fottay e tampereeji, mi faalaa on dandude ɗi.
Tippiro men ngon wonaa hakkunde men e ɓandu e ƴiiƴan woni, kono ko hakkunde men e laamuuji ɗin e mbawdiiji ɗin e laamuuji oo aduna wonɗo e nder niɓe e mbawdiiji ruuhuuyankeeji bonɗi ɗin ka kammuuli.
Si goɗɗo e mon ŋakkira faamu, yo o toro ɗun Alla, on okkay mo ɗun. Ko fii kanko Alla ko Yeɗoowo fow no yaajiri e ɓaawo feloore.
Wota on faaɗinan Ruuhu Allaahu on.
E hoore ɗun, rewirdu waɗanooma. Nokkuure aranere nden e ndun rewirdu no wi'etenoo hormorde, ka joɗɗinirde pitilli nden wonnoo ɗon, e taabal ngal e bireediije weeɓitanaaɗe Joomiraaɗo on ɗen.

Min mi waajike ma soodugol kaŋŋe laɓɓiniraaɗe yiite e juuɗe an fii no laatoraa galo, soodaa kadi conci daneeji ko ɓornoɗaa e juuɗe an fii wota hersa kolngal maa ngal feeɲu, e lekki ko wujaa ka gite maa fii no yi'iraa.
Mi windanii on ɗun fii no andiron wonde hiɗon mari ngurndan poomayankejan, onon ɓee gomɗinɓe e innde Ɓiɗɗo Alla on.
On mo no wowlude konguɗi iwruɗi e mun, haray ko hoore mun woni ɗaɓɓande darja, kono on mo no ɗaɓɓude darja nuluɗo ɗun on, haray on ko goongaajo, haray angal peewal alaa e makko.
Enen jogiiɓe ngun ngalu, hiɗen wa'i wa looɗe leydi, fii no andiree wonde ngal bawgal mawngal ko e Alla iwi, hinaa e amen.
Wota on yottano hoore mon onon tigi, yo yiɗaaɓe an, kono accee tikkere Alla nden yottoo, ko fii no windii: «Joomiraaɗo on wi'i: Ko min yottannde wonani, ko min woni Yoɓoowo.»
Iisaa jaabii ɓe kadi, wi'i: «Si mi mawninii hoore an, haray darja an on ko fus. Ko Ben an darjintammi, on mo wi'uɗon ko Alla mon.
Wota a bonnir golle Alla ɗen ɲaametee. Ka haqiiqa, ɲaameteeji ɗin fow no laaɓi, kono moƴƴanaa neɗɗo ka o ɲaama goɗɗun ko wonata sabu feggingol goɗɗo.
Onsay ɓe ƴetti furee Iisaa on, ɓe tumbi e kasannge wondude e urngallooji, ɓay tawi ko ɗun woni naamu Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen fii surrugol.
E hoore ɗun, yurmaɗon sokaaɓe ɓen, jaɓuɗon kadi e nder weltaare yo on jatte keyeeji mon ɗin, sabu andugol mon hiɗon mari keyee ɓurɗo moƴƴude, luttoowo.
Kanko Puulusa o wi'i kadi: «Ko tippude e fodoore makko nden kanko Alla waɗi si Iisaa jibinaa e nder bolondaa Daawuuda on, fii ko wonana Isra'iila'en dandoowo.
Kono ko wano windori non: «Ko Alla eɓɓani yiɗuɓe mo ɓen kon, ko ɗun woni yiitere yi'aali, nowru nanaali, e ko ɓernde neɗɗanke miijaaki.»

E si tawii Ruuhu makko kanko Immintinɗo Iisaa e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen no e mon, haray on Immintinɗo Iisaa Almasiihu on e hakkunde mayɓe ɓen yeɗay ɓalli mon mayooji ɗin ngurndan immorde e Ruuhu makko Wonɗo e mon on.
Ruuhu Allaahu on tigi no seeditanaade ruuhu men on wonde ko en ɓiɓɓe Alla.
Wota on ɗaynito, ko fii Alla yawitetaake, ko fii kala ko goɗɗo sanki ko ɗun o wa'ata.

Awa anditu fii moƴƴere Alla nden e yagginannde makko nden, yagginannde makko nden e hoore yanuɓe ɓen, e moƴƴere Alla nden e hoore maa, si a duumike e nder nden moƴƴere. Si hinaa ɗun, an kadi, a soppete.
Awa muɲɲee, yo musiɓɓe an, haa nde Joomi on ari. Ndaaree no remoowo habbori coɲal tiiɗungal, ngal o habbori muɲal haa ndiyan setto e ndiyan dabbunde toɓɓa.
Yo Joomiraaɗo on tippin yurmeende mun nden e hoore ɓeynguure Onesifoora nden, ko fii himo muɲɲinaynoo lan soono woo, awa kadi o hersiraano ko mi sokaa kon.
Jooni non, yo fayɓe, humondiree e makko, fii, nde o feeɲoyi, yo en heɓu hoolaare, e nde o ari, wota en hersu yeeso makko.
Ko ɗun si mi wi'ay on: wuuriree Ruuhu Allaahu on, ɗun on jokkataa himmeeji ɓandu.
Ngol kongol ɗoo ko haqiiqawol, hingol handi e jaɓeede few, ngol-le e hino ngol: Iisaa Almasiihu on ko ardi ka aduna ko dandugol junuubanke'en. Min non ko mi ɓurɗo bonde e ɓen.
Ka rawnoode, awa dolnoree Joomiraaɗo on e bawgal makko tiiɗungal ngal.
Ko ɗun waɗi, on mo no sikki no darii, yo o reeno wota o yanu.
Ko dokkal bajjal o timminiri haa poomaa wonaaɓe laɓɓineede fii wonugol yimɓe Alla ɓen.
Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen hocci kadi kaaƴe fii fiɗugol mo.
Ko ɗun waɗi si miɗo faalaa yo on andu wonde Almasiihu on ko hooreejo kala neɗɗanke, gorko kadi ko hooreejo e fee ɓeyngu mun, Alla kadi ko hooreejo e fee Almasiihu on.
Woɓɓe ɓen heɓi aybineede e focceede, e hoore jolkeede sokee.
On tama'u no wa'ani en wa saanirgal tiiɗungal holnii fii ngurndan men ɗan, rewoowo ka wirngallo fii naatugol ka nder nokkuure hormorde mawnde nden,
Wota on humondir e kuuɗe meereeje woo ɗe niɓe, kono feɲɲinee fii majje.

Wota on ɲakkin ɓee ɗoo maa ɓee ɗaa, yo musiɓɓe an. Mo ɲakkinii musiɗɗo mun, maa ɲaawii musiɗɗo mun, haray ko Sariya on o ɲakkini, o ɲaawi. Si a ɲaawii-le Sariya on, haray hinaa a huutorɗo mo, kono ko a ɲaawoowo mo.
Tawi dame ɗen sappoo e ɗiɗi fow ko moƴƴiniraaɗe koɗe hittuɗe, damal kala moƴƴiniraa hoɗere wootere. Tawi ballaŋal ngal ka saare ko ngal kaŋŋe laaɓirɗo wa biini jalɓuɗo.
Kono Almasiihu on kan ko Ɓiɗɗo sella-findeejo e hoore suudu Alla ndun. Ko enen woni suudu makko ndun, si en catike fota e wakkilaare e hoolaare nde jogiɗen fii ko tanƴiniɗen kon.
Yo giggol ngol wonu sellungol. Aɲon ko boni kon, humoɗon no tiiɗiri e ko moƴƴi kon.
Ko e on saa'i ɗon, dimbannde leydi tiiɗunde waɗi, feccere sappaɓere e saare nden lancii. Yimɓe guluuje njeeɗiɗo maayiri sabu nden dimbannde leydi, heddiiɓe ɓen huli, mawnini Alla Jom kammu on.
Hakkundeejo non wonaa sengo wooto wonirta, Alla-le ko gooto.
Pilaatu wi'i mo kadi fahin: «A wowlantaa lan? E a andaa miɗo mari feere accitugol ma, maa fempugol ma?»
Tawi ko oo aaya ɗoo o wonnoo jangude: «Himo ɗowiraa wa baalii hirsoyteengii, hara o udditaali hunduko, wa baalun mbobiɗankun taƴoowo kun leeɓi.
Ɓawto ɗun ɓe torii heɓugol lanɗo. Onsay Alla addani ɓe Saawulu ɓiɗɗo Kiisi on, jeyaaɗo e oo bolondaa Buniyamiinu, ko laamoo ɓe e nder duuɓi cappanɗe nay.
Ko fii buy ko murtuɓe, yewtooɓe yewtereeji mehi, ɗaynooɓe, tentinii ɓen wonɓe e hakkunde Yahuudiyankeeɓe gomɗinɓe, catii e sunninegol ɓen.
Tawi no e maggol kulle yaarayɗe koyɗe nay ɗen fow e kala kulle daasotooɗe ka hoore leydi e colli wiirooji ɗin fow.
Min non mi okkii ɓe mangu ngu yeɗuɗaa mi ngun, fii no ɓe wonira gooto, wano wonirɗen gooto non.
Awa jogito sifa ɗii konguɗi selluɗi ɗi hendorɗaa mi, e nder gomɗinal ngal e giggol wongol ngol e Iisaa Almasiihu on.
Tawi no ɗon looɗe kaaƴe jeegoo eɓɓanaaɗe fii ka Yahuudiyankeeɓe ɓen salligoo, tawi nde bee e majje no waɗa embere liitir teemedere.
Awa artee e ko feewi kon, wota on waɗu junuubu. Ko fii woɓɓe ɓen maraa gandal fii andugol Alla, ko fii hersingol on mi wowliri ɗun.
e nder yankinaare e no newori e yondinaare fow. Muɲɲondiranee e nder giggol.
faaboron ɓeya kadi jattingol ɓe yiite, yurminiron ɓeya yurmeende wondude e kulol, e nder aɲugol tuundi haa aɲa tuundi conci tuuniniraaɗi kuuɗe ɓandu.
Hiɗen andi wonde piiji ɗin fow no yaadude fii moƴƴere ɓen yiɗuɓe Alla, noddiraaɓe sabu eɓɓoore makko nden.
Onon non, ɗoftaare mon nden ko nde yimɓe ɓen fow andi. Awa miɗo weltori fii mon on, e miɗo yiɗi yo on wonu faamuɓe e telen-ma ko moƴƴi kon, e ɗayɓe e telen-ma ko boni kon.

Tawi hinde wondunoo e sunnirde urngallooji tafiraande kaŋŋe, e kankiranwal seeditoore hoobiraangal kaŋŋe haa hunditi. Tawi no e nder maggal loonde kaŋŋe waɗornde ‹manna›, wondude e tuggordu Haaruuna ndun, ndu tawata hari fiinii, e alluuje maande ahadi ɗen.
Ko dalil honɗun non mantortee? Dalil woo alaa! Maa ko sabu honɗun? Hara ko kuuɗe ɗen? Oo'o, kono ko gomɗinal ngal.
A hoolaaki wonde miɗo humondiri e Baabaajo on, kanko Baabaajo on kadi himo humondiri e an? Ɗii konguɗi ɗi mi woni on wowlande, wonaa e an ɗi iwri. Ko Baabaajo Wonɗo e an on woni waɗude kuuɗe mun ɗen.
Jamaa on kadi immanii ɓe kamɓe ɗiɗo. Ɓay ɲaawooɓe ɓen waɗii haa ɓe ɓortii ɓe dolokkaaji ɗin, ɓe yamiri yo ɓe luubor ɓe bedi.
«Miɗo yamirde on yamiroore heyre: Yiɗindiree. Wano mi yiɗiri on non, onon kadi yiɗindiree.

Hiɗen andi wonde, si tawii ɗii togooji ɗi hoɗuɗen e mun ka leydi ɗoo, (e maanaa ɓalli men ɗin), aru e bonneede, haray hiɗen mari suudu ndu Alla eɓɓani en, ɗun ko wonunde poomayankeere, nde tawata hinaa juuɗe neɗɗanke moƴƴiniraa.
Onsay Iisaa ewnii, wi'i: «Kala on gomɗinɗo lan, haray wonaa min o gomɗini, kono ko Nuluɗo lan on!
Hanaaniiya jaabii, wi'i: «Joomi an, mi nanirii buy no wi'a wonde on neɗɗo waɗii boneeji ɗuuɗuɗi e hoore laaɓuɓe maa ɓen Yerusalaam.
Ko fii yimɓe ɓen laatoyto ɓurtintiniiɓe, yiɗuɓe kaalisi, mantiiɓe, hownitiiɓe, hoynooɓe, dartotooɓe mawɓe mun, dulluɓe, hayfinooɓe fii laawol feewungol ngol,
Jooni, ɓay en jogoraama feewuɓe sabu ƴiiƴan makko ɗan, haray ko honno ronkirten dandireede tikkere nden sabu makko?
Miɗo andi, miɗo felliti e nder humondiral an ngal e Iisaa Joomi on, huunde alaa ko tuunani hoore mun, kono si goɗɗo no miijii wonde goɗɗun laaɓaa, haray ɗun laaɓanaa mo.
Si a weeɓitanii ɗun musiɓɓe ɓen, a wonanay Iisaa Almasiihu on kurkaadu moƴƴuru, eltiraaɗo daaluyeeji gomɗinal ngal wondude e janndeeji moƴƴi ɗi jokkuɗaa ɗin tigi.
